Member

Dashboard Page



dashboard Controllers

application/controllers/member.php 
<?php
defined('BASEPATH') OR exit('No direct script access allowed');
class Member extends CI_Controller {
	private $userid;
	private $coachid;

	public function __construct()
	{
		parent::__construct();
		$session = $this->session->userdata();

		if(isset($session['user_id'])) {
			$this->userid = $session['user_id'];
		}else 
		{
			redirect(base_url());
			die();
		}

		if(!isset($session["user_type"]))
		{
			redirect(base_url());
			die();
		}else if($session['user_type']=='yogiccoach')
		{
			redirect(base_url()."yogiccoach");
			die();
		}else if($session['user_type']!="member")
		{
			redirect(base_url());
			die();
		}

		$member=$this->db->get_where('users',array('fld_id'=>$this->userid));
        if ($member->num_rows()>0) 
        {
    		$row=$member->row_array();
	        $timezone = $row['fld_timezone'];
        }

		date_default_timezone_set($timezone);
		$this->coachid = $this->Common_model->get_yogi_id_by_user_id($this->userid);
		$this->load->model("user_model");

		$coaching_forms =array("coaching_forms"=> $this->user_model->get_coaching_forms($this->userid),"coaching_forms_count"=> $this->user_model->get_coaching_forms_count($this->userid));

		$marketing_forms = array("marketing_forms"=> $this->user_model->get_marketing_forms($this->userid),"marketing_forms_count"=>$this->user_model->get_marketing_forms_count($this->userid));

		$this->load->vars($coaching_forms);
		$this->load->vars($marketing_forms);
	}

    public function index()
	{
		$this->load->view('member/dashboard');
	}

	public function delete_notification($user_id=0, $form_name="")
	
	{
	
	$this->db->delete('notification', array('urls' => $form_name,'reciver_id'=>$user_id));
	
	}
	
	public function delete_notifications($user_id=0, $form_name="")
	
	{
	
	$this->db->delete('notification', array('reciver_id'=>$user_id));
	
	}
    
}

Dhashboard View

application/views/member/dashboard.php 
<?php
defined('BASEPATH') OR exit('No direct script access allowed');
$this->lang->load('date', 'english');
$session = $this->session->get_userdata();
$user_type=$session['user_type'];
$login_id=$session['user_id'];
if(!isset($session['logged_in'])){
	 redirect(base_url());
	 exit;
}else{
	  $user_id=$session['user_id'];
      $varification=$session['varification_code'];
	  $userData = $this->db->get_where('users',array('fld_id'=> $user_id));
	  if ($userData->num_rows()>0) {
		   $userRow = $userData->row_array();
	  }
	  	$image_path=($userRow['fld_file_name']!='')?$userRow['fld_file_name']:'assets/uploads/member/'.'default.png';
		$image = base_url().$image_path;
	  if($varification=='0'){
	     redirect(base_url('registration'));
	  }else{
	   //redirect(base_url('member'));
	 }
}
  if(!($session['user_type']=='member')){
	redirect(base_url());
}else{}
 $user_page=$this->db->get_where('yogi_page_activate',array('fld_user_id'=>$login_id));
 $pageARRAY=array();
 if($user_page->num_rows()>0){
	foreach($user_page->result() as  $pageA){
		$pageARRAY[$pageA->fld_page_name]=$pageA->fld_activate;
	}
 }

	$this->db->order_by("fld_id", "desc");
	$array_week_days=array('Monday','Tuesday','Wednesday','Thursday','Friday','Saturday','Sunday');
	$C_date=date("d-m-Y");

    $week = getWeekForDate($C_date);
    $weekStartDate = $week["start"];
    $weekEndDate = $week["end"];

    $WeekDay = date_diff(date_create($C_date),date_create($weekStartDate));
    $WeekDay = $WeekDay->d;
  ###### message count.....

  $userData = $this->db->get_where('chat',array('receiver_id'=> $user_id ,'status'=>'0'));
    if ($userData->num_rows()>0) {
  $countMsg=$userData->num_rows();  
}else{
	$countMsg=0;
}

	}

                <a href="<?php echo ($rows->fld_Intention_verified == 1)? base_url("Intention_Setting") : base_url("member/no_intention") ?>">
               <div class="card-body">       
                  <img src="<?= base_url('assets/client-dashboard/') ?>/img/intention.jpg" class="img-fluid">
                </div>
              </a>
              </div>
            </div>


            <div class="col-xl-4 col-md-6 mb-4">
              <div class="card border-primary shadow h-100 py-2">
                <a href="<?= base_url('Library') ?>" style="text-decoration:none !important;">
                <div class="card-body">       
                    <div class="col ">
                      <div class="h5 mb-0 font-weight-bold text-gray-800">Library</div>
                    </div>
                  <hr>
                  <div class="col-auto">
                    
                      <img src="<?= base_url('assets/new_client_dashboard/images/library.png') ?>" width="100">
                  </div>
                 <!-- <hr> -->
                 <!-- <div class="widget-int num-count"><?php echo $countMsg; ?></div> -->
                </div>
                </a>
              </div>
            </div>

           

       <div class="col-xl-4 col-md-6 mb-4">
              <div class="card border-primary shadow h-100 py-2">
                <a href="<?= base_url('reports')?>">
                <div class="card-body">
                	<div class="col ">

                 <img src="<?= base_url('assets/') ?>/new_client_dashboard/images/reports1.png" width="140">
                </div>
                </a>
             </div>
              </div>
            </div> 
          </div>

          </div>

<script>
  $(document).ready(function(){
      setInterval(function(){ update_profile();}, 3000);

       function update_profile(){
           var x = document.getElementById("myAudio");
        $.ajax({

            url:"<?=base_url()?>member/update_profile",

            method:"post",

            type:"json",

            success:function(response){
                data = JSON.parse(response);
                console.log(data.status);
                if(data.status == 1)
                {
                    x.play();
                    $('#callincoming').html('<div class="alert alert-dark" style="height: 50px;line-height: 50px;padding:0px;"><a href="'+data.url+'" style="margin-right:12px;float:right;"><img src="<?= base_url('assets/img/0e475bb9b17b3fa4f94f31fba1635b8f-telephone-call-icon-logo-by-vexels.png'); ?>" alt="callend" width="30"></a><a href="<?= base_url('member/callend/') ?>/'+data.fld_id+'" style="margin-right:12px;float:right;"><img src="<?= base_url('assets/img/png-clipart-end-call-button-telephone-call-button-computer-icons-button-text-trademark.png') ?>" alt="callend" width="25"></a></div>');
                }else
                {
                    $('#callincoming').html("");
                    x.pause();
                    
                }
                // x.play();
            }

        });

       }
       
    $('#get_logout').click(function(){
      var username=$(this).attr('username');
      $.ajax({
        url: "<?=base_url()?>get_logout", 
                data: { 
                  "username": username
                },
                dataType: "json",
                type: "POST",
                    success: function(response){
                   
                        if(response.status=='1') {
                      window.setTimeout(function(){   
                        // Move to a new location or you can do something else
                        window.location.href = "<?=base_url()?>login";
                      }, 0000  );
                    }else{
                    }
                    }
            });
    });
    $('#sent_rating').click(function(){

                    var rating = $('input[type="radio"]:checked').val();

                    var client_id = $('#client_id').val();

                    var coach_id = $("#coach_id").val();

                    var description = $("#message-text").val();

                    if (rating != "" && client_id != "" && coach_id != "" && description != "" ) {

                      $.ajax({

                        url: "<?= base_url('member/testimonial') ?>",

                        method:"post",

                        type:"text",

                        data: {rating:rating, client_id:client_id, coach_id:coach_id, description:description},

                        success:function(data){

                          location.reload();

                        }

                    });

                    }else{

                      alert("Please fill Testimonial !!!");

                    }

                   });
  });
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  $(".allclear").click(function(){
    if (confirm("Are you sure All clear?")) {
      var id = $(this).attr('data-id');
      $.get("<?= base_url('Member/delete_notifications') ?>/" + id, "", function (response) {
        location.reload(true);
      });
    }
  });
  $(".delete_notif").click(function () {
    if (confirm("Are you sure?")) {
      var id = $(this).attr('data-id');
      var url = $(this).attr('data-url');
      $.get("<?= base_url('Member/delete_notification') ?>/" + id+"/" + url, "", function (response) {
        location.reload(true);
      });
    }
  });
  function clock(){
    var hours = document.getElementById('hours');
    var minutes = document.getElementById('menutes');
    var ampm = document.getElementById('ampm');

    var h = new Date().getHours();
    var m = new Date().getMinutes();
    var am = "AM";
    if (h > 12) {
      h = h - 12;
      var am = "PM";
    }

    h = (h < 10) ? "0" + h : h
    m = (m < 10) ? "0" + m : m

    hours.innerHTML = h;
    minutes.innerHTML = m;
    ampm.innerHTML = am;
  }
  var interval = setInterval(clock,1000);
</script>
  <script type='text/javascript' src='<?php echo base_url()."assets/";?>js/plugins/jvectormap/jquery-jvectormap-1.2.2.min.js'></script>

  	$(function() {
    $('marquee').mouseover(function() {
        $(this).attr('scrollamount',0);
    }).mouseout(function() {
         $(this).attr('scrollamount',5);
    });
});
  </script>

Coaching Session



Coaching session controller

application/controllers/member.php 
public function coaching_session()
{
    $this->load->view('member/coaching_session');
}
public function no_coaching()
{
    $this->load->view('member/coaching');
}

Coaching session View

application/views/member/coaching_session.php 
<?php
$this->load->view('member/sidebar');
$session=$this->session->get_userdata();
$user_id=$session['user_id'];
$getDatas=$this->db->get_where('users',array('fld_id'=>$user_id));

                    foreach($getDatas->result() as $rows){}

        $membersparent_id = $rows->fld_parent;

        $coach=$this->db->get_where('users',array('fld_id'=>$membersparent_id));
        if ($coach->num_rows()>0) {
        $row=$coach->row_array();

        $coachName = $row["fld_first_name"] . " " . $row["fld_last_name"];
        $coachemail = $row["fld_email"];
        $coach_form = $row['fld_cform'];
        }

?>
<style>
.font_waight{
	color: green;
	font-weight:bold!important;
}
</style>
    <!-- START BREADCRUMB -->
                <ul class="breadcrumb">

									 <?php
                     if(sizeof($coaching_forms) > 0){

                            }
                            echo "</table>";
                     } }else{}

				var date = new Date();
				date.setDate(date.getDate());

				$('.datepicker').datepicker({ 
				startDate: date
				})

			position: absolute;
			left: -34%;
			top: 0px;

			overflow: visible!important;

<script>
var options = [];

$( '.dropdown-menu a' ).on( 'click', function( event ) {

   var $target = $( event.currentTarget ),
       val = $target.attr( 'data-value' ),
       $inp = $target.find( 'input' ),
       idx;
      options.push( val );
      setTimeout( function() { $inp.prop( 'checked', true ) }, 0);
   $('#show_val').val($inp.attr('value'));
   $('#show_val').dropdown-menu('hide');
   $( event.target ).blur();
      
   console.log( options );
   return false;
});
		 
</script>		 
		 
    <!-- END SCRIPTS -->         
 <?php
 $this->load->view('member/footer');
 ?>

A-1 YOUR BUSINESS VISION controller

application/controllers/member.php 
public function your_business_vision()
	{
		$coach=$this->db->get_where('users',array('fld_id'=>$this->userid));
        if ($coach->num_rows()>0) 
        {
	       $row=$coach->row_array();
	        $coachName = $row["fld_username"] . " " . $row["fld_last_name"];
	        $coachemail = $row["fld_email"];
	        $coachsparent_id = $row["fld_parent"];
        }

        $admin=$this->db->get_where('users',array('fld_id'=>$coachsparent_id));
        if ($admin->num_rows()>0) 
        {
        	$row=$admin->row_array();
	        $adminName = $row["fld_username"] . " " . $row["fld_last_name"];
	        $adminemail = $row["fld_email"];
        }
		$row = array();
        $successMsg = "";
        $errorMsg = "";
		$this->load->model('admin_model');

		$tbForm = $this->admin_model->get_coaching_forms($this->userid,'your_business_vision');
		if(sizeof($tbForm)>0)
		{
			$row = $tbForm[0];
		}
		
		if($this->input->post())
		{
			if ($this->input->post('delete')) 
			{
				$this->db->delete('user_business_vision', array('fld_user_id' => $this->userid));
			}
			
			if (isset($_POST['save'])) 
		 	{
		 		$satisfied = $_POST['satisfied'];
				$look = $_POST['look'];
				$client = $_POST['client'];
				$income  = $_POST['income'];
				$structure = $_POST['structure'];
				$consultants = $_POST['consultants'];
				$vacation = $_POST['vacation'];
				$hours = $_POST['hours'];
				$Other = $_POST['Other'];
				$want = $_POST['want'];
				$create = $_POST['create'];
				$money = $_POST['money'];
				$fail = $_POST['fail'];
				$success = $_POST['success'];
				$wearing = $_POST['wearing'];
				$with = $_POST['with'];
				$spend = $_POST['spend'];
				$home = $_POST['home'];
				$feel = $_POST['feel'];
				$rejuvenate = $_POST['rejuvenate'];
				$fun = $_POST['fun'];
				$go_vacation  = $_POST['go_vacation'];
				$Where_go = $_POST['Where_go'];
				$drive = $_POST['drive'];
				$contribute = $_POST['contribute'];
				$lifestyle = $_POST['lifestyle'];
				$extra_money = $_POST['extra_money'];
				$work = $_POST['work'];
				$office_look = $_POST['office_look'];
				$feel_work = $_POST['feel_work'];
				$responsible = $_POST['responsible'];
				$spend_time = $_POST['spend_time'];
				$tasks = $_POST['tasks'];
				$study = $_POST['study'];
				$programs = $_POST['programs'];
				$workshops = $_POST['workshops'];
				$events = $_POST['events'];
				$speaking = $_POST['speaking'];
				$attend_events = $_POST['attend_events'];
				$private_clients  = $_POST['private_clients'];
				$about = $_POST['about'];
				$transformed = $_POST['transformed'];
				$happen = $_POST['happen'];
				$sustain = $_POST['sustain'];
				$qualities = $_POST['qualities'];
				$important_steps = $_POST['important_steps'];
				$important_support = $_POST['important_support'];
				$business_support = $_POST['business_support'];
				$personal_support = $_POST['personal_support'];
            
	            $newData = array(
								'satisfied' => $satisfied,              
								'look'   => $look,           
								'client' => $client,			              
								'income ' => $income,			              
								'structure' => $structure,			              
								'consultants' => $consultants,			              
								'vacation' => $vacation,			              
								'hours' => $hours,			              
								'Other' => $Other,			              
								'want' => $want,

								'money' => $money,			              
								'fail' => $fail,

								'wearing' => $wearing,

								'spend' => $spend,			              
								'home' => $home,

								'fun' => $fun,			              
								'go_vacation' => $go_vacation,			              
								'Where_go' => $Where_go,			              
								'drive' => $drive,			              
								'contribute' => $contribute,			              
								'lifestyle' => $lifestyle,			              
								'extra_money' => $extra_money,

								'workshops' => $workshops,

								'personal_support' => $personal_support,	
								'fld_user_id' => $this->userid,
								'fld_added_date' =>time()
							);

				$fill=$this->db->get_where('user_business_vision',array('fld_user_id'=>$this->userid));
	
	            if ($fill->num_rows()>0) 
                {
	                $this->db->where('fld_user_id',$this->userid);
				    $this->db->update('user_business_vision',$newData);

                    if($query)
                    {
                        echo "<div   class=\"alert alert-success\">Form save Successfully!<a href=\"#\" class=\"close\" data-dismiss=\"alert\" aria-label=\"close\">&times;</a></div>";
                    }
                }else
                {
                    $query = $this->db->insert('user_business_vision', $newData); 
                    $last_id = $this->db->insert_id();  
                    if($query)
                    {
                        echo "<div   class=\"alert alert-success\">Form save Successfully!<a href=\"#\" class=\"close\" data-dismiss=\"alert\" aria-label=\"close\">&times;</a></div>";

                    }   
                }
   		 	}

         if(isset($_POST['submit'])){

                  $satisfied = $_POST['satisfied'];

		 $look = $_POST['look'];

		 $client = $_POST['client'];

		 $income  = $_POST['income'];

		 $structure = $_POST['structure'];

		 $consultants = $_POST['consultants'];

		 $vacation = $_POST['vacation'];

		 $hours = $_POST['hours'];

		 $create = $_POST['create'];

      

                 $subject = "Form Submitted";

                 $header = "From:" . $this->config->item('mail_from') . "\r\n";

                 $header .= "MIME-Version: 1.0\r\n";

                 $header .= "Content-type: text/html\r\n";

                 $retval = mail ($adminemail,$subject,$massage,$header);



         $nots=array(

            'sender_id' => $this->userid,

            'reciver_id' => $coachsparent_id,

            'message' => $coachName.", Filled-Up and submitted <b style='color:#4e73df'>\"business vision\"</b> Form Today.",

            'urls' => "mreport/".$this->userid,

            'fld_date' => time()

         );



         $this->db->insert('notification',$nots);

						}

                    $updateData = array(

                        'completed_date' => time(),

                        'status' => "1",

                        'last_modified' => date('Y-m-d H:i:s')

                    );

                    $this->db->where(array('fld_form_id' => $row->id,  'fld_user_id' =>$this->userid));

                    $this->db->update('marketing_form_user',$updateData);  

                     $successMsg = "Form Submitted Successfully!";  

                    

                    //get the updated row

                    $tbForm = $this->admin_model->get_coaching_forms($this->userid,'your_business_vision');

                    if(sizeof($tbForm)>0){

                        $row = $tbForm[0];

                    }

                }

			}

		}

					$insertFormPossition=array(

						   'fld_user_id' => $this->userid,

						   'fld_business_vision' => '1'

						   //'fld_added_date' => time()

						   );

						   $userExist=$this->Common_model->user_exist_form_possition($this->userid);

						   if($userExist){

							   $this->db->where('fld_user_id',$this->userid);

							   $this->db->update('form_possition',$insertFormPossition);

						   }else{

							  $this->db->insert('form_possition',$insertFormPossition); 

						   }

			    

	 

				}else{

					echo "Database Error.";



 }

             "Error_Message" => $errorMsg,

              "Success_Message" => $successMsg

        );

A-1 YOUR BUSINESS VISION View

application/views/member/your_business_vision.php 
 <?php
$this->load->view('member/sidebar');
$session= $this->session->get_userdata();
$user_id=$session['user_id'];
 $completed="";
error_reporting(0);

$user=$this->db->get_where('users',array('fld_id'=>$user_id));
        if ($user->num_rows()>0) {
        $row=$user->row_array();

        $memberName = $row["fld_first_name"] . " " . $row["fld_last_name"];
        $memberemail = $row["fld_email"];
        $membersparent_id = $row["fld_parent"];
        }

        $coach=$this->db->get_where('users',array('fld_id'=>$membersparent_id));
        if ($coach->num_rows()>0) {
        $row=$coach->row_array();

        $coachName = $row["fld_first_name"] . " " . $row["fld_last_name"];
        $coachemail = $row["fld_email"];
        }

												<textarea name="responsible" class="newarea_width" rows="2" ><?= $row['responsible'] ?></textarea>
                                        	</div> 
											<div class="form-group">
                                            	<label for="exampleInputEmail1">How do you spend your time? (What do you do on a day-to-day basis?)</label>
												<textarea name="spend_time" class="newarea_width" rows="2" ><?= $row['spend_time'] ?></textarea>
                                        	</div> 
											<div class="form-group">
                                            	<label for="exampleInputEmail1">What specific tasks have you let go of?</label>
												<textarea name="tasks" class="newarea_width" rows="2" ><?= $row['tasks'] ?></textarea>
                                        	</div> 
											<div class="form-group">
                                            	<label for="exampleInputEmail1">How many copies of your home study courses have you sold?</label>

            <!-- Modal HTML -->
    <div id="reportview" class="modal fade" tabindex="-1">
        <div class="modal-dialog">
            <div class="modal-content">
                <div class="modal-header">
                    <h5 class="modal-title">Your Form Was Successfully Submitted!</h5>
                    <!--<button type="button" class="close" data-dismiss="modal">&times;</button>-->
                </div>
                <div class="modal-body">
                    <!--<input type="text" id="formid">-->
                    <div class="text-center">
                    <a href="" target="_blank" id="formid" class="btn btn-info" >View</a>
                    <a href="" target="_blank" id="download" class="btn btn-warning" >Save</a>
                    </div>
                </div>
                <div class="modal-footer">
                    <button type="button" class="btn btn-secondary" data-dismiss="modal">Cancel</button>

                <!-- END PAGE CONTENT WRAPPER -->                                
                            
         <script>
            setTimeout(function(){ notification(); }, 3000);

                function notification(){
                    var user_id = "<?= $user_id ?>";
                    var form_name = "your_business_vision";
$.get("<?= base_url('Member/delete_notification') ?>/" + user_id+"/" + form_name, "", function (response) {
                console.log(response);
            });
                }
                
                $(document).ready(function(){
        $('#btnsubmit').click(function(){
        $('#formsubmit').submit(function(event){
            event.preventDefault();        
            $.ajax({
                url: "<?= base_url("member/your_business_vision_form") ?>",
                type: "post",
                // dataType: "JSON",
                data: new FormData(this),
                processData: false,
                contentType: false,
                success: function (responce)
                {
                    // console.log(responce);
                    $('#formid').attr("href","<?= base_url('member/marketingview/') ?>/business_vision/"+responce);
                    $("#download").attr("href","<?= base_url('member/marketingdownload') ?>/business_vision/"+responce);
                    $("#reportview").modal('show');
                },
                error: function (xhr, desc, err)
                {
        
        
                }
            });
        });
    });
    });
         </script>
          <!-- START SCRIPTS -->
        <!-- START PLUGINS -->
        <script type="text/javascript" src="<?php echo base_url()."assets/";?>js/plugins/jquery/jquery.min.js"></script>
        <script type="text/javascript" src="<?php echo base_url()."assets/";?>js/plugins/jquery/jquery-ui.min.js"></script>
        <script type="text/javascript" src="<?php echo base_url()."assets/";?>js/plugins/bootstrap/bootstrap.min.js"></script>        
        <!-- END PLUGINS -->

        <!-- START THIS PAGE PLUGINS-->        
        <script type='text/javascript' src='<?php echo base_url()."assets/";?>js/plugins/icheck/icheck.min.js'></script>
        <script type="text/javascript" src="<?php echo base_url()."assets/";?>js/plugins/mcustomscrollbar/jquery.mCustomScrollbar.min.js"></script>
        
        <script type="text/javascript" src="<?php echo base_url()."assets/";?>js/plugins/smartwizard/jquery.smartWizard-2.0.min.js"></script>        
        <script type="text/javascript" src="<?php echo base_url()."assets/";?>js/plugins/jquery-validation/jquery.validate.js"></script> 
        <script type="text/javascript" src="<?php echo base_url()."assets/";?>js/plugins/bootstrap/bootstrap-datepicker.js"></script>
        <script type="text/javascript" src="<?php echo base_url()."assets/";?>js/plugins/bootstrap/bootstrap-timepicker.min.js"></script>
        <script type="text/javascript" src="<?php echo base_url()."assets/";?>js/plugins/bootstrap/bootstrap-colorpicker.js"></script>
        <script type="text/javascript" src="<?php echo base_url()."assets/";?>js/plugins/bootstrap/bootstrap-file-input.js"></script>
        <script type="text/javascript" src="<?php echo base_url()."assets/";?>js/plugins/bootstrap/bootstrap-select.js"></script>
        <script type="text/javascript" src="<?php echo base_url()."assets/";?>js/plugins/tagsinput/jquery.tagsinput.min.js"></script>

        <!-- START TEMPLATE -->
      
        
        <script type="text/javascript" src="<?php echo base_url()."assets/";?>js/plugins.js"></script>        
        <script type="text/javascript" src="<?php echo base_url()."assets/";?>js/actions.js"></script>

<?php
$this->load->view('member/footer');
?>

A-2 Branding Exercise page controller

application/controllers/member.php 
public function branding_exercise(){



		//for email notification get admin and coach detail

		$coach=$this->db->get_where('users',array('fld_id'=>$this->userid));

        if ($coach->num_rows()>0) {

        $row=$coach->row_array();



        $coachName = $row["fld_username"] . " " . $row["fld_last_name"];

        $coachemail = $row["fld_email"];

        $coachsparent_id = $row["fld_parent"];

        }



        $admin=$this->db->get_where('users',array('fld_id'=>$coachsparent_id));

        if ($admin->num_rows()>0) {

        $row=$admin->row_array();



        $adminName = $row["fld_username"] . " " . $row["fld_last_name"];

        $adminemail = $row["fld_email"];

        }

	

	$row = array();

        $successMsg = "";

        $errorMsg = "";

		$this->load->model('admin_model');

		$tbForm = $this->admin_model->get_coaching_forms($this->userid,'branding_exercise');

		if(sizeof($tbForm)>0){

			$row = $tbForm[0];

		}

        

		

			if($this->input->post()){
				if ($this->input->post('delete')) 
{
	$this->db->delete('user_branding_exercise', array('fld_user_id' => $this->userid));
}
				if (isset($_POST['save'])) 

				{

					$name_business = $_POST['name_business'];

		 $unique_point = $_POST['unique_point'];

		 $provide = $_POST['provide'];

		 $ideal_client  = $_POST['ideal_client'];

		 $my_offering = $_POST['my_offering'];

		 $stumble = $_POST['stumble'];

		 $coming_back = $_POST['coming_back'];

		 $aim = $_POST['aim'];

		 $and = $_POST['and'];

		 $often = $_POST['often'];

		 $describing = $_POST['describing'];

                        if($query){

			    $massage = "<head><meta http-equiv='Content-Type' content='text/html; charset=windows-1252'><meta name='GENERATOR' content='MSHTML 11.00.10570.1001'<body bgcolor='#ffffff'><strong></strong><strong> </strong><strong></strong><table width='600' align='center' id='TbHeader' bgcolor='#400080' border='0' cellspacing='0' cellpadding='4'><tr><td align='center' id='TdHeader' bgcolor='#400080'><p align='center'><font color='#ffffff' face='Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif' size='6'><strong>Welcome</strong></font></p></td></tr></table><table width='600' align='center' id='TbBodyRow' border='0' cellspacing='0' cellpadding='0'><tr><td id='TdBodyRow' valign='top' bgcolor='#ffffff'><table width='100%' id='TbBody' bgcolor='#ffffff' border='0' cellspacing='0' cellpadding='4'><tr><td align='center' id='TdBody' bgcolor='#ffffff'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<p align='left'><font color='#000000' face='Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif' size='3'><strong>Hi ".$adminName."&nbsp;<font color='#000000' face='Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif' size='3'>&nbsp;</font></strong></font>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</p><p align='justify' style='margin-right: 0px;'><font color='#000000' face='Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif' size='3'>This is an auto-generated email to notify you that your client ".$coachName." has filled and submitted the form <b>\"A-2 Branding exercise\"</b> on MyportalX.<br><br>Please check out your client reports on MyportalX.</font></p><br></font></font></font></p><p align='left'><br></p></td></tr></table></td></tr></table><strong></strong><strong></strong><strong> </strong><table width='600' align='center' id='TbFooter' bgcolor='#eea000' border='0' cellspacing='0' cellpadding='4'><tr><td align='center' id='TdFooter' bgcolor='#eea000'><div style='margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);'><div style='margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);'><span style='color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-size: inherit; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;'><span style='color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;'><br></span></span></div><div style='margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);'><span style='color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-size: inherit; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;'><span style='color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;'>Regards,</span><br style='color: rgb(0, 52, 89);'></span></div><div style='margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);'><span style='color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;'>Team MyportalX</span></div><div style='margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);'><span style='color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;'><br></span></div></div></td></tr></table>";       

                 $subject = "Form Submitted";

                 $header = "From:" . $this->config->item('mail_from') . "\r\n";

                 $header .= "MIME-Version: 1.0\r\n";

                 $header .= "Content-type: text/html\r\n";

                 $retval = mail ($adminemail,$subject,$massage,$header);



         $nots=array(

            'sender_id' => $this->userid,

            'reciver_id' => $coachsparent_id,

            'message' => $coachName.", Filled-Up and submitted <b style='color:#4e73df'>\"branding exercise\"</b> Form Today.",

            'urls' => "mreport/".$this->userid,

            'fld_date' => time()

         );



         $this->db->insert('notification',$nots);



			echo "<div   class=\"alert alert-success\">Form Submitted Successfully!<a href=\"#\" class=\"close\" data-dismiss=\"alert\" aria-label=\"close\">&times;</a></div>";

			}

		

			if($this->db->affected_rows()){

                    $updateData = array(

                        'completed_date' => time(),

                        'status' => "1",

                        'last_modified' => date('Y-m-d H:i:s')

                    );

                    $this->db->where(array('fld_form_id' => $row->id,  'fld_user_id' =>$this->userid));

                    $this->db->update('marketing_form_user',$updateData);  

                     $successMsg = "Form Submitted Successfully!";  

                    

                    //get the updated row

                    $tbForm = $this->admin_model->get_coaching_forms($this->userid,'branding_exercise');

                    if(sizeof($tbForm)>0){

                        $row = $tbForm[0];

                    }

                }

			}

		}

		

		

		if($this->db->affected_rows()){

					$insertFormPossition=array(

						   'fld_user_id' => $this->userid,

						   'fld_branding_exercise' => '1'

						   //'fld_added_date' => time()

						   );

						   $userExist=$this->Common_model->user_exist_form_possition($this->userid);

						   if($userExist){

							   $this->db->where('fld_user_id',$this->userid);

							   $this->db->update('form_possition',$insertFormPossition);

						   }else{

							  $this->db->insert('form_possition',$insertFormPossition); 

						   }

			    

	 

				}else{

					echo "Database Error.";

				}

		

		

        $data = array("Form" => $row,

             "Error_Message" => $errorMsg,

              "Success_Message" => $successMsg

        );

	

	$this->load->view('member/branding_exercise', $data);

	}

A-2 Branding Exercise page View

application/views/member/branding_exercise.php 
 <?php
$this->load->view('member/sidebar');
$session= $this->session->get_userdata();
$user_id=$session['user_id'];
 $completed="";
error_reporting(0);

$user=$this->db->get_where('users',array('fld_id'=>$user_id));
        if ($user->num_rows()>0) {
        $row=$user->row_array();

        $memberName = $row["fld_first_name"] . " " . $row["fld_last_name"];
        $memberemail = $row["fld_email"];
        $membersparent_id = $row["fld_parent"];
        }

        $coach=$this->db->get_where('users',array('fld_id'=>$membersparent_id));
        if ($coach->num_rows()>0) {
        $row=$coach->row_array();

        $coachName = $row["fld_first_name"] . " " . $row["fld_last_name"];
        $coachemail = $row["fld_email"];
        }
?>

                    	$fill=$this->db->get_where('user_branding_exercise',array('fld_user_id'=>$user_id));

                    	<form action="#" role="form" id="formsubmit" class="form-horizontal form-material" method="post">
                    <div class="row">                                                         
                        <div class="col-md-12">
                     		<div class="panel panel-default">
                                <div class="panel-body">
								
								<p> This little tool is the start of brand alignment. Clarity+ Alignment= Conversion.</p>
<p>Our goal here is to find your brands SOUL and then fling the door wide open for the 
throngs of admirers/clients that are waiting for you to change their lives. </p>
<p> Make no mistake: your brand identity, your messaging, your story are all tied tightly together. They are all ingredients to your money recipe. And the most important point to remember is that they should all begin by being an extension of YOU. </p>
<p> But first, a note about alignment. Often times I come across clients that have a wonderful persona and are so eager and willing to help others and change the world. Their personality is warm and fuzzy and they exude an aura of confidence and peace. However, there have been times when I visited some of their websites and I can feel an immediate disconnect. Their websites does not do justice to their personalities and their business site offers a totally different feeling. Beginning from the opt-in sign to the text written there it felt like it was all about getting the clients on the hook, leading them from one page to next and constantly having pop-ups to sign up for this and that. The copy, the look, and feel, the energy just were not in alignment. Now I understood why she was spending so much time and money but still could not get people to sign up. The visitors came to the site but like me, they felt the disconnect and left in just a few seconds. She was losing so many opportunities. </p>
<p> Once you know who you are, what you stand for and how you want to make people feel, you can build an empire that speaks to your soul and to your tribe. </p>

											<p> If not there is good news and bad news.</p>
<p> The bad news is, you are out of alignment. And you are not likely to grow to the level you want to grow to until you get back into balance and authenticity.</p>
<p> The good news is, this is all entirely fixable! To sum up. If you build it, they might come. If you build it, love it, nurture it, own it, consistently shout it, shine a light on it, share it with love and commit to it with unwavering faith and devotion  they will com and they will stay. </p>
<p>Here is to your beautiful, loved up vision, your courage and your willingness to play.</p>

						<h2 style="color:red">WHAT iS YOUR STORY?  What melts your butter? </h2>	
						
										<p> Stories sell. Think about it. What commercials and movies do you, love? The ones that tug at the heartstrings? The ones that remind you of a night out with friends? Or the ones that entertain you? They all have something in common. They tell a story that you can relate to. What follows is a series of exercises and questions meant to help you uncover the unique DNA (Divine and Natural Attributes) that drive you and your business. Do not get stuck in perfection. There are no right or wrong answers.</p>
<p> But here is what often happens: Jane decides she wants to start a business. She hires a mentor, starts the process, looks at a bunch of other websites to see what they are doing and then models her business after the most successful. That is great to a point. You WANT to follow a proven business model and that model has some universal traits that we all use. What you do not want is a copycat message. Audiences can smell a fake. But worse than that? You know when you are not being authentic. You know when you have fit yourself into a mold that does nott entirely match your naked, authentic self. What happens then is what I like to call soul fatigue. And it sucks. Not only that, 
but your fakeness will ring loud and clear. You cannot sustain a brand and message that is not authentically you. Just ask Milli Vanilli. =)</p>
<p> This is the time to uncover, embrace and live your truth. This is meant to be an exercise in self-awareness and alignment. You must know yourself before you can create a business that makes a huge impact. Your truth is as unique to you as your genetic makeup. It is what sets you apart. And when you embrace it, live it, and put it up in lights, you virtually eliminate competition by the very principle that NO one is exactly like you.</p> 
<p> Your brand story may never actually be totally spelled out with words. Yet, it's imperative that you know what it is. Confused? Let me explain. You may never sit and 
write out in a lengthy narrative the back story to your brand and then slap that narrative onto your homepage. However, when you, as the embodiment of your business, are crystal clear on what you stand for and why, lengthy narratives are not necessary. Your audience will come to know what you stand for; they will come to expect it from you. It is what makes you unforgettable. This is SOOOO important to remember. Your brand is NOT just a logo, or a font you put your name in or the colors on your site. Those things reflect your brand but they are not the core. Your brands core, your brands Soul is the experience you give to others. It is the experience that people have in your presence. It is the feeling that people get when they stumble onto what you have created. It is the holistic, integrated expression of you.</p>
<p> You need to know who you are so that your copy, your aesthetics and your tone each reflect your energy. What kind of experience do you want to give? One of the best ways to figure that out is to ask yourself what kind of experience you like to GET!</p>
<b> Knowing your truth and sharing it proudly is what turns passersby into raving fans. </b>
<p> This document is the bones, the core, the mecca of your soulful brand identity. It is the foundation upon which you will build your juicy, generous, cup filling empire. So, have fun, but be real. Do the work, but breathe deeply. This is the nurturing part of the journey; the first step to sharing your brilliance. Lets go deep.</p>

						
											<textarea name="paragraph" class="area_width" rows="10" ><?= $row['paragraph'] ?></textarea>

											<div class="form-group">

												<textarea name="juices" class="area_width" rows="3" ><?= $row['juices'] ?></textarea>

											<div class="form-group">

This section is about finding your sweet spot, your DNA (Divine/differentiating natural attributes) so we can start to position you in front of your audience in the most authentic, profitable, impactful way.</p>

                     <form action="#" id="formsubmit" role="form" class="form-horizontal form-material" method="post">
                    <div class="row">                                                         
                        <div class="col-md-12">
                     		<div class="panel panel-default">
                                <div class="panel-body">
								
								<p> This little tool is the start of brand alignment. Clarity+ Alignment= Conversion.</p>
<p>Our goal here is to find your brands SOUL and then fling the door wide open for the 
throngs of admirers/clients that are waiting for you to change their lives. </p>
<p> Make no mistake: your brand identity, your messaging, your story are all tied tightly together. They are all ingredients to your money recipe. And the most important point to remember is that they should all begin by being an extension of YOU. </p>
<p> But first, a note about alignment. Often times I come across clients that have a wonderful persona and are so eager and willing to help others and change the world. Their personality is warm and fuzzy and they exude an aura of confidence and peace. However, there have been times when I visited some of their websites and I can feel an immediate disconnect. Their websites does not do justice to their personalities and their business site offers a totally different feeling. Beginning from the opt-in sign to the text written there it felt like it was all about getting the clients on the hook, leading them from one page to next and constantly having pop-ups to sign up for this and that. The copy, the look, and feel, the energy just were not in alignment. Now I understood why she was spending so much time and money but still could not get people to sign up. The visitors came to the site but like me, they felt the disconnect and left in just a few seconds. She was losing so many opportunities. </p>
<p> Once you know who you are, what you stand for and how you want to make people feel, you can build an empire that speaks to your soul and to your tribe. </p>

													</tr>
													</table>
                                        	</div>
                                             
                                            
                                            <div class="form-group">
                                            	<label for="exampleInputEmail1">Are the values you outlined here expressed in your site copy?</label>
												<table width="100%">
												<tr>
												<td style="width:100px">
												<input type="radio" name="radio_expressed" value="Yes" checked />
													  Yes
													 <input type="radio" name="radio_expressed" value="No" />
													  No
													   </td>
													  <td>

                                                <span class="form-bar"></span>
												 </td>
													</tr>

                                        	</div>     
                                            
                                            <div class="form-group">

												<table width="100%">

												<td style="width:100px">
												<input type="radio" name="radio_aesthetics" value="Yes" checked />
													  Yes

													  No
													   </td>
													  <td>

                                                <span class="form-bar"></span>
												 </td>
													</tr>
													</table>
                                        	</div>   
                                            
                                            <div class="form-group">
                                            	<label for="exampleInputEmail1">Are the things you said you hate doing the things you are doing too much of right now?</label>

												<tr>
												<td style="width:100px">						
												<input type="radio" name="radio_doing" value="Yes" checked />
													  Yes
													 <input type="radio" name="radio_doing" value="No" />
													  No
													   </td>

												 </td>
													</tr>
													</table>
                                        	</div> 
											
											 <div class="form-group">
                                            	<label for="exampleInputEmail1">Is your business strategy supporting your personal preferences, schedule, and family or throwing you into a nasty tug of war between life and work? </label>
												<table width="100%">
												<tr>
												<td style="width:100px">
													<input type="radio" name="radio_strategy" value="Yes" checked />
													  Yes
													 <input type="radio" name="radio_strategy" value="No" />
													  No
													   </td>
													  <td>
													  <textarea name="strategy" class="area_width" rows="3" ></textarea>
                                                <span class="form-bar"></span>
												 </td>
													</tr>

                                        	</div> 
									
                                            
                                         
											<div class="form-group">
                                            	<label for="exampleInputEmail1">Is your brand an adequate representation of your soul?</label>
												<table width="100%">
												<tr>
												<td style="width:100px">
                                                    <input type="radio" name="radio_brand" value="Yes" checked />
													  Yes
													 <input type="radio" name="radio_brand" value="No" />
													  No
													   </td>
													  <td>
													  <textarea name="brand" class="area_width" rows="3"></textarea>
                                                <span class="form-bar"></span>
												 </td>
													</tr>
													</table>
                                        	</div> 
											
											
											<p> If not there is good news and bad news.</p>
<p> The bad news is, you are out of alignment. And you are not likely to grow to the level you want to grow to until you get back into balance and authenticity.</p>
<p> The good news is, this is all entirely fixable! To sum up. If you build it, they might come. If you build it, love it, nurture it, own it, consistently shout it, shine a light on it, share it with love and commit to it with unwavering faith and devotion  they will com and they will stay. </p>
<p>Here is to your beautiful, loved up vision, your courage and your willingness to play.</p>

						<h2 style="color:red">WHAT iS YOUR STORY?  What melts your butter? </h2>	
						
										<p> Stories sell. Think about it. What commercials and movies do you, love? The ones that tug at the heartstrings? The ones that remind you of a night out with friends? Or the ones that entertain you? They all have something in common. They tell a story that you can relate to. What follows is a series of exercises and questions meant to help you uncover the unique DNA (Divine and Natural Attributes) that drive you and your business. Do not get stuck in perfection. There are no right or wrong answers.</p>
<p> But here is what often happens: Jane decides she wants to start a business. She hires a mentor, starts the process, looks at a bunch of other websites to see what they are doing and then models her business after the most successful. That is great to a point. You WANT to follow a proven business model and that model has some universal traits that we all use. What you do not want is a copycat message. Audiences can smell a fake. But worse than that? You know when you are not being authentic. You know when you have fit yourself into a mold that does nott entirely match your naked, authentic self. What happens then is what I like to call soul fatigue. And it sucks. Not only that, 
but your fakeness will ring loud and clear. You cannot sustain a brand and message that is not authentically you. Just ask Milli Vanilli. =)</p>
<p> This is the time to uncover, embrace and live your truth. This is meant to be an exercise in self-awareness and alignment. You must know yourself before you can create a business that makes a huge impact. Your truth is as unique to you as your genetic makeup. It is what sets you apart. And when you embrace it, live it, and put it up in lights, you virtually eliminate competition by the very principle that NO one is exactly like you.</p> 
<p> Your brand story may never actually be totally spelled out with words. Yet, it's imperative that you know what it is. Confused? Let me explain. You may never sit and 
write out in a lengthy narrative the back story to your brand and then slap that narrative onto your homepage. However, when you, as the embodiment of your business, are crystal clear on what you stand for and why, lengthy narratives are not necessary. Your audience will come to know what you stand for; they will come to expect it from you. It is what makes you unforgettable. This is SOOOO important to remember. Your brand is NOT just a logo, or a font you put your name in or the colors on your site. Those things reflect your brand but they are not the core. Your brands core, your brands Soul is the experience you give to others. It is the experience that people have in your presence. It is the feeling that people get when they stumble onto what you have created. It is the holistic, integrated expression of you.</p>
<p> You need to know who you are so that your copy, your aesthetics and your tone each reflect your energy. What kind of experience do you want to give? One of the best ways to figure that out is to ask yourself what kind of experience you like to GET!</p>
<b> Knowing your truth and sharing it proudly is what turns passersby into raving fans. </b>
<p> This document is the bones, the core, the mecca of your soulful brand identity. It is the foundation upon which you will build your juicy, generous, cup filling empire. So, have fun, but be real. Do the work, but breathe deeply. This is the nurturing part of the journey; the first step to sharing your brilliance. Lets go deep.</p>

						
											<textarea name="paragraph" class="area_width" rows="10" ></textarea>

											<p>Full disclosure I believe that the common understanding of niche is stifling, limiting and a bunch of crap. You do not find your <p>niche, you CHOOSE it, based on the people you feel most energetically connected to.</p>
This section is about finding your sweet spot, your DNA (Divine/differentiating natural attributes) so we can start to position you in front of your audience in the most authentic, profitable, impactful way.</p>

											<h2 style="color:red">Your Epic Story </h2>
											<p>Every brand is really an epic love story. It begins as a whisper in your heart and culminates into an expansive, shared love with other human beings. The following questions are meant to help you tap into the story arc of your brand, it is global purpose, it is warm and fuzzy goals.</p>
											
											<div class="form-group">
                                            	<label for="exampleInputEmail1">If your brand were a celebrity, who would it be and why?</label>
												<textarea name="celebrity" class="area_width" rows="3" ></textarea>
                                                <span class="form-bar"></span>
                                        	</div> 
											<div class="form-group">
                                            	<label for="exampleInputEmail1">What are 3-5 of your favorite words?</label>
												<textarea name="fav_word" class="area_width" rows="3" ></textarea>
                                                <span class="form-bar"></span>
                                        	</div> 
											<div class="form-group">
                                            	<label for="exampleInputEmail1">What favorite quote sums up your brand?</label>
												<textarea name="quote" class="area_width" rows="3" ></textarea>
                                                <span class="form-bar"></span>
                                        	</div> 
											<div class="form-group">
                                            	<label for="exampleInputEmail1">If you had to sum up your business in just three words what would they be? (You are allowed to repeat =)</label>
												<textarea name="allowed" class="area_width" rows="3" ></textarea>
                                                <span class="form-bar"></span>
                                        	</div> 
											<div class="form-group">
                                            	<label for="exampleInputEmail1">If you had to sum up the problem you solve in just a few words, can you? (Tip- Explain what you do to my 5-year-old.)</label>
												<textarea name="problem" class="area_width" rows="3" ></textarea>
                                                <span class="form-bar"></span>
                                        	</div> 
											<div class="form-group">
                                            	<label for="exampleInputEmail1">What pisses you off?</label>
                                               
											<p style="color:red">Our greatest successes will stem from our willingness to fight for something. What pisses you off? I will go first. What pisses me off is seeing talented, brilliant, amazing women playing small and shrinking from their desire for a kick-ass life. It is why I do what I do. Your turn.</p>
											<textarea name="pisses" class="area_width" rows="3" ></textarea>
                                                <span class="form-bar"></span>
                                        	</div> 
											
											<div class="form-group">
                                            	<label for="exampleInputEmail1">What do you know for sure?</label>
												<p style="color:red">Your answer should be the thing you would stand up on the table and proclaim. It should be the thing that you will never stop believing, never stop shouting, never stop fighting for. What I know for sure is that the sweet life is readily available to each and every one of us and that with a blend of spirit, strategy, responsibility and mind mastery, everything can shift from rock bottom to blissed out. EVERY single one of us has the power to create a kick ass life. No one can convince me otherwise. Do not even try. =) So what do YOU know for sure?</p>
												<textarea name="for_sure" class="area_width" rows="3" ></textarea>
                                                <span class="form-bar"></span>
                                        	</div>
											
											<div class="form-group">
                                            	<label for="exampleInputEmail1">YOU are being introduced on a podcast or morning TV show. What are they saying?</label>
												<textarea name="introduced" class="area_width" rows="3" ></textarea>
                                                <span class="form-bar"></span>
                                        	</div>
											
											<div class="form-group">
                                            	<label for="exampleInputEmail1">LETS TALK LEGACY. Someone who sounds like Morgan Freeman is on stage giving you a lifetime achievement award. What is he saying? What do you want to be remembered for? </label>
												<textarea name="sounds" class="area_width" rows="3" ></textarea>
                                                <span class="form-bar"></span>
                                        	</div>
											<div class="form-group">

												1.	What is the specific promise of your program/product?</label><br/><br/>

                                        	</div>

                                   			 <input type="submit" name="delete" class="btn btn-default" value="Clear Form">

                                    		<input type="submit" name="save" value="save" style="margin-right:20px" class="btn btn-info pull-right"> 
                               			 </div>

                                    </div>
                                 </div>
                            </div>
                        
                    </form>
                      <?php } }else { ?> <a href="<?= base_url('coaching_session') ?>" class="btn btn-info">back</a> <?php  }?>
         
                    </div>
                </div>
                
                <!-- Modal HTML -->
    <div id="reportview" class="modal fade" tabindex="-1">
        <div class="modal-dialog">
            <div class="modal-content">
                <div class="modal-header">
                    <h5 class="modal-title">Your Form Was Successfully Submitted!</h5>
                    <!--<button type="button" class="close" data-dismiss="modal">&times;</button>-->
                </div>
                <div class="modal-body">
                    <!--<input type="text" id="formid">-->
                    <div class="text-center">
                    <a href="" target="_blank" id="formid" class="btn btn-info" >View</a>
                    <a href="" target="_blank" id="download" class="btn btn-warning" >Save</a>
                    </div>
                </div>
                <div class="modal-footer">
                    <button type="button" class="btn btn-secondary" data-dismiss="modal">Cancel</button>
                    <!--<button type="button" class="btn btn-primary">Save</button>-->
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
                <script>
                setTimeout(function(){ notification(); }, 3000);

                function notification(){
                    var user_id = "<?= $user_id ?>";
                    var form_name = "branding_exercise";
$.get("<?= base_url('Member/delete_notification') ?>/" + user_id+"/" + form_name, "", function (response) {
                console.log(response);
            });
                }
                
                $(document).ready(function(){
        $('#btnsubmit').click(function(){
        $('#formsubmit').submit(function(event){
            event.preventDefault();        
            $.ajax({
                url: "<?= base_url("member/branding_exercise_form") ?>",
                type: "post",
                // dataType: "JSON",
                data: new FormData(this),
                processData: false,
                contentType: false,
                success: function (responce)
                {
                    // console.log(responce);
                    $('#formid').attr("href","<?= base_url('member/marketingview/') ?>/branding_exercise/"+responce);
                    $("#download").attr("href","<?= base_url('member/marketingdownload') ?>/branding_exercise/"+responce);
                    $("#reportview").modal('show');
                },
                error: function (xhr, desc, err)
                {
        
        
                }
            });
        });
    });
    });
                </script>
                <!-- END PAGE CONTENT WRAPPER -->

        <script type="text/javascript" src="<?php echo base_url()."assets/";?>js/plugins/bootstrap/bootstrap.min.js"></script>        
        <!-- END PLUGINS -->

A-3 MODULE III: KNOW YOUR CLIENTS page View

application/controllers/member.php 
public function client_profile()

	{

		//for email notification get admin and coach detail

		$coach=$this->db->get_where('users',array('fld_id'=>$this->userid));

        if ($coach->num_rows()>0) {

        $row=$coach->row_array();



        $coachName = $row["fld_username"] . " " . $row["fld_last_name"];

        $coachemail = $row["fld_email"];

        $coachsparent_id = $row["fld_parent"];

        }



        $admin=$this->db->get_where('users',array('fld_id'=>$coachsparent_id));

        if ($admin->num_rows()>0) {

        $row=$admin->row_array();



        $adminName = $row["fld_username"] . " " . $row["fld_last_name"];

        $adminemail = $row["fld_email"];

        }

	

		$row = array();

        $successMsg = "";

        $errorMsg = "";

		$this->load->model('admin_model');

		$tbForm = $this->admin_model->get_coaching_forms($this->userid,'client_profile');

		if(sizeof($tbForm)>0){

			$row = $tbForm[0];

		}

        

		

			 if($this->input->post()){
			 	if ($this->input->post('delete')) 
{
	$this->db->delete('user_client_profile', array('fld_user_id' => $this->userid));
}
			 	if (isset($_POST['save'])) {

			 		$love_people = $_POST['love_people'];

		 $dominating = $_POST['dominating'];

		 $major_topic = $_POST['major_topic'];

		 $influence  = $_POST['influence'];

		 $like = $_POST['like'];

		 $standards = $_POST['standards'];

		 $learn = $_POST['learn'];

		 $contribute = $_POST['contribute'];

		 $smiling = $_POST['smiling'];

		 $environment = $_POST['environment'];

		 $protects = $_POST['protects'];

		 $behaviors = $_POST['behaviors'];

		 $people = $_POST['people'];

		 $current_client = $_POST['current_client'];

		 $Maanas = $_POST['Maanas'];

		 $sometimes = $_POST['sometimes'];

		 $reason_1 = $_POST['reason_1'];

		 $reason_2 = $_POST['reason_2'];

		 $reason_3 = $_POST['reason_3'];

		 $reason_4 = $_POST['reason_4'];

		 $reason_5 = $_POST['reason_5'];

		 $honest = $_POST['honest'];

		 $stop = $_POST['stop'];

		 $filter_1 = $_POST['filter_1'];

		 $filter_2 = $_POST['filter_2'];

		 $filter_3 = $_POST['filter_3'];

		 $filter_4 = $_POST['filter_4'];

		 $filter_5 = $_POST['filter_5'];

		 $filter_6 = $_POST['filter_6'];

		 $filter_7 = $_POST['filter_7'];

		 $filter_8 = $_POST['filter_8'];

		 $filter_9 = $_POST['filter_9'];

		 $ideal_1 = $_POST['ideal_1'];

		 $ideal_2 = $_POST['ideal_2'];

		 $ideal_3 = $_POST['ideal_3'];

		 $ideal_4 = $_POST['ideal_4'];

		 $ideal_5 = $_POST['ideal_5'];

		 $maybe_1  = $_POST['maybe_1'];

		 $maybe_2 = $_POST['maybe_2'];

		 $maybe_3 = $_POST['maybe_3'];

		 $maybe_4 = $_POST['maybe_4'];

		 $maybe_5 = $_POST['maybe_5'];

		 $other_1 = $_POST['other_1'];

		 $other_2 = $_POST['other_2'];

		 $other_3 = $_POST['other_3'];

		 $other_4 = $_POST['other_4'];

		 $other_5 = $_POST['other_5'];

		 $ideas = $_POST['ideas'];

		 $Contemplate = $_POST['Contemplate'];

		 $left_brain = $_POST['left_brain'];

		 $enrollment = $_POST['enrollment'];

		 $challenge = $_POST['challenge'];

		 $connecting = $_POST['connecting'];

		 $excited = $_POST['excited'];

		 $client_feel = $_POST['client_feel'];

		 



              

                 $newData = array(

		 					   

							   'love_people' => $love_people,			              

							   'dominating'   => $dominating,			              

							   'major_topic' => $major_topic,			              

							   'influence ' => $influence,			              

							   'like' => $like,			              

							   'standards' => $standards,			              

							   'learn' => $learn,			              

							   'contribute' => $contribute,			              

							   'smiling' => $smiling,			              

							   'environment' => $environment,			              

							   'protects' => $protects,			              

							   'behaviors' => $behaviors,			              

							   'people' => $people,			              

							   'current_client' => $current_client,			              

							   'Maanas' => $Maanas,			              

							   'sometimes' => $sometimes,			              

							   'reason_1' => $reason_1,	

							   'reason_2' => $reason_2,

							   'reason_3' => $reason_3,

							   'reason_4' => $reason_4,

							   'reason_5' => $reason_5,		              

							   'honest' => $honest,			               

							   'stop' => $stop,

							   'filter_1' => $filter_1,

							   'filter_2' => $filter_2,

							   'filter_3' => $filter_3,

							   'filter_4' => $filter_4,

							   'filter_5' => $filter_5,

							   'filter_6' => $filter_6,

							   'filter_7' => $filter_7,

							   'filter_8' => $filter_8,

							   'filter_9' => $filter_9,			              

							   'ideal_1' => $ideal_1,

							   'ideal_2' => $ideal_2,

							   'ideal_3' => $ideal_3,			              

							   'ideal_4' => $ideal_4,

							   'ideal_5' => $ideal_5,

							   'maybe_1' => $maybe_1,	

							   'maybe_2' => $maybe_2,

							   'maybe_3' => $maybe_3,

							   'maybe_4' => $maybe_4,

							   'maybe_5' => $maybe_5,		              

							   'other_1' => $other_1,

							   'other_2' => $other_2,

							   'other_3' => $other_3,

							   'other_4' => $other_4,

							   'other_5' => $other_5,			              

							   'ideas' => $ideas,			              

							   'Contemplate' => $Contemplate,			              

							   'left_brain' => $left_brain,			              

							   'enrollment' => $enrollment,			              

							   'challenge' => $challenge,			              

							   'connecting' => $connecting,			              

							   'excited' => $excited,			              

							   'client_feel' => $client_feel,			   	

							   'fld_user_id' => $this->userid,		              						

							   'fld_added_date' =>time()

							  );

			 		$fill=$this->db->get_where('user_client_profile',array('fld_user_id'=>$this->userid));

                    if ($fill->num_rows()>0) 

                    {

                        $this->db->where('fld_user_id',$this->userid);

					    $this->db->update('user_client_profile',$newData);

                        if($query){

                            echo "<div   class=\"alert alert-success\">Form save Successfully!<a href=\"#\" class=\"close\" data-dismiss=\"alert\" aria-label=\"close\">&times;</a></div>";

                        }

                    }else

                    {

                        $query = $this->db->insert('user_client_profile', $newData); 

                        $last_id = $this->db->insert_id();  

                        if($query){

                            echo "<div   class=\"alert alert-success\">Form save Successfully!<a href=\"#\" class=\"close\" data-dismiss=\"alert\" aria-label=\"close\">&times;</a></div>";

                        }   

                    }

			 	}

          if(isset($_POST['submit'])){

                  $love_people = $_POST['love_people'];

		 $dominating = $_POST['dominating'];

		 $major_topic = $_POST['major_topic'];

		 $influence  = $_POST['influence'];

		 $like = $_POST['like'];

		 $standards = $_POST['standards'];

		 $learn = $_POST['learn'];

		 $contribute = $_POST['contribute'];

		 $smiling = $_POST['smiling'];

		 $environment = $_POST['environment'];

		 $protects = $_POST['protects'];

		 $behaviors = $_POST['behaviors'];

		 $people = $_POST['people'];

		 $current_client = $_POST['current_client'];

		 $Maanas = $_POST['Maanas'];

		 $sometimes = $_POST['sometimes'];

		 $reason = '<br/>1. '.$_POST['reason_1'].'<br/><br/>2. '.$_POST['reason_2'].'<br/><br/>3. '.$_POST['reason_3'].'<br/><br/>4. '.$_POST['reason_4'].'<br/><br/>5. '.$_POST['reason_5'];

		 $honest = $_POST['honest'];

		 $stop = $_POST['stop'];

		 $filter = '<br/>1. '.$_POST['filter_1'].'<br/><br/>2. '.$_POST['filter_2'].'<br/><br/>3. '.$_POST['filter_3'].'<br/><br/>4. '.$_POST['filter_4'].'<br/><br/>5. '.$_POST['filter_5'].'<br/><br/>6. '.$_POST['filter_6'].'<br/><br/>7. '.$_POST['filter_7'].'<br/><br/>8. '.$_POST['filter_8'].'<br/><br/>9. '.$_POST['filter_9'];

		 $ideal = '<br/>1. '.$_POST['ideal_1'].'<br/><br/>2. '.$_POST['ideal_2'].'<br/><br/>3. '.$_POST['ideal_3'].'<br/><br/>4. '.$_POST['ideal_4'].'<br/><br/>5. '.$_POST['ideal_5'];

		 $maybe  = '<br/>1. '.$_POST['maybe_1'].'<br/><br/>2.'.$_POST['maybe_2'].'<br/><br/>3.'.$_POST['maybe_3'].'<br/><br/>4.'.$_POST['maybe_4'].'<br/><br/>5.'.$_POST['maybe_5'];

		 $other = '<br/>1. '.$_POST['other_1'].'<br/><br/>2. '.$_POST['other_2'].'<br/><br/>3. '.$_POST['other_3'].'<br/><br/>4. '.$_POST['other_4'].'<br/><br/>5. '.$_POST['other_5'];

		 $ideas = $_POST['ideas'];

		 $Contemplate = $_POST['Contemplate'];

		 $left_brain = $_POST['left_brain'];

		 $enrollment = $_POST['enrollment'];

		 $challenge = $_POST['challenge'];

		 $connecting = $_POST['connecting'];

		 $excited = $_POST['excited'];

		 $client_feel = $_POST['client_feel'];

		 



              

                 $newData = array(

		 					   

							   'love_people' => $love_people,			              

							   'dominating'   => $dominating,			              

							   'major_topic' => $major_topic,			              

							   'influence ' => $influence,			              

							   'like' => $like,			              

							   'standards' => $standards,			              

							   'learn' => $learn,			              

							   'contribute' => $contribute,			              

							   'smiling' => $smiling,			              

							   'environment' => $environment,			              

							   'protects' => $protects,

							   'people' => $people,

							   'Maanas' => $Maanas,			              

							   'sometimes' => $sometimes,

							   'honest' => $honest,			               

							   'stop' => $stop,

							   'filter' => $filter,			              

							   'ideal' => $ideal,			              

							   'maybe' => $maybe,			              

							   'other' => $other,			              

							   'ideas' => $ideas,			              

							   'Contemplate' => $Contemplate,			              

							   'left_brain' => $left_brain,			              

							   'enrollment' => $enrollment,			              

							   'challenge' => $challenge,			              

							   'connecting' => $connecting,			              

							   'excited' => $excited,			              

							   'client_feel' => $client_feel,

							   'fld_added_date' =>time()

							  );

                       $query = $this->db->insert('client_profile', $newData); 

                        $last_id = $this->db->insert_id();

						if($query){

	$massage = "<head><meta http-equiv='Content-Type' content='text/html; charset=windows-1252'><meta name='GENERATOR' content='MSHTML 11.00.10570.1001'<body bgcolor='#ffffff'><strong></strong><strong> </strong><strong></strong><table width='600' align='center' id='TbHeader' bgcolor='#400080' border='0' cellspacing='0' cellpadding='4'><tr><td align='center' id='TdHeader' bgcolor='#400080'><p align='center'><font color='#ffffff' face='Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif' size='6'><strong>Welcome</strong></font></p></td></tr></table><table width='600' align='center' id='TbBodyRow' border='0' cellspacing='0' cellpadding='0'><tr><td id='TdBodyRow' valign='top' bgcolor='#ffffff'><table width='100%' id='TbBody' bgcolor='#ffffff' border='0' cellspacing='0' cellpadding='4'><tr><td align='center' id='TdBody' bgcolor='#ffffff'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<p align='left'><font color='#000000' face='Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif' size='3'><strong>Hi ".$adminName."&nbsp;<font color='#000000' face='Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif' size='3'>&nbsp;</font></strong></font>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</p><p align='justify' style='margin-right: 0px;'><font color='#000000' face='Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif' size='3'>This is an auto-generated email to notify you that your client ".$coachName." has filled and submitted the form <b>\"A-3 Client profile\"</b> on MyportalX.<br><br>Please check out your client reports on MyportalX.</font></p><br></font></font></font></p><p align='left'><br></p></td></tr></table></td></tr></table><strong></strong><strong></strong><strong> </strong><table width='600' align='center' id='TbFooter' bgcolor='#eea000' border='0' cellspacing='0' cellpadding='4'><tr><td align='center' id='TdFooter' bgcolor='#eea000'><div style='margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);'><div style='margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);'><span style='color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-size: inherit; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;'><span style='color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;'><br></span></span></div><div style='margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);'><span style='color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-size: inherit; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;'><span style='color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;'>Regards,</span><br style='color: rgb(0, 52, 89);'></span></div><div style='margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);'><span style='color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;'>Team MyportalX</span></div><div style='margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);'><span style='color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;'><br></span></div></div></td></tr></table>";       

                 $subject = "Form Submitted";

                 $header = "From:" . $this->config->item('mail_from') . "\r\n";

                 $header .= "MIME-Version: 1.0\r\n";

                 $header .= "Content-type: text/html\r\n";

                 $retval = mail ($adminemail,$subject,$massage,$header);



         $nots=array(

            'sender_id' => $this->userid,

            'reciver_id' => $coachsparent_id,

            'message' => $coachName.", Filled-Up and submitted <b style='color:#4e73df'>\"client profile\"</b> Form Today.",

            'urls' => "mreport/".$this->userid,

            'fld_date' => time()

         );



         $this->db->insert('notification',$nots);

						 echo "<div   class=\"alert alert-success\">Form Submitted Successfully!<a href=\"#\" class=\"close\" data-dismiss=\"alert\" aria-label=\"close\">&times;</a></div>";

						}

		

			if($this->db->affected_rows()){

                    $updateData = array(

                        'completed_date' => time(),

                        'status' => "1",

                        'last_modified' => date('Y-m-d H:i:s')

                    );

                    $this->db->where(array('fld_form_id' => $row->id,  'fld_user_id' =>$this->userid));

                    $this->db->update('marketing_form_user',$updateData);  

                     $successMsg = "Form Submitted Successfully!";  

                    

                    //get the updated row

                    $tbForm = $this->admin_model->get_coaching_forms($this->userid,'client_profile');

                    if(sizeof($tbForm)>0){

                        $row = $tbForm[0];

                    }

                }

			}

		}

		

		

		if($this->db->affected_rows()){

					$insertFormPossition=array(

						   'fld_user_id' => $this->userid,

						   'fld_client_profile' => '1'

						   //'fld_added_date' => time()

						   );

						   $userExist=$this->Common_model->user_exist_form_possition($this->userid);

						   if($userExist){

							   $this->db->where('fld_user_id',$this->userid);

							   $this->db->update('form_possition',$insertFormPossition);

						   }else{

							  $this->db->insert('form_possition',$insertFormPossition); 

						   }

			    

	 

				}else{

					echo "Database Error.";



 }

		

		

        $data = array("Form" => $row,

             "Error_Message" => $errorMsg,

              "Success_Message" => $successMsg

        );

	

	$this->load->view('member/client_profile', $data);

	}

event page View

application/views/member/client_profile.php 
 <?php
$this->load->view('member/sidebar');
$session= $this->session->get_userdata();
$user_id=$session['user_id'];
 $completed="";
error_reporting(0);

$user=$this->db->get_where('users',array('fld_id'=>$user_id));
        if ($user->num_rows()>0) {
        $row=$user->row_array();

        $memberName = $row["fld_first_name"] . " " . $row["fld_last_name"];
        $memberemail = $row["fld_email"];
        $membersparent_id = $row["fld_parent"];
        }

        $coach=$this->db->get_where('users',array('fld_id'=>$membersparent_id));
        if ($coach->num_rows()>0) {
        $row=$coach->row_array();

        $coachName = $row["fld_first_name"] . " " . $row["fld_last_name"];
        $coachemail = $row["fld_email"];
        }
?>

                </ul>
                <!-- END BREADCRUMB -->

                </div>
                <!-- END PAGE TITLE -->                
                 <div class="page-content-wrap">
                    <?php if ($Form->completed_date == ""){
