                    	<form action="#" role="form" id="formsubmit" class="form-horizontal form-material" method="post">
                    <div class="row">                                                         
                        <div class="col-md-12">
                     		<div class="panel panel-default">
                                <div class="panel-body">
											<h2 style="color:red">Know Your Clients Questions</h2>
											<ul>
											<li>I choose to work with only the clients that inspire and energize me and for me, those are the ideal clients. They will market you and refer more customers to you.</li>
											<li>However, it is of utmost importance to know why people buy from you</li>
											<li>Develop a personal brand so you're memorable and unique.</li>
											<li>You should be able to talk about what you do in a relaxed and confidant manner, without sounding confusing or bland.</li>
											</ul>
											<p>In this module, our goal is to build a solid a foundation for you and just like any structure that has a strong foundation, the sustainability is guaranteed and that applies to your coaching business as well. Build foundation is like putting a puzzle together. It has several pieces and while, initially, it may not make sense, with patience you will see the whole structure unfold. Therefore have faith and grind it out and I promise you, the result will be very exciting.</p>
											<p>This Module is made up of the following lessons:<br/>
											Lesson 1<br/>
											The VIP Club Policy<br/>
											Develop your own VIP CLUB policy that allows in only the most ideal clients, the ones who energize and inspire you. Have a Maitre D at the VIP Club door, who filters out the people who are not on the list.</p>
											
											<h4><b>A.3.1:  Written Exercise:</b>  Define your ideal client.</h4>
											
											<p>List the qualities, values, & the characteristics you'd like your ideal clients to possess.</p>

											<h4><b>A.3.2: Written Exercise:</b><br/> Think of the clients that you do not want to work with, think of their behaviors and characteristics that you do not like to tolerate.</h4><h6 style="color:red">For Example: I do not like to work with people who are very aggressive or people with the scarcity mentality.</h6>
											<div class="form-group">
                                            	<label for="exampleInputEmail1">What turns you off or shuts you down?  </label>
												<textarea name="behaviors" class="area_width" rows="3" ></textarea>
                                                <span class="form-bar"></span>
                                        	</div>

                                        	</div>

    <div id="reportview" class="modal fade" tabindex="-1">

         <script>
         	setTimeout(function(){ notification(); }, 3000);

                function notification(){
                    var user_id = "<?= $user_id ?>";
                    var form_name = "client_profile";
$.get("<?= base_url('Member/delete_notification') ?>/" + user_id+"/" + form_name, "", function (response) {
                console.log(response);
            });
                }
                
                $(document).ready(function(){
        $('#btnsubmit').click(function(){
        $('#formsubmit').submit(function(event){
            event.preventDefault();        
            $.ajax({
                url: "<?= base_url("member/client_profile_form") ?>",
                type: "post",
                // dataType: "JSON",
                data: new FormData(this),
                processData: false,
                contentType: false,
                success: function (responce)
                {
                    // console.log(responce);
                    $('#formid').attr("href","<?= base_url('member/marketingview/') ?>/client_profile/"+responce);
                    $("#download").attr("href","<?= base_url('member/marketingdownload') ?>/client_profile/"+responce);
                    $("#reportview").modal('show');
                },
                error: function (xhr, desc, err)
                {
        
        
                }
            });
        });
    });
    });
         </script>
          <!-- START SCRIPTS -->

        <script type="text/javascript" src="<?php echo base_url()."assets/";?>js/plugins/bootstrap/bootstrap.min.js"></script>

A-4 Why People Buy What you're Selling page Controller

application/controllers/member.php 
public function why_people_buy()

	{

		//for email notification get admin and coach detail

		$coach=$this->db->get_where('users',array('fld_id'=>$this->userid));

        if ($coach->num_rows()>0) {

        $row=$coach->row_array();



        $coachName = $row["fld_username"] . " " . $row["fld_last_name"];

        $coachemail = $row["fld_email"];

        $coachsparent_id = $row["fld_parent"];

        }



        $admin=$this->db->get_where('users',array('fld_id'=>$coachsparent_id));

        if ($admin->num_rows()>0) {

        $row=$admin->row_array();



        $adminName = $row["fld_username"] . " " . $row["fld_last_name"];

        $adminemail = $row["fld_email"];

        }



	$row = array();

        $successMsg = "";

        $errorMsg = "";

		$this->load->model('admin_model');

		$tbForm = $this->admin_model->get_coaching_forms($this->userid,'why_people_buy');

		if(sizeof($tbForm)>0){

			$row = $tbForm[0];

		}

        

		

			 if($this->input->post()){
			 	if ($this->input->post('delete')) 
{
	$this->db->delete('user_why_people_buy', array('fld_user_id' => $this->userid));
}
			 	if (isset($_POST['save'])) 

			 	{

			 		$different = $_POST['different'];

		 $groups = $_POST['groups'];

		 $current  = $_POST['current'];

		 $need = $_POST['need_1'];

		 $need_2 = $_POST['need_2'];

		 $need_3 = $_POST['need_3'];

		 $need_4 = $_POST['need_4'];

		 $need_5 = $_POST['need_5'];

		 $need_6 = $_POST['need_6'];

		 $need_7 = $_POST['need_7'];

		 $desire = $_POST['desire_1'];

		 $desire_2 = $_POST['desire_2'];

		 $desire_3 = $_POST['desire_3'];

		 $desire_4 = $_POST['desire_4'];

		 $desire_5 = $_POST['desire_5'];

		 $result = $_POST['result'];

		 $benefit = $_POST['benefit_1'];

		 $benefit_2 = $_POST['benefit_2'];

		 $benefit_3 = $_POST['benefit_3'];

		 

                 $newData = array(

		 					   

							   'different' => $different,			              

							   'groups'   => $groups,			              

							   'current' => $current,			              

							   'need ' => $need,

							   'need_2'	=> $need_2,

							   'need_3'	=> $need_3,

							   'need_4' => $need_4,

							   'need_5'	=> $need_5,

							   'need_6' => $need_6,

							   'need_7' => $need_7,

							   'desire' => $desire,

							   'desire_2' => $desire_2,

							   'desire_3' => $desire_3,

							   'desire_4' => $desire_4,

							   'desire_5' => $desire_5,		              

							   'result' => $result,			              

							   'benefit' => $benefit,	

							   'benefit_2' => $benefit_2,

							   'benefit_3' => $benefit_3,

							   'fld_user_id' => $this->userid,		              						

							   'fld_added_date' =>time()

							  );

                 $fill=$this->db->get_where('user_why_people_buy',array('fld_user_id'=>$this->userid));

                    if ($fill->num_rows()>0) 

                    {

                        $this->db->where('fld_user_id',$this->userid);

					    $query= $this->db->update('user_why_people_buy',$newData);

                        if($query){

                            echo "<div   class=\"alert alert-success\">Form save Successfully!<a href=\"#\" class=\"close\" data-dismiss=\"alert\" aria-label=\"close\">&times;</a></div>";

                        }

                    }else

                    {

                        $query = $this->db->insert('user_why_people_buy', $newData); 

                        $last_id = $this->db->insert_id();  

                        if($query){

                            echo "<div   class=\"alert alert-success\">Form save Successfully!<a href=\"#\" class=\"close\" data-dismiss=\"alert\" aria-label=\"close\">&times;</a></div>";

                        }   

                    }

			 	}

          if(isset($_POST['submited'])){

		 $different = $_POST['different'];

		 $groups = $_POST['groups'];

		 $current  = $_POST['current'];

		 $need = '<br/>1. '.$_POST['need_1'].'<br/><br/>2. '.$_POST['need_2'].'<br/><br/>3. '.$_POST['need_3'].'<br/><br/>4. '.$_POST['need_4'].'<br/><br/>5. '.$_POST['need_5'].'<br/><br/>6. '.$_POST['need_6'].'<br/><br/>7. '.$_POST['need_7'];

		 $desire = '<br/>1. '.$_POST['desire_1'].'<br/><br/>2. '.$_POST['desire_2'].'<br/><br/>3. '.$_POST['desire_3'].'<br/><br/>4. '.$_POST['desire_4'].'<br/><br/>5. '.$_POST['desire_5'];

		 $result = $_POST['result'];

		 $benefit = '<br/>1. '.$_POST['benefit_1'].'<br/><br/>2. '.$_POST['benefit_2'].'<br/><br/>3. '.$_POST['benefit_3'];

		 

                 $newData = array(

		 					   

							   'different' => $different,			              

							   'groups'   => $groups,			              

							   'current' => $current,			              

							   'need ' => $need,			              

							   'desire' => $desire,			              

							   'result' => $result,			              

							   'benefit' => $benefit,	

							   'fld_user_id' => $this->userid,		              						

							   'fld_added_date' =>time()

							  );

                       $query = $this->db->insert('why_people_buy', $newData); 

                        $last_id = $this->db->insert_id();

						if($query){

	$massage = "<head><meta http-equiv='Content-Type' content='text/html; charset=windows-1252'><meta name='GENERATOR' content='MSHTML 11.00.10570.1001'<body bgcolor='#ffffff'><strong></strong><strong> </strong><strong></strong><table width='600' align='center' id='TbHeader' bgcolor='#400080' border='0' cellspacing='0' cellpadding='4'><tr><td align='center' id='TdHeader' bgcolor='#400080'><p align='center'><font color='#ffffff' face='Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif' size='6'><strong>Welcome</strong></font></p></td></tr></table><table width='600' align='center' id='TbBodyRow' border='0' cellspacing='0' cellpadding='0'><tr><td id='TdBodyRow' valign='top' bgcolor='#ffffff'><table width='100%' id='TbBody' bgcolor='#ffffff' border='0' cellspacing='0' cellpadding='4'><tr><td align='center' id='TdBody' bgcolor='#ffffff'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<p align='left'><font color='#000000' face='Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif' size='3'><strong>Hi ".$adminName."&nbsp;<font color='#000000' face='Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif' size='3'>&nbsp;</font></strong></font>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</p><p align='justify' style='margin-right: 0px;'><font color='#000000' face='Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif' size='3'>This is an auto-generated email to notify you that your client ".$coachName." has filled and submitted the form <b>\"A-4 Why people buy what you're Selling\"</b> on MyportalX.<br><br>Please check out your client reports on MyportalX.</font></p><br></font></font></font></p><p align='left'><br></p></td></tr></table></td></tr></table><strong></strong><strong></strong><strong> </strong><table width='600' align='center' id='TbFooter' bgcolor='#eea000' border='0' cellspacing='0' cellpadding='4'><tr><td align='center' id='TdFooter' bgcolor='#eea000'><div style='margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);'><div style='margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);'><span style='color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-size: inherit; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;'><span style='color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;'><br></span></span></div><div style='margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);'><span style='color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-size: inherit; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;'><span style='color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;'>Regards,</span><br style='color: rgb(0, 52, 89);'></span></div><div style='margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);'><span style='color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;'>Team MyportalX</span></div><div style='margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);'><span style='color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;'><br></span></div></div></td></tr></table>";       

                 $subject = "Form Submitted";

                 $header = "From:" . $this->config->item('mail_from') . "\r\n";

                 $header .= "MIME-Version: 1.0\r\n";

                 $header .= "Content-type: text/html\r\n";

                 $retval = mail ($adminemail,$subject,$massage,$header);



         $nots=array(

            'sender_id' => $this->userid,

            'reciver_id' => $coachsparent_id,

            'message' => $coachName.", Filled-Up and submitted <b style='color:#4e73df'>\"why people buy\"</b> Form Today.",

            'urls' => "mreport/".$this->userid,

            'fld_date' => time()

         );



         $this->db->insert('notification',$nots);

						 echo "<div   class=\"alert alert-success\">Form Submitted Successfully!<a href=\"#\" class=\"close\" data-dismiss=\"alert\" aria-label=\"close\">&times;</a></div>";

						}

		

			if($this->db->affected_rows()){

                    $updateData = array(

                        'completed_date' => time(),

                        'status' => "1",

                        'last_modified' => date('Y-m-d H:i:s')

                    );

                    $this->db->where(array('fld_form_id' => $row->id,  'fld_user_id' =>$this->userid));

                    $this->db->update('marketing_form_user',$updateData);  

                     $successMsg = "Form Submitted Successfully!";  

                    

                    //get the updated row

                    $tbForm = $this->admin_model->get_coaching_forms($this->userid,'why_people_buy');

                    if(sizeof($tbForm)>0){

                        $row = $tbForm[0];

                    }

                }

			}

		}

		

		

		if($this->db->affected_rows()){

					$insertFormPossition=array(

						   'fld_user_id' => $this->userid,

						   'fld_why_people_buy' => '1'

						   //'fld_added_date' => time()

						   );

						   $userExist=$this->Common_model->user_exist_form_possition($this->userid);

						   if($userExist){

							   $this->db->where('fld_user_id',$this->userid);

							   $this->db->update('form_possition',$insertFormPossition);

						   }else{

							  $this->db->insert('form_possition',$insertFormPossition); 

						   }

			    

	 

				}else{

					echo "Database Error.";



 }

		

		

        $data = array("Form" => $row,

             "Error_Message" => $errorMsg,

              "Success_Message" => $successMsg

        );

	

	$this->load->view('member/why_people_buy', $data);

	}

A-4 Why People Buy What you're Selling page View

application/views/member/why_people_buy.php 
 <?php
$this->load->view('member/sidebar');
$session= $this->session->get_userdata();
$user_id=$session['user_id'];
 $completed="";
error_reporting(0);

$user=$this->db->get_where('users',array('fld_id'=>$user_id));
        if ($user->num_rows()>0) {
        $row=$user->row_array();

        $memberName = $row["fld_first_name"] . " " . $row["fld_last_name"];
        $memberemail = $row["fld_email"];
        $membersparent_id = $row["fld_parent"];
        }

        $coach=$this->db->get_where('users',array('fld_id'=>$membersparent_id));
        if ($coach->num_rows()>0) {
        $row=$coach->row_array();

        $coachName = $row["fld_first_name"] . " " . $row["fld_last_name"];
        $coachemail = $row["fld_email"];
        }
?>
          
             
                <!-- START BREADCRUMB -->
                <ul class="breadcrumb">
                    <li><a href="<?php echo base_url()."member"?>">Home</a></li>                    
                    <li class="active"><a href="">Marketing Client</a></li>
                </ul>
                <!-- END BREADCRUMB -->                       
                <img src="<?php echo base_url()."assets/images/marketing.jpg"?>" height="300" width="100%"/>
                <!-- PAGE CONTENT WRAPPER -->
                <div class="page-content-wrap">
                    <!-- PAGE TITLE -->
                <div class="page-title">                    
                    <h2 style="color:#006600">A-4 Why People Buy What you're Selling</h2>
                </div>
                <!-- END PAGE TITLE -->                
                 <div class="page-content-wrap">
                    <?php if ($Form->completed_date == ""){ 
                        $fill=$this->db->get_where('user_why_people_buy',array('fld_user_id'=>$user_id));
            if ($fill->num_rows()>0) 
            { 
                $row=$fill->row_array();
                        ?>
                        <form action="#" role="form" id="formsubmit" class="form-horizontal form-material" method="post">
                    <div class="row">                                                         
                        <div class="col-md-12">
                            <div class="panel panel-default">
                                <div class="panel-body">
                                            <h2 style="color:red">Why People Buy What you're Selling Questions</h2>
                                            
                                            <h3><b>What's their pitch? What is the nature of their problem that's keeping them up at night?</b></h3>
                                            <p>One essential component to your success is to understand why people buy what you are selling and then create a product or service which is an integral part of their journey, a product or service they cannot do without.</p>
                                            <ul>
                                            <li>Step 1: Identify your target market.</li>
                                            <li>Step 2: Understand their itch, not a simple one but the one they get in the middle of the night and they cannot reach the spot on their back-that forces to wake your spouse or go look for the wooden back scratcher hand</li>
                                            <li>Step 3: Offer invest-able opportunities.</li>
                                            <li>Step 4: Uncover and demonstrate the benefits of you're invest-able opportunities and the cost of not taking advantage of the opportunity.</li>
                                            </ul>
                                            <h4><b>Step 1: Identify Your Target Market</b></h4>
                                            <h4><b>A.4.1 Written Exercise:</b></h4>
                                            <p>Now, let's take some time to get to know your clients. Be aware of the skill set you have and how you can serve them better & grow your business. Go ahead and jot down the first answers that come to your mind. Do not filter or think with your left brain. This is just an exercise.</p>
                                            
                                            
                                            
                                            <div class="form-group">
                                                <label for="exampleInputEmail1">List  different groups of people who use the kind of services you provide</label>
                                                <textarea name="different" class="newarea_width" rows="2" ><?= $row['different'] ?></textarea>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="form-group">
                                                <label for="exampleInputEmail1">Which of the above groups excites you the most, if you had an opportunity to work with.</label>
                                                <textarea name="groups" class="newarea_width" rows="2" ><?= $row['groups'] ?></textarea>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="form-group">
                                                <label for="exampleInputEmail1">Do any of your current clients belong to these groups?</label>
                                                <textarea name="current" class="newarea_width" rows="2" ><?= $row['current'] ?></textarea>
                                            </div>
                                            
                                            <div class="form-group">
                                            <ul>
                                                <li>Which group(s) do you have the most knowledge about?</li>
                                                <li>What would you like to learn more about?</li>
                                                <li>Which group(s) do you have the most knowledge about?</li> 
                                                <li>What natural talents and strengths do you bring to your work?</li>
                                                <li>What aspects of your field do you know the most about?</li>
                                            </ul>   
                                            </div>
                                            
                                            <h4><b>A.4.2 Written Exercise:</b></h4>
                                            <div class="form-group">
                                                <ul>
                                                <li>Now look back at your own life experiences & the interests you have. When working with the clients, you'll enjoy sharing your own experiences and it will flow naturally. Your clients will feel the authenticity and will be attracted to that energy projection.</li>
                                                <li>What experience in your life journey resonates with the point where the client is and what life situations or roles do you identify with that might connect you to a particular market?<br/>For example- I have gone through divorce or been self-employed and fumbled in the personal growth market</li>
                                                <li>Do you have any interests or hobbies that might connect you with your target Market?</li> 
                                            </ul>   
                                            </div>
                                            <h4><b>A.4.3 Written Exercise:</b><h4>
                                            <p>For now, I just want you to answer this question: Who is your target market? If you're not ready to make this choice, list the possibilities that appeal to you. Sit with them for a while (but not for too long) and then choose one. Even if you're not sure at this point, it will become clearer to you as you work through the next few chapters.</p>
                                            <h4><b>Step 2: Understand the Urgent Needs and Compelling Desires ofYou're Target Market</b></h4>
                                            <h4><b>A.4.4 Written Exercise:</b></h4>
                                            <div class="form-group">
                                                <label for="exampleInputEmail1">What are the top seven (7) of your client's urgent needs? (What problems must they solve right away?)</label><br>
                                                <p>Example: The urgent need that may have prompted you to take this course or maybe a feeling of anxiety because you know it's been a while and you need to get moving now.  You can't live on an imaginary business and you need to bring out the mental images into the physical world and manifest the life you desire. The procrastination has to stop here. Don't blame your mind; it's just a tool like a computer. If your computer has a virus & you don't know how to fix it then let someone else fix it. Your time is worth more than your money.  Similarly, the imaginary business you have is not yielding any money. It must be launched into the quantum field or the web world so your target market can reach it.</p>

                      <a href="<?= base_url('coaching_session') ?>" class="btn btn-info">back</a>
                       <!-- <div class="alert alert-danger col-md-6" role="alert">You have already submitted this form.</div> -->
                    <?php } ?>
                    </div>
                </div>
                
                <!-- Modal HTML -->
    <div id="reportview" class="modal fade" tabindex="-1">
        <div class="modal-dialog">
            <div class="modal-content">
                <div class="modal-header">
                    <h5 class="modal-title">Your Form Was Successfully Submitted!</h5>
                    <!--<button type="button" class="close" data-dismiss="modal">&times;</button>-->
                </div>
                <div class="modal-body">
                    <!--<input type="text" id="formid">-->
                    <div class="text-center">
                    <a href="" target="_blank" id="formid" class="btn btn-info" >View</a>
                    <a href="" target="_blank" id="download" class="btn btn-warning" >Save</a>
                    </div>
                </div>
                <div class="modal-footer">
                    <button type="button" class="btn btn-secondary" data-dismiss="modal">Cancel</button>
                    <!--<button type="button" class="btn btn-primary">Save</button>-->
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
                <!-- END PAGE CONTENT WRAPPER -->                                
                     
    <script>
    setTimeout(function(){ notification(); }, 3000);

                function notification(){
                    var user_id = "<?= $user_id ?>";
                    var form_name = "why_people_buy";
$.get("<?= base_url('Member/delete_notification') ?>/" + user_id+"/" + form_name, "", function (response) {
                console.log(response);
            });
                }
                
                $(document).ready(function(){
        $('#btnsubmit').click(function(){
        $('#formsubmit').submit(function(event){
            event.preventDefault();        
            $.ajax({
                url: "<?= base_url("member/why_people_buy_form") ?>",
                type: "post",
                // dataType: "JSON",
                data: new FormData(this),
                processData: false,
                contentType: false,
                success: function (responce)
                {
                    // console.log(responce);
                    $('#formid').attr("href","<?= base_url('member/marketingview/') ?>/why_people_buy/"+responce);
                    $("#download").attr("href","<?= base_url('member/marketingdownload') ?>/why_people_buy/"+responce);
                    $("#reportview").modal('show');
                },
                error: function (xhr, desc, err)
                {
        
        
                }
            });
        });
    });
    });
    </script>      
         
          <!-- START SCRIPTS -->
        <!-- START PLUGINS -->
        <script type="text/javascript" src="<?php echo base_url()."assets/";?>js/plugins/jquery/jquery.min.js"></script>
        <script type="text/javascript" src="<?php echo base_url()."assets/";?>js/plugins/jquery/jquery-ui.min.js"></script>
        <script type="text/javascript" src="<?php echo base_url()."assets/";?>js/plugins/bootstrap/bootstrap.min.js"></script>        
        <!-- END PLUGINS -->

        <!-- START THIS PAGE PLUGINS-->        
        <script type='text/javascript' src='<?php echo base_url()."assets/";?>js/plugins/icheck/icheck.min.js'></script>
        <script type="text/javascript" src="<?php echo base_url()."assets/";?>js/plugins/mcustomscrollbar/jquery.mCustomScrollbar.min.js"></script>
        
        <script type="text/javascript" src="<?php echo base_url()."assets/";?>js/plugins/smartwizard/jquery.smartWizard-2.0.min.js"></script>        
        <script type="text/javascript" src="<?php echo base_url()."assets/";?>js/plugins/jquery-validation/jquery.validate.js"></script> 
        <script type="text/javascript" src="<?php echo base_url()."assets/";?>js/plugins/bootstrap/bootstrap-datepicker.js"></script>
        <script type="text/javascript" src="<?php echo base_url()."assets/";?>js/plugins/bootstrap/bootstrap-timepicker.min.js"></script>
        <script type="text/javascript" src="<?php echo base_url()."assets/";?>js/plugins/bootstrap/bootstrap-colorpicker.js"></script>

$this->load->view('member/footer');
?>

A-5 How to talk about your new Avatar page Controller

application/controllers/member.php 
public function how_to_talk_about_your_new_avatar()

{

//for email notification get admin and coach detail

$coach=$this->db->get_where('users',array('fld_id'=>$this->userid));

if ($coach->num_rows()>0) {

$row=$coach->row_array();



$coachName = $row["fld_username"] . " " . $row["fld_last_name"];

$coachemail = $row["fld_email"];

$coachsparent_id = $row["fld_parent"];

}



$admin=$this->db->get_where('users',array('fld_id'=>$coachsparent_id));

if ($admin->num_rows()>0) {

$row=$admin->row_array();



$adminName = $row["fld_username"] . " " . $row["fld_last_name"];

$adminemail = $row["fld_email"];

}



$row = array();

$successMsg = "";

$errorMsg = "";

$this->load->model('admin_model');

$tbForm = $this->admin_model->get_coaching_forms($this->userid,'how_to_talk_about_your_new_avatar');

if(sizeof($tbForm)>0){

$row = $tbForm[0];

}



if($this->input->post()){
if ($this->input->post('delete'))
{
$this->db->delete('user_how_to_talk', array('fld_user_id' => $this->userid));
}

if (isset($_POST['save']))

{

$target = $_POST['target'];

$problem = $_POST['problem_1'];

$problem_2 = $_POST['problem_2'];

$problem_3 = $_POST['problem_3'];

$solve = $_POST['solve'];

$result = $_POST['result_1'];

$result_2 = $_POST['result_2'];

$result_3 = $_POST['result_3'];

$result_4 = $_POST['result_4'];

$result_5 = $_POST['result_5'];

$relevant = $_POST['relevant'];

$benefit = $_POST['benefit_1'];

$benefit_2 = $_POST['benefit_2'];

$benefit_3 = $_POST['benefit_3'];

$benefit_4 = $_POST['benefit_4'];

$benefit_5 = $_POST['benefit_5'];

$benefit_6 = $_POST['benefit_6'];

$benefit_7 = $_POST['benefit_7'];

$benefit_8 = $_POST['benefit_8'];

$benefit_9 = $_POST['benefit_9'];

$benefit_10 = $_POST['benefit_10'];



$newData = array(

'target' => $target,

'problem' => $problem,

'problem_2' => $problem_2,

'problem_3' => $problem_3,

'solve' => $solve,

'result' => $result,

'result_2' => $result_2,

'result_3' => $result_3,

'result_4' => $result_4,

'result_5' => $result_5,

'relevant' => $relevant,

'benefit' => $benefit,

'benefit_2' => $benefit_2,

'benefit_3' => $benefit_3,

'benefit_4' => $benefit_4,

'benefit_5' => $benefit_5,

'benefit_6' => $benefit_6,

'benefit_7' => $benefit_7,

'benefit_8' => $benefit_8,

'benefit_9' => $benefit_9,

'benefit_10' => $benefit_10,

'fld_user_id' => $this->userid,

'fld_added_date' =>time()

);

$fill=$this->db->get_where('user_how_to_talk',array('fld_user_id'=>$this->userid));

if ($fill->num_rows()>0)

{

$this->db->where('fld_user_id',$this->userid);

$query = $this->db->update('user_how_to_talk',$newData);

if($query){

echo "<div class=\"alert alert-success\">Form save Successfully!<a href=\"#\" class=\"close\" data-dismiss=\"alert\"
		aria-label=\"close\">&times;</a></div>";

}

}else

{

$query = $this->db->insert('user_how_to_talk', $newData);

$last_id = $this->db->insert_id();

if($query){

echo "<div class=\"alert alert-success\">Form save Successfully!<a href=\"#\" class=\"close\" data-dismiss=\"alert\"
		aria-label=\"close\">&times;</a></div>";

}

}



}

if(isset($_POST['submited'])){

$target = $_POST['target'];

$problem = '<br />1. '.$_POST['problem_1'].'<br /><br />2. '.$_POST['problem_2'].'<br /><br />3. '.$_POST['problem_3'];

$solve = $_POST['solve'];

$result = '<br />1. '.$_POST['result_1'].'<br /><br />2. '.$_POST['result_2'].'<br /><br />3.
'.$_POST['result_3'].'<br /><br />4. '.$_POST['result_4'].'<br /><br />5. '.$_POST['result_5'];

$relevant = $_POST['relevant'];

$benefit = '<br />1. '.$_POST['benefit_1'].'<br /><br />2. '.$_POST['benefit_2'].'<br /><br />3.
'.$_POST['benefit_3'].'<br /><br />4. '.$_POST['benefit_4'].'<br /><br />5. '.$_POST['benefit_5'].'<br /><br />6.
'.$_POST['benefit_6'].'<br /><br />7. '.$_POST['benefit_7'].'<br /><br />8. '.$_POST['benefit_8'].'<br /><br />9.
'.$_POST['benefit_9'].'<br /><br />10. '.$_POST['benefit_10'];







$newData = array(

'target' => $target,

'problem' => $problem,

'solve' => $solve,

'result ' => $result,

'relevant' => $relevant,

'benefit' => $benefit,

'fld_user_id' => $this->userid,

'fld_added_date' =>time()

);

$query = $this->db->insert('how_to_talk', $newData);

$last_id = $this->db->insert_id();

if($query){

$massage = "

<head>
	<meta http-equiv='Content-Type' content='text/html; charset=windows-1252'>
	<meta name='GENERATOR' content='MSHTML 11.00.10570.1001'>

<body bgcolor='#ffffff'><strong></strong><strong> </strong><strong></strong>
	<table width='600' align='center' id='TbHeader' bgcolor='#400080' border='0' cellspacing='0' cellpadding='4'>
		<tr>
			<td align='center' id='TdHeader' bgcolor='#400080'>
				<p align='center'>
					<font color='#ffffff' face='Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif' size='6'><strong>Welcome</strong></font>
				</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
	</table>
	<table width='600' align='center' id='TbBodyRow' border='0' cellspacing='0' cellpadding='0'>
		<tr>
			<td id='TdBodyRow' valign='top' bgcolor='#ffffff'>
				<table width='100%' id='TbBody' bgcolor='#ffffff' border='0' cellspacing='0' cellpadding='4'>
					<tr>
						<td align='center' id='TdBody' bgcolor='#ffffff'>
							&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<p align='left'>
								<font color='#000000' face='Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif' size='3'><strong>Hi
										".$adminName."&nbsp;<font color='#000000'
											face='Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif' size='3'>&nbsp;</font></strong>
								</font>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
							</p>
							<p align='justify' style='margin-right: 0px;'>
								<font color='#000000' face='Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif' size='3'>This is an
									auto-generated email to notify you that your client ".$coachName." has filled and
									submitted the form <b>\"A-5 How to talk about your new Avatar\"</b> on
									MyportalX.<br><br>Please check out your client reports on MyportalX.</font>
							</p><br></font>
							</font>
							</font>
							</p>
							<p align='left'><br></p>
						</td>
					</tr>
				</table>
			</td>
		</tr>
	</table><strong></strong><strong></strong><strong> </strong>
	<table width='600' align='center' id='TbFooter' bgcolor='#eea000' border='0' cellspacing='0' cellpadding='4'>
		<tr>
			<td align='center' id='TdFooter' bgcolor='#eea000'>
				<div style='margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);'>
					<div style='margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);'><span
							style='color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-size: inherit; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;'><span
								style='color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;'><br></span></span>
					</div>
					<div style='margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);'><span
							style='color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-size: inherit; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;'><span
								style='color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;'>Regards,</span><br
								style='color: rgb(0, 52, 89);'></span></div>
					<div style='margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);'><span
							style='color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;'>Team
							MyportalX</span></div>
					<div style='margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);'><span
							style='color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;'><br></span>
					</div>
				</div>
			</td>
		</tr>
	</table>";

$subject = "Form Submitted";

$header = "From:" . $this->config->item('mail_from') . "\r\n";

$header .= "MIME-Version: 1.0\r\n";

$header .= "Content-type: text/html\r\n";

$retval = mail ($adminemail,$subject,$massage,$header);



$nots=array(

'sender_id' => $this->userid,

'reciver_id' => $coachsparent_id,

'message' => $coachName.", Filled-Up and submitted <b style='color:#4e73df'>\"How to talk about your new Avatar\"</b>
Form Today.",

'urls' => "mreport/".$this->userid,

'fld_date' => time()

);



$this->db->insert('notification',$nots);

echo "<div class=\"alert alert-success\">Form Submitted Successfully!<a href=\"#\" class=\"close\"
		data-dismiss=\"alert\" aria-label=\"close\">&times;</a></div>";

}



if($this->db->affected_rows()){

$updateData = array(

'completed_date' => time(),

'status' => "1",

'last_modified' => date('Y-m-d H:i:s')

);

$this->db->where(array('fld_form_id' => $row->id, 'fld_user_id' =>$this->userid));

$this->db->update('marketing_form_user',$updateData);

$successMsg = "Form Submitted Successfully!";



//get the updated row

$tbForm = $this->admin_model->get_coaching_forms($this->userid,'how_to_talk_about_your_new_avatar');

if(sizeof($tbForm)>0){

$row = $tbForm[0];

}

}

}

}

if($this->db->affected_rows()){

$insertFormPossition=array(

'fld_user_id' => $this->userid,

'fld_how_to_talk' => '1'

//'fld_added_date' => time()

);

$userExist=$this->Common_model->user_exist_form_possition($this->userid);

if($userExist){

$this->db->where('fld_user_id',$this->userid);

$this->db->update('form_possition',$insertFormPossition);

}else{

$this->db->insert('form_possition',$insertFormPossition);

}

}else{

echo "Database Error.";

}

$data = array("Form" => $row,

"Error_Message" => $errorMsg,

"Success_Message" => $successMsg

);



$this->load->view('member/how_to_talk_about_your_new_avatar', $data);

}

A-5 How to talk about your new Avatar page View

application/views/member/how_to_talk_about_your_new_avatar.php 
<?php
$this->load->view('member/sidebar');
$session= $this->session->get_userdata();
$user_id=$session['user_id'];
 $completed="";
error_reporting(0);

$user=$this->db->get_where('users',array('fld_id'=>$user_id));
        if ($user->num_rows()>0) {
        $row=$user->row_array();

        $memberName = $row["fld_first_name"] . " " . $row["fld_last_name"];
        $memberemail = $row["fld_email"];
        $membersparent_id = $row["fld_parent"];
        }

        $coach=$this->db->get_where('users',array('fld_id'=>$membersparent_id));
        if ($coach->num_rows()>0) {
        $row=$coach->row_array();

        $coachName = $row["fld_first_name"] . " " . $row["fld_last_name"];
        $coachemail = $row["fld_email"];
        }
?>


<!-- START BREADCRUMB -->
<ul class="breadcrumb">
	<li><a href="<?php echo base_url()." member"?>">Home</a></li>
	<li class="active"><a href="">Marketing Client</a></li>
</ul>
<!-- END BREADCRUMB -->
<img src="<?php echo base_url()." assets/images/marketing.jpg"?>" width="100%"/>
<!-- PAGE CONTENT WRAPPER -->
<div class="page-content-wrap">

	<!-- PAGE TITLE -->
	<div class="page-title">
		<h2 style="color:#006600">A-5 How to talk about your new Avatar</h2>
	</div>
	<!-- END PAGE TITLE -->
	<div class="page-content-wrap">
		<?php if ($Form->completed_date == ""){
                        $fill=$this->db->get_where('user_how_to_talk',array('fld_user_id'=>$user_id));
            if ($fill->num_rows()>0) 
            { 
                $row=$fill->row_array();
                        ?>
		<form action="#" role="form" id="formsubmit" class="form-horizontal form-material" method="post">
			<div class="row">
				<div class="col-md-12">
					<div class="panel panel-default">
						<div class="panel-body">
							<h2 style="color:red">How to Talk About What You Do</h2>
							<p>In the process of Transformation, once you have the clarity of who you are and what you
								want, and then you step into your new Avatar, the next step, obviously, is to express
								yourself fully. To be loud and proud of yourself and what you. It's important to
								learn:<br />
								How to Talk About What You Do Create a dynamic dialogue for telling people who you are
								and what you do.</p>
							<h4><b>A.5.1 Written Exercise:</b></h4>
							<p>Each of the following five parts has already been answered in previous exercises. All you
								need to do is pull the pieces into the formula below. The examples in the book are in a
								script format that you can use as a template. Let's get started.</p>
							<h4><b>Part I</b></h4>

							<div class="form-group">
								<label for="exampleInputEmail1">Summarize your target market in one sentence.</label>
								<textarea name="target" class="newarea_width" rows="2"><?= $row['target'] ?></textarea>
							</div>
							<h4><b>Part II</b></h4>
							<div class="form-group">
								<label for="exampleInputEmail1">Identify and summarize the three biggest and most
									critical problems that your target market faces.</label>
								<textarea name="problem_1" class="area_width" rows="3"><?= $row['problem'] ?></textarea>
								<textarea name="problem_2" class="area_width"
									rows="3"><?= $row['problem_2'] ?></textarea>
								<textarea name="problem_3" class="area_width"
									rows="3"><?= $row['problem_3'] ?></textarea>

								<span class="form-bar"></span>
							</div>
							<h4><b>problem_III</b></h4>
							<div class="form-group">
								<label for="exampleInputEmail1">List how you solve these problems and present clients
									investable opportunities.</label>
								<textarea name="solve" class="area_width" rows="3"><?= $row['solve'] ?></textarea>
								<span class="form-bar"></span>
							</div>
							<h4><b>Part IV </b></h4>
							<div class="form-group">
								<label for="exampleInputEmail1">Demonstrate the top five results you help your clients
									achieve.</label>
								<table width="100%">
									<tr>
										<td style="width:100px">1.</td>
										<td><textarea name="result_1" class="newarea_width"
												rows="2"><?= $row['result'] ?></textarea></td>
									</tr>
									<tr>
										<td>2.</td>
										<td><textarea name="result_2" class="newarea_width"
												rows="2"><?= $row['result_2'] ?></textarea></td>
									</tr>
									<tr>
										<td>3.</td>
										<td><textarea name="result_3" class="newarea_width"
												rows="2"><?= $row['result_3'] ?></textarea></td>
									</tr>
									<tr>
										<td>4.</td>
										<td><textarea name="result_4" class="newarea_width"
												rows="2"><?= $row['result_4'] ?></textarea></td>
									</tr>
									<tr>
										<td>5.</td>
										<td><textarea name="result_5" class="newarea_width"
												rows="2"><?= $row['result_5'] ?></textarea></td>
									</tr>
								</table>
								<span class="form-bar"></span>
							</div>

							<h4><b>Part V </b></h4>
							<div class="form-group">
								<label for="exampleInputEmail1">Pick the most relevant result and the one you are most
									comfortable with.</label>
								<textarea name="relevant" class="area_width" rows="3"><?= $row['relevant'] ?></textarea>
								<span class="form-bar"></span>
							</div>
							<h4><b>Part VI </b></h4>

							<div class="form-group">
								<label for="exampleInputEmail1">Reveal the deeper core - top 10 benefits that your
									client's experience.</label><br>
								<table width="100%">
									<tr>
										<td style="width:100px">1.</td>
										<td><textarea name="benefit_1" class="newarea_width"
												rows="2"><?= $row['benefit'] ?></textarea></td>
									</tr>
									<tr>
										<td>2.</td>
										<td><textarea name="benefit_2" class="newarea_width"
												rows="2"><?= $row['benefit_2'] ?></textarea></td>
									</tr>
									<tr>
										<td>3.</td>
										<td><textarea name="benefit_3" class="newarea_width"
												rows="2"><?= $row['benefit_3'] ?></textarea></td>
									</tr>
									<tr>
										<td>4.</td>
										<td><textarea name="benefit_4" class="newarea_width"
												rows="2"><?= $row['benefit_4'] ?></textarea></td>
									</tr>
									<tr>
										<td>5.</td>
										<td><textarea name="benefit_5" class="newarea_width"
												rows="2"><?= $row['benefit_5'] ?></textarea></td>
									</tr>
									<tr>
										<td>6.</td>
										<td><textarea name="benefit_6" class="newarea_width"
												rows="2"><?= $row['benefit_6'] ?></textarea></td>
									</tr>
									<tr>
										<td>7.</td>
										<td><textarea name="benefit_7" class="newarea_width"
												rows="2"><?= $row['benefit_7'] ?></textarea></td>
									</tr>
									<tr>
										<td>8.</td>
										<td><textarea name="benefit_8" class="newarea_width"
												rows="2"><?= $row['benefit_8'] ?></textarea></td>
									</tr>
									<tr>
										<td>9.</td>
										<td><textarea name="benefit_9" class="newarea_width"
												rows="2"><?= $row['benefit_9'] ?></textarea></td>
									</tr>
									<tr>
										<td>10.</td>
										<td><textarea name="benefit_10" class="newarea_width"
												rows="2"><?= $row['benefit_10'] ?></textarea></td>
									</tr>
								</table>
								<span class="form-bar"></span>
							</div>

							<h4><b>A.5.2 Maanas Coaching Action Step :</b></h4>
							<p>The most important part of the Maanas Coaching and the portal is to practice what clarity
								you get here. Ask your friends and peers to ask what you do and then have them evaluate
								the way you explain it. Ask them to interrupt you or make it hard for you so you have to
								get out of your comfort zone and not be like a robot. Ask them to pay special attention
								to your tone of voice, your body language, and your energy. Do you sound nervous, was it
								flowing naturally? Did they feel the passion in your delivery? Could they sense the
								excitement and did it really grab your attention.<br />
								Perhaps ask them to repeat what you explained in their own words. Finally, ask them for
								the honest opinion, open feedback where you could improve and work on it.</p>

							<div>
								<input type="submit" name="delete" class="btn btn-default" value="Clear Form">
								<a href="<?= base_url('coaching_session') ?>" class="btn btn-info">back</a>
								<input type="submit" name="submit" value="submit" id="btnsubmit"
									class="btn btn-primary pull-right" />
								<input type="submit" name="save" value="save" style="margin-right:20px"
									class="btn btn-info pull-right">
							</div>

						</div>
					</div>
				</div>
			</div>

		</form>
		<?php }else{ ?>
		<form action="#" role="form" id="formsubmit" class="form-horizontal form-material" method="post">
			<div class="row">
				<div class="col-md-12">
					<div class="panel panel-default">
						<div class="panel-body">
							<h2 style="color:red">How to Talk About What You Do</h2>
							<p>In the process of Transformation, once you have the clarity of who you are and what you
								want, and then you step into your new Avatar, the next step, obviously, is to express
								yourself fully. To be loud and proud of yourself and what you. It's important to
								learn:<br />
								How to Talk About What You Do Create a dynamic dialogue for telling people who you are
								and what you do.</p>
							<h4><b>A.5.1 Written Exercise:</b></h4>
							<p>Each of the following five parts has already been answered in previous exercises. All you
								need to do is pull the pieces into the formula below. The examples in the book are in a
								script format that you can use as a template. Let's get started.</p>
							<h4><b>Part I</b></h4>

							<div class="form-group">
								<label for="exampleInputEmail1">Summarize your target market in one sentence.</label>
								<textarea name="target" class="newarea_width" rows="2"></textarea>
							</div>
							<h4><b>Part II</b></h4>
							<div class="form-group">
								<label for="exampleInputEmail1">Identify and summarize the three biggest and most
									critical problems that your target market faces.</label>
								<textarea name="problem_1" class="area_width" rows="3"></textarea>
								<textarea name="problem_2" class="area_width" rows="3"></textarea>
								<textarea name="problem_3" class="area_width" rows="3"></textarea>

								<span class="form-bar"></span>
							</div>
							<h4><b>problem_III</b></h4>
							<div class="form-group">
								<label for="exampleInputEmail1">List how you solve these problems and present clients
									investable opportunities.</label>
								<textarea name="solve" class="area_width" rows="3"></textarea>
								<span class="form-bar"></span>
							</div>
							<h4><b>Part IV </b></h4>
							<div class="form-group">
								<label for="exampleInputEmail1">Demonstrate the top five results you help your clients
									achieve.</label>
								<table width="100%">
									<tr>
										<td style="width:100px">1.</td>
										<td><textarea name="result_1" class="newarea_width" rows="2"></textarea></td>
									</tr>
									<tr>
										<td>2.</td>

									</tr>
								</table>
								<span class="form-bar"></span>
							</div>

							<h4><b>Part V </b></h4>
							<div class="form-group">
								<label for="exampleInputEmail1">Pick the most relevant result and the one you are most
									comfortable with.</label>
								<textarea name="relevant" class="area_width" rows="3"></textarea>
								<span class="form-bar"></span>
							</div>
							<h4><b>Part VI </b></h4>

									<tr>
										<td style="width:100px">1.</td>

<!-- Modal HTML -->
<div id="reportview" class="modal fade" tabindex="-1">
	<div class="modal-dialog">
		<div class="modal-content">
			<div class="modal-header">
				<h5 class="modal-title">Your Form Was Successfully Submitted!</h5>
				<!--<button type="button" class="close" data-dismiss="modal">&times;</button>-->
			</div>
			<div class="modal-body">
				<!--<input type="text" id="formid">-->
				<div class="text-center">
					<a href="" target="_blank" id="formid" class="btn btn-info">View</a>
					<a href="" target="_blank" id="download" class="btn btn-warning">Save</a>
				</div>
			</div>
			<div class="modal-footer">
				<button type="button" class="btn btn-secondary" data-dismiss="modal">Cancel</button>
				<!--<button type="button" class="btn btn-primary">Save</button>-->
			</div>
		</div>
	</div>
</div>
<script>
	setTimeout(function () { notification(); }, 3000);

	function notification() {
		var user_id = "<?= $user_id ?>";
		var form_name = "how_to_talk_about_your_new_avatar";
		$.get("<?= base_url('Member/delete_notification') ?>/" + user_id + "/" + form_name, "", function (response) {
			console.log(response);
		});
	}

	$(document).ready(function () {
		$('#btnsubmit').click(function () {
			$('#formsubmit').submit(function (event) {
				event.preventDefault();
				$.ajax({
					url: "<?= base_url("member/ how_to_talk_about_your_new_avatar_form") ?>",
					type: "post",
					// dataType: "JSON",
					data: new FormData(this),
					processData: false,
					contentType: false,
					success: function (responce) {
					// console.log(responce);
					$('#formid').attr("href", "<?= base_url('member/marketingview/') ?>/how_to_talk/" + responce);
					$("#download").attr("href", "<?= base_url('member/marketingdownload') ?>/how_to_talk/" + responce);
					$("#reportview").modal('show');
				},
					error: function (xhr, desc, err) {


				}
            });
		});
	});
    });
</script>
<!-- START SCRIPTS -->

A-6 The transformation-- stepping into the new Avatar page View

application/controllers/member.php 
public function the_transformation()
{

//for email notification get admin and coach detail

$coach=$this->db->get_where('users',array('fld_id'=>$this->userid));

if ($coach->num_rows()>0) {

$row=$coach->row_array();



$coachName = $row["fld_username"] . " " . $row["fld_last_name"];

$coachemail = $row["fld_email"];

$coachsparent_id = $row["fld_parent"];

}



$admin=$this->db->get_where('users',array('fld_id'=>$coachsparent_id));

if ($admin->num_rows()>0) {

$row=$admin->row_array();



$adminName = $row["fld_username"] . " " . $row["fld_last_name"];

$adminemail = $row["fld_email"];

}



$row = array();

$successMsg = "";

$errorMsg = "";

$this->load->model('admin_model');

$tbForm = $this->admin_model->get_coaching_forms($this->userid,'the_transformation');

if(sizeof($tbForm)>0){

$row = $tbForm[0];

}



if($this->input->post()){
if ($this->input->post('delete'))
{
$this->db->delete('user_the_transformation', array('fld_user_id' => $this->userid));
}
if (isset($_POST['save']))

{

$experiences = $_POST['experiences'];

$list = $_POST['list'];

$situations = $_POST['situations'];

$behavior = $_POST['behavior'];

$communicate = $_POST['communicate'];

$look = $_POST['look'];

$perhaps = $_POST['perhaps'];

$important = $_POST['important'];

$avatar = $_POST['avatar'];

$identified = $_POST['identified'];

$scale = $_POST['scale_1'];

$scale_2 = $_POST['scale_2'];

$scale_3 = $_POST['scale_3'];

$scale_4 = $_POST['scale_4'];

$scale_5 = $_POST['scale_5'];

$scale_6 = $_POST['scale_6'];

$scale_7 = $_POST['scale_7'];

$scale_8 = $_POST['scale_8'];

$scale_9 = $_POST['scale_9'];

$scale_10 = $_POST['scale_10'];

$topic = $_POST['topic_1'];

$topic_2 = $_POST['topic_2'];

$topic_3 = $_POST['topic_3'];

$score = $_POST['score_1'];

$score_2 = $_POST['score_2'];

$score_3 = $_POST['score_3'];

$try_1st = $_POST['try_1st_1'];

$try_1st_2 = $_POST['try_1st_2'];

$try_1st_3 = $_POST['try_1st_3'];

$try_2nd = $_POST['try_2nd_1'];

$try_2nd_2 = $_POST['try_2nd_2'];

$try_2nd_3 = $_POST['try_2nd_3'];

$try_3rd = $_POST['try_3rd_1'];

$try_3rd_2 = $_POST['try_3rd_2'];

$try_3rd_3 = $_POST['try_3rd_3'];

$people = $_POST['people_1'];

$people_2 = $_POST['people_2'];

$people_3 = $_POST['people_3'];

$people_4 = $_POST['people_4'];

$people_5 = $_POST['people_5'];

$top_2 = $_POST['top_2'];

$top_3 = $_POST['top_3'];

$top_4 = $_POST['top_4'];

$top_5 = $_POST['top_5'];

$thing = $_POST['thing_1'];

$thing_2 = $_POST['thing_2'];

$thing_3 = $_POST['thing_3'];

$memorable_thing = $_POST['memorable_thing_1'];

$memorable_thing_2 = $_POST['memorable_thing_2'];

$memorable_thing_3 = $_POST['memorable_thing_3'];

$compliment = $_POST['compliment'];

$trait_a_2 = $_POST['trait_a_2'];

$trait_a_5 = $_POST['trait_a_5'];

$change_a_3 = $_POST['change_a_3'];

$name_2 = $_POST['name_2'];

$trait_b = $_POST['trait_b_1'];

$trait_b_2 = $_POST['trait_b_2'];

$trait_b_3 = $_POST['trait_b_3'];

'statement_2' => $statement_2,

'statement_3' => $statement_3,

'statement_4' => $statement_4,

'statement_5' => $statement_5,

'statement_6' => $statement_6,

'version' => $version,

'version_2' => $version_2,

'version_3' => $version_3,

'version_4' => $version_4,

'version_5' => $version_5,

'version_6' => $version_6,

'purpose' => $purpose,

'vision' => $vision,

'possible' => $possible,

'possible_2' => $possible_2,

'possible_3' => $possible_3,

'something' => $something,

'tagline' => $tagline,

'tagline_2' => $tagline_2,

'tagline_3' => $tagline_3,

'fld_user_id' => $this->userid,

'fld_added_date' =>time()

);

$fill=$this->db->get_where('user_the_transformation',array('fld_user_id'=>$this->userid));

if ($fill->num_rows()>0)

{

$this->db->where('fld_user_id',$this->userid);

$query = $this->db->update('user_the_transformation',$newData);

if($query){

echo "<div class=\"alert alert-success\">Form save Successfully!<a href=\"#\" class=\"close\" data-dismiss=\"alert\"
		aria-label=\"close\">&times;</a></div>";

}

}else

{

$query = $this->db->insert('user_the_transformation', $newData);

$last_id = $this->db->insert_id();

if($query){

echo "<div class=\"alert alert-success\">Form save Successfully!<a href=\"#\" class=\"close\" data-dismiss=\"alert\"
		aria-label=\"close\">&times;</a></div>";

}

}

}

if(isset($_POST['submit'])){

$experiences = $_POST['experiences'];

$list = $_POST['list'];

$behavior = $_POST['behavior'];

							MyportalX</span></div>

		</tr>
	</table>";

$subject = "Form Submitted";

$header = "From:" . $this->config->item('mail_from') . "\r\n";

$header .= "MIME-Version: 1.0\r\n";

$header .= "Content-type: text/html\r\n";

$retval = mail ($adminemail,$subject,$massage,$header);

'sender_id' => $this->userid,

'reciver_id' => $coachsparent_id,

'message' => $coachName.", Filled-Up and submitted <b style='color:#4e73df'>\"The transformation-- stepping into the new
	Avatar\"</b> Form Today.",

'fld_date' => time()

);

echo "<div class=\"alert alert-success\">Form Submitted Successfully!<a href=\"#\" class=\"close\"
		data-dismiss=\"alert\" aria-label=\"close\">&times;</a></div>";

}



if($this->db->affected_rows()){

$updateData = array(

'completed_date' => time(),

'status' => "1",

'last_modified' => date('Y-m-d H:i:s')

);

$this->db->where(array('fld_form_id' => $row->id, 'fld_user_id' =>$this->userid));

$this->db->update('marketing_form_user',$updateData);

$successMsg = "Form submitted successfully.";



//get the updated row

$tbForm = $this->admin_model->get_coaching_forms($this->userid,'the_transformation');

if(sizeof($tbForm)>0){

$row = $tbForm[0];

}

}

}

}

if($this->db->affected_rows()){

$insertFormPossition=array(

'fld_user_id' => $this->userid,

'fld_the_transformation' => '1'

//'fld_added_date' => time()

);

$userExist=$this->Common_model->user_exist_form_possition($this->userid);

if($userExist){

$this->db->where('fld_user_id',$this->userid);

$this->db->update('form_possition',$insertFormPossition);

}else{

$this->db->insert('form_possition',$insertFormPossition);

}

}else{

echo "Database Error.";

}

$data = array("Form" => $row,

"Error_Message" => $errorMsg,

"Success_Message" => $successMsg

);



$this->load->view('member/the_transformation', $data);

}

A-6 The transformation-- stepping into the new Avatar page View

application/views/member/the_transformation.php 
<?php
$this->load->view('member/sidebar');
$session= $this->session->get_userdata();
$user_id=$session['user_id'];
 $completed="";
error_reporting(0);

$user=$this->db->get_where('users',array('fld_id'=>$user_id));
        if ($user->num_rows()>0) {
        $row=$user->row_array();

        $memberName = $row["fld_first_name"] . " " . $row["fld_last_name"];
        $memberemail = $row["fld_email"];
        $membersparent_id = $row["fld_parent"];
        }

        $coach=$this->db->get_where('users',array('fld_id'=>$membersparent_id));
        if ($coach->num_rows()>0) {
        $row=$coach->row_array();

        $coachName = $row["fld_first_name"] . " " . $row["fld_last_name"];
        $coachemail = $row["fld_email"];
        }
?>


<!-- START BREADCRUMB -->
<ul class="breadcrumb">
	<li><a href="<?php echo base_url()." member"?>">Home</a></li>
	<li class="active"><a href="">Marketing Client</a></li>
</ul>
<!-- END BREADCRUMB -->
<img src="<?php echo base_url()." assets/images/marketing.jpg"?>" height="300" width="100%"/>
<!-- PAGE CONTENT WRAPPER -->
<div class="page-content-wrap">

	<!-- PAGE TITLE -->
	<div class="page-title">
		<h2 style="color:#006600">A-6 The transformation-- stepping into the new Avatar</h2>
	</div>
	<!-- END PAGE TITLE -->
	<div class="page-content-wrap">
		<?php if ($Form->completed_date == ""){
                    	$fill=$this->db->get_where('user_the_transformation',array('fld_user_id'=>$user_id));
            if ($fill->num_rows()>0) 
            { 
                $row=$fill->row_array();

                    	?>
		<form action="#" role="form" id="formsubmit" class="form-horizontal form-material" method="post">
			<div class="row">
				<div class="col-md-12">
					<div class="panel panel-default">
						<div class="panel-body">
							<h2 style="color:red">Creating a new Avatar: The Transformation</h2>
							<h5>Let's develop a Personal Brand and a plan for deciding how you want to be known in your
								market. </h5>
							<h4><b>A.6.1 Written Exercise: </b></h4>
							<div class="form-group">
								<label for="exampleInputEmail1">Look back at your work-biz life and contemplate on the
									experiences that you may have compromised, knowing you could have gone to the next
									level. List different ways that you've sold us or settled for less, either now or in
									past.</label><br>
								<textarea name="experiences" class="area_width"
									rows="3"><?= $row['experiences'] ?></textarea>
								<span class="form-bar"></span>
							</div>
							<h4><b>A.6.2 Written Exercise: </b></h4>
							<div class="form-group">
								<label for="exampleInputEmail1">Now look back at your work-biz experience and make a
									list of different ways you felt fully alive and in the flow. Involve all your five
									senses and re-experience the event. What made you come alive? What was that Avatar
									of you?</label><br>
								<textarea name="list" class="area_width" rows="3"><?= $row['list'] ?></textarea>
								<span class="form-bar"></span>
							</div>
							<h4><b>A.6.3 Written Exercise: </b></h4>
							<div class="form-group">
								<label for="exampleInputEmail1">Now look at both situations objectively, the one in
									which you compromised and the one that you were able fully to express yourself. Keep
									the 2nd Avatar in mind. Your brand should reflect that.</label><br>
								<textarea name="situations" class="area_width"
									rows="3"><?= $row['situations'] ?></textarea>
								<span class="form-bar"></span>
							</div>

							<div class="form-group">
								<label for="exampleInputEmail1">How can you change your behavior to speak boldly and
									from a place of free expression so that you're working in situations that make you
									feel fully self-expressed?</label><br>
								<textarea name="behavior" class="newarea_width"
									rows="2"><?= $row['behavior'] ?></textarea>
							</div>
							<div class="form-group">
								<label for="exampleInputEmail1">How will you communicate to make sure you stop
									compromising or watering yourself down in the future?</label>
								<textarea name="communicate" class="newarea_width"
									rows="2"><?= $row['communicate'] ?></textarea>
							</div>

							<h4><b>A.6.4 Written Exercise: </b></h4>
							<div class="form-group">
								<label for="exampleInputEmail1">Now let's look at some situation that you can create and
									express yourself freely, maybe a speaking gig or perhaps a facebook live or actively
									participate in a facebook group</label><br>
								<textarea name="look" class="area_width" rows="3"><?= $row['look'] ?></textarea>
								<span class="form-bar"></span>
							</div>
							<h4><b>A.6.5 Written Exercise: </b></h4>
							<div class="form-group">
								<label for="exampleInputEmail1">Write down a few more situations perhaps a bit more
									challenging that you'd like to work up to expressing more boldly.</label>
								<textarea name="perhaps" class="area_width" rows="3"><?= $row['perhaps'] ?></textarea>
								<span class="form-bar"></span>
							</div>
							<h4><b>A.6.6 Written Exercise: </b></h4>
							<div class="form-group">
								<label for="exampleInputEmail1">Identify one of your most important intentions as it
									relates to your business.</label>
								<p style="color:#FF0000">Example : I intend to launch my coaching program</p>
								<textarea name="important" class="area_width"
									rows="3"><?= $row['important'] ?></textarea>
								<span class="form-bar"></span>
							</div>
							<h3><b>Phase I-Identify& Release the Conflicting beliefs.</b></h3>
							<h4><b>A.6.7 Written Exercise:</b></h4>
							<p>Now look deep within your self and search for the conflicting belief that is most likely
								fear based and seated in the sub conscious mind. Identify that memory/feeling and set it
								aside</p>
							<p style="color:red">Example : If I launch my coaching program I will have to come out in
								the open and promote myself and I will be vulnerable and feel overwhelmed.</p>
							<h5>Identify what's stopping you from going to the next step: </h5>
							<ul>
								<li>Phase I - Identify & release the conflicting beliefs. Create space in your energy
									field. Make a decision. Go through the ritual and commit with your higher self.</li>
								<li>Phase II - Anchor the new avatar. Replace the stagnated energy with new positive
									energy. Find supporters, friends, coaches, mentors and tell them about your goals.
									Become accountable to them.</li>
							</ul>

							<div class="form-group">
								<textarea name="avatar" class="area_width" rows="3"><?= $row['avatar'] ?></textarea>
								<span class="form-bar"></span>
							</div>

							<h5>Phase III - Take action and move to the next lesson</h5>
							<h4><b>A.6.8 Maanas Coaching Action Step : </b></h4>

							<div class="form-group">
								<label for="exampleInputEmail1">Once you have identified the conflicting beliefs you
									need to make a list of them. We all have different kinds and levels of patterns &
									addictions. Even good behaviors can be addictions. This is where we are going to
									release them and depending on your personal power, you may have to go through three
									phases. But in any case, do not allow anyone to judge you nor you should judge
									yourself.</label><br /><br /><br />
								<textarea name="identified" class="area_width"
									rows="3"><?= $row['identified'] ?></textarea>
								<span class="form-bar"></span>
							</div>
							<h4><b>Phase I Exercise :</b></h4>
							<p>The first phase is awareness and acknowledgment. While quite often this will work, a lot
								of deeper afflictions will need you to go to the next phase.</p>
							Exercise :
							<ol type="1">
								<li>Close your eyes & get comfortable</li>
								<li>Relax and take a few deep breaths.</li>
								<li>Bring your focus at the center of the forehead.</li>
								<li>Relax your body and be in the thoughtless state for a moment.</li>
								<li>Then, intentionally envision yourself reaching the goal you want.</li>
								<li>Watch out for the conflicting thoughts or feelings that arise in your body or mind.
								</li>
								<li>Follow that thought and find the root cause where it is coming from.</li>
								<li>When you realize that you have moved out of the goal totals and are on another
									trail, come back and open your eyes.</li>
								<li>Continue to do this exercise for a few days until you are able to walk into your
									goal-without conflicting thought.</li>
								<li>If you find yourself getting lost in the maze of the side thoughts - start making a
									list, then move to the next thought.</li>
							</ol>
							<div class="form-group">

									strength ( scale of 1 to 10 & 10 being highest)</label>

							<h4><b>Phase II Exercise: Releasing the conflicting beliefs.</b></h4>
							<p>In the above list, you made a list of the stubborn memories & thoughts. In this exercise,
								we are going to take those stubborn memories, behavior patterns & addictions and get
								them out of your energy field.<br />

								In this exercise, you need to take the top 3 conflicting thoughts that are the strongest
								and the highest scores. Now let us deal with each memory one at a time. Do the following
								exercise & come back and write the score in the 1st try column. If the score had not
								dropped down significantly then do the Exercise # 2. Then write down the score in the
								2nd Try column. If that does not work go to the third exercise and write the score. If
								after three tries you are still struggling then reach out to your mentor or coach to
								help you with it. We have had 97% success with these exercises, however, if it is still
								not working for you then reach out to your coach or mentor and enroll their help. We are
								always here to support you so all you have to do is click on the chat button and reach
								out to us. You are bigger than any problem you have.</p>

							<h4><b>Exercise: I In this exercise we are using the universal ELEMENT OF ETHER (QUANTUM
									FIELD)</b></h4>
							<ol type="1">
								<li>This is going to be a written exercise. You can log into the portal and use the
									negative energy detox.</li>
								<img src="<?php echo base_url()." assets/images/a-6.jpg"?>" width="500px"/>
								<li>While writing down the memory, go deeper and deeper until you reach the root cause
									of this memory.</li>
								<li>See what your role was, what was happening around you, use all the five senses to
									bring out this memory.</li>
								<li>Become totally aware of your body and mind. See this incident or experience with
									your mind's eye and see it unfolding on you're the mental screen(Imagine you are
									sitting in a theatre and watching the screen and the experience is playing on the
									screen)</li>
								<li>Once you are totally aware and acknowledge your role in it, make a decision to let
									it go. </li>
								<li>Press the submit button and see it go off-poof it's out of your mind and into the
									quantum field where it dissipates. Ashes to ashes, dust to dust.</li>
								<li>Feel free and take three deep breaths and open your eyes.</li>
							</ol>


							<h4><b>Exercise II: In this exercise, we are using the universal Element of Water.</b></h4>

							<ol type="1">

								<li>In this exercise, you are going to go through a similar visualization but instead of
									using the portal you are going to use a paper & pen.</li>
								<li>Get comfortable and away from distractions. You can close your eyes and open them to
									write or you can go through the whole visualization and write at one time, whatever
									works for you.</li>
								<li>While writing down the memory, go deeper and deeper until you reach the root cause
									of this memory.</li>
								<li> MOST IMPORTANT PART HERE IS TO RECOGNISE WHAT PART OF THE BODY YOU ARE FEELING THE
									STAGNATED ENERGY.</li>
								<li>See what your role was, what was happening around you, use all the five senses to
									bring out this memory.</li>
								<li>Become totally aware of your body and mind. See this incident or experience with
									your mind's eye and see it unfolding on you're the mental screen( Imagine you are
									sitting in a theatre and watching the screen and the experience is playing on the
									screen)</li>
								<li>Once you are totally aware and acknowledge your role in it, and you have it written
									on a piece of paper, make a decision to let it go. </li>
								<li>Bring out the emotions that you want to let go of-fear anger or whatever it is, then
									physically tear the paper in pieces and flush it in the toilet.</li>
								<li>Hold on the flush handle while taking a deep breath and feeling the lightness of the
									energy bubble dissipate from the part of the body you recognized in the step # 4
								</li>

								<li>Experience the freedom and go back and write the score.</li>
							</ol>


							<h4><b>Exercise # 3 -- In this exercise, we are using the universal Element of Fire</b></h4>
							<ol type="1">

								<li>In this exercise, you are going to go through a similar visualization but instead of
									using the portal you are going to use a paper & pen.</li>
								<li>Get comfortable and away from distractions. You can close your eyes and open them to
									write or you can go through the whole visualization and write at one time, whatever
									works for you.</li>
								<li>While writing down the memory, go deeper and deeper until you reach the root cause
									of this memory.</li>
								<li>MOST IMPORTANT PART HERE IS TO RECOGNISE WHAT PART OF THE BODY YOU ARE FEELING THE
									STAGNATED ENERGY</li>
								<li>See what your role was, what was happening around you, use all the five senses to
									bring out this memory.</li>
								<li>Become totally aware of your body and mind. See this incident or experience with
									your mind's eye and see it unfolding on you-re the mental screen( Imagine you are
									sitting in a theatre and watching the screen and the experience is playing on the
									screen)</li>
								<li>Once you are totally aware and acknowledge your role in it, and you have it written
									on a piece of paper, make a decision to let it go. </li>
								<li>Bring out the emotions that you want to let go of-fear anger or whatever it is, then
									physically tear the paper in pieces and you will take it outside in an open space &
									burn it in a bowl or any vessel that will collect the ashes.</li>
								<li>You could take the ashes and flush it or scatter it in the grass. And while doing
									either take a deep breath and be aware - feeling the lightness of the energy bubble
									dissipate from the part of the body you recognized in the step # 4</li>
								<li>Experience the freedom and go back and write the score.</li>
							</ol>

							<h4><b>Exercise # 4 & 5 Element of earth & Wind</b></h4>
							<p>In this round, you could go through the same exercise- step 1 through step 7 and then you
								could dig the ground and bury the papers (Element of Earth) or you could burn the paper
								( Element of Wind-Air) --blow the ashes with the wind from a hill or a
								bridge.<br />Based on your zodiac the element that affects you most will be the one that
								will help you regain your powers over the memory.</p>

							<h3><b>Phase II - Anchoring the new Avatar.</b></h3>
							<h5>Now that we have released the fears and the conflicting belief and we have created space
								in the energy field; we are ready to install the new beliefs and anchor your new Avatar.
							</h5>

							Exercise: I
							<ol type="1">
								<li>Sit in a quiet and comfortable space.</li>
								<li>Close your eyes & relax your body.</li>
								<li>Take three deep breaths.</li>
								<li>Bring your focus to the center of the forehead.</li>
								<li>Visualize your new avatar giving the service or the product to your clients.</li>
								<li>Experience the joy and fulfillment of accomplishing that goal.</li>
								<li>Pay attention to the part of the body that feels the energy of that excitement.</li>
								<li>Decide on the Mudra/action (the hand gesture such as pumping your fist or holding on
									to a rock or another article that is associated with this action)</li>
								<li>Repeat the words (Mantra)-So Be IT - and open your eyes and release the vision into
									the quantum field so the energy can reach your clients or your client's energy can
									reach it - ( You are activating the LOA)</li>
							</ol>

							Exercise II:
							<p>After you have envisioned the experience in the above exercise, you need to train your
								body to feel the feelings. In this exercise, you are going to make a list of the goals.
								Be very clear about what you want to achieve and by what date. Write down the full
								experience in a piece of paper or you could log in the portal and use the Intention
								setter tool and release it in the field.</p>
							<img src="<?php echo base_url()." assets/images/a-6-intention.jpg"?>" width="500px"/>

							Exercise III:
							<p> For this step, it's critical that you very carefully choose one or two sincerely and
								highly supportive friends to share your new insights with. They must be truly supportive
								and willing to help you change. Often as we begin to make changes in our lives, whether
								business or personal, some of our most dearly loved friends and family can feel
								threatened by the process of change. While they may consciously want you to be
								successful, they may have their own subconscious conflicting
								intentions and be highly invested in wanting to maintain their own comfort zone by
								keeping you in yours. These are not the folks you want to ask for help from to do this
								exercise. Share the intentions and their conflicting counterparts with one or two others
								and ask your friends to help you in recognizing whether these are genuine concerns
								or unfounded fears. Then brainstorm ways to address the problems.</p>

							<p>In this exercise make a list of 5 people you are going to share the goals with. Provide
								them the milestones and the dates and why you want to achieve this goal. Tell them to
								use the "why" to motivate you when needed. The five people can include your family
								members, friends, peers, coaches or mentor. However, be very careful about whom you
								choose because you do not want their self-limiting beliefs or fears to come in your
								energy field. If they feel threatened by your success or they are not operating for
								their higher self it will defeat your purpose. In this case, you need to reach out to
								your coach or peer and if needed you can always ask us for support. In the space below
								write down the name and what kind of support they will provide. They must push you and
								encourage you to get out of your comfort zone.
							</p>

							<h4><b>A.6.11 Written Exercise: </b></h4>
							<p>Start with the basics. Keep it simple and straight for-ward. Refer to your target market
								from Chapter 2<br />
								The first time around, just come up with something accurate and clear for now - make
								sure an 8 - year - old can understand it. List as many possibilities as come to mind.
							</p>
							<ul>
								<li>What is your who and do what statement?</li>
								<li>Whom do you help and what do you help them do?</li>
							</ul>
							Finish this statement, "I help...."
							<p style="color:red">Example: I help ... transformational entrepreneurs build their coaching
								business. (Or, for the 8-year-old, "I help yoga teachers attract clients.")</p>
