		<tr>
			<td align='center' id='TdFooter' bgcolor='#eea000'>
				<div style='margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);'>
					<div style='margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);'><span
							style='color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-size: inherit; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;'><span
								style='color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;'><br></span></span>
					</div>
					<div style='margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);'><span
							style='color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-size: inherit; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;'><span
								style='color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;'>Regards,</span><br
								style='color: rgb(0, 52, 89);'></span></div>
					<div style='margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);'><span
							style='color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;'>Team
							MyportalX</span></div>
					<div style='margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);'><span
							style='color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;'><br></span>
					</div>
				</div>
			</td>
		</tr>
	</table>";

$subject = "Form Submitted";

$header = "From:" . $this->config->item('mail_from') . "\r\n";

$header .= "MIME-Version: 1.0\r\n";

$header .= "Content-type: text/html\r\n";

$retval = mail ($adminemail,$subject,$massage,$header);



$nots=array(

'sender_id' => $this->userid,

'reciver_id' => $coachsparent_id,

'message' => $coachName.", Filled-Up and submitted <b style='color:#4e73df'>\"Perfect Pricing & Simple Selling\"</b>
Form Today.",

'urls' => "mreport/".$this->userid,

'fld_date' => time()

);



$this->db->insert('notification',$nots);



echo "<div class=\"alert alert-success\">Form Submitted Successfully!<a href=\"#\" class=\"close\"
		data-dismiss=\"alert\" aria-label=\"close\">&times;</a></div>";

}



if($this->db->affected_rows()){

$updateData = array(

'completed_date' => time(),

'status' => "1",

'last_modified' => date('Y-m-d H:i:s')

);

$this->db->where(array('fld_form_id' => $row->id, 'fld_user_id' =>$this->userid));

$this->db->update('marketing_form_user',$updateData);

$successMsg = "Form Submitted Successfully!";



//get the updated row

$tbForm = $this->admin_model->get_coaching_forms($this->userid,'perfect_pricing');

if(sizeof($tbForm)>0){

$row = $tbForm[0];

}

}

}

}

if($this->db->affected_rows()){

$insertFormPossition=array(

'fld_user_id' => $this->userid,

'fld_perfect_pricing' => '1'

//'fld_added_date' => time()

);

$userExist=$this->Common_model->user_exist_form_possition($this->userid);

if($userExist){

$this->db->where('fld_user_id',$this->userid);

$this->db->update('form_possition',$insertFormPossition);

}else{

$this->db->insert('form_possition',$insertFormPossition);

}

}else{

echo "Database Error.";

}

$data = array("Form" => $row,

"Error_Message" => $errorMsg,

"Success_Message" => $successMsg

);



$this->load->view('member/perfect_pricing', $data);

}

A-9 Perfect Pricing & Simple Selling page View

application/views/member/perfect_pricing.php 
<?php
$this->load->view('member/sidebar');
$session= $this->session->get_userdata();
$user_id=$session['user_id'];
 $completed="";
error_reporting(0);

$user=$this->db->get_where('users',array('fld_id'=>$user_id));
        if ($user->num_rows()>0) {
        $row=$user->row_array();

        $memberName = $row["fld_first_name"] . " " . $row["fld_last_name"];
        $memberemail = $row["fld_email"];
        $membersparent_id = $row["fld_parent"];
        }

        $coach=$this->db->get_where('users',array('fld_id'=>$membersparent_id));
        if ($coach->num_rows()>0) {
        $row=$coach->row_array();

        $coachName = $row["fld_first_name"] . " " . $row["fld_last_name"];
        $coachemail = $row["fld_email"];
        }
?>


<!-- START BREADCRUMB -->
<ul class="breadcrumb">
	<li><a href="<?php echo base_url()." member"?>">Home</a></li>
	<li class="active"><a href="">Marketing Client</a></li>
</ul>
<!-- END BREADCRUMB -->
<img src="<?php echo base_url()." assets/images/marketing.jpg"?>" width="100%"/>
<!-- PAGE CONTENT WRAPPER -->
<div class="page-content-wrap">
	<!-- PAGE TITLE -->
	<div class="page-title">
		<h2 style="color:#006600">A-9 Perfect Pricing & Simple Selling</h2>
	</div>
	<!-- END PAGE TITLE -->
	<div class="page-content-wrap">
		<?php if ($Form->completed_date == ""){ 
                    	$fill=$this->db->get_where('user_perfect_pricing',array('fld_user_id'=>$user_id));
            if ($fill->num_rows()>0)

                $row=$fill->row_array();

		<form action="#" role="form" id="formsubmit" class="form-horizontal form-material" method="post">
			<div class="row">
				<div class="col-md-12">
					<div class="panel panel-default">
						<div class="panel-body">
							<h2 style="color:red">Perfect Pricing & Simple Selling Questions</h2>
							<p>Coaching success requires that you price your offerings at rates that are compelling to
								your ideal clients and that you're able to have sales conversations that are effortless
								and effective. It means that you must:</p>
							<ul>
								<li>Perfect your pricing strategies using the right models and incentives</li>
								<li>Master simple selling techniques so you can have sales conversations that feel as
									easy as a walk in the park.</li>
							</ul>
							<h4>Module Three consists of these lessons:</h4>
							<p>How to make offers that are proportional to the amount of trust that you've earned.
								Become comfortable with the sales process by letting go of any limiting beliefs you may
								have about being worthy of the money you're earning. These exercises help you shift your
								perspective of the sales process itself.<br /> All you have to do now is decide how to
								price your offers and learn how to be comfortable and confident during sales
								conversations.</p>
							<h2 style="color:red">Perfect Pricing</h2>
							<h4>A.9.1 Written Exercise:</h4>
							<p>Think of a client who gave you rave reviews. Make a list of all the FEPS benefits the
								client received from working with you. Don't be stingy here. Think big. Now, put
								specific dollar values on all of those benefits. Again, think big. No, bigger than that.
								Because . . . hold on to your hat . . . you may just find that you have been
								undervaluing yourself and, as a result, underpricing your products and services. You are
								giving generously of your talents and skills and, it's likely, the value you provide is
								worth much, much more than what you've been charging.</p>

												rows="2"><?= $row['Product_name_4'] ?></textarea></td>
										<td><textarea name="current_price_4" class="newarea_width"
												rows="2"><?= $row['current_price_4'] ?></textarea></td>
										<td><textarea name="level_i_4" class="newarea_width"
												rows="2"><?= $row['level_i_4'] ?></textarea></td>
										<td><textarea name="level_ii_4" class="newarea_width"
												rows="2"><?= $row['level_ii_4'] ?></textarea></td>
										<td><textarea name="level_iii_4" class="newarea_width"
												rows="2"><?= $row['level_iii_4'] ?></textarea></td>
										<td><textarea name="level_iv_4" class="newarea_width"
												rows="2"><?= $row['level_iv_4'] ?></textarea></td>
										<td><textarea name="level_v_4" class="newarea_width"
												rows="2"><?= $row['level_v_4'] ?></textarea></td>
										<td><textarea name="sick_4" class="newarea_width"
												rows="2"><?= $row['sick_4'] ?></textarea></td>

									</tr>
								</table>
								<span class="form-bar"></span>
							</div>
							<h2 style="color:red">Super Simple Selling</h2>
							<h4>A.9.1 Written Exercise:</h4>
							<p>Practice without pressure. Try this process with a good friend or colleague and see what
								happens. Ask her to call you at random a few times over the course of a week and say,
								"Hi, I've been getting your newsletter for a while and I think you may be able to help
								me, can we talk about your service - es?" And, instead of doing that thing that everyone
								does-talk about themselves and their business for 20 minutes-ask her what she's working
								on or what she's trying to achieve or what problem she's trying to overcome, and you'll
								be into Part 1 of the Maanas Coaching Four-Part Sales Formula. Super simple.</p><br />
							<div>
								<input type="submit" name="delete" class="btn btn-default" value="Clear Form">
								<a href="<?= base_url('coaching_session') ?>" class="btn btn-info">back</a>
								<input type="submit" name="submit" value="Submit" id="btnsubmit"
									class="btn btn-primary pull-right">
								<input type="submit" name="save" value="save" style="margin-right:20px"
									class="btn btn-info pull-right">
							</div>

						</div>
					</div>
				</div>
			</div>

		</form>

		<?php }else{ ?>
		<form action="#" role="form" id="formsubmit" class="form-horizontal form-material" method="post">
			<div class="row">
				<div class="col-md-12">
					<div class="panel panel-default">
						<div class="panel-body">
							<h2 style="color:red">Perfect Pricing & Simple Selling Questions</h2>
							<p>Coaching success requires that you price your offerings at rates that are compelling to
								your ideal clients and that you're able to have sales conversations that are effortless
								and effective. It means that you must:</p>
							<ul>
								<li>Perfect your pricing strategies using the right models and incentives</li>
								<li>Master simple selling techniques so you can have sales conversations that feel as
									easy as a walk in the park.</li>
							</ul>
							<h4>Module Three consists of these lessons:</h4>
							<p>How to make offers that are proportional to the amount of trust that you've earned.
								Become comfortable with the sales process by letting go of any limiting beliefs you may
								have about being worthy of the money you're earning. These exercises help you shift your
								perspective of the sales process itself.<br /> All you have to do now is decide how to
								price your offers and learn how to be comfortable and confident during sales
								conversations.</p>
							<h2 style="color:red">Perfect Pricing</h2>
							<h4>A.9.1 Written Exercise:</h4>
							<p>Think of a client who gave you rave reviews. Make a list of all the FEPS benefits the
								client received from working with you. Don't be stingy here. Think big. Now, put
								specific dollar values on all of those benefits. Again, think big. No, bigger than that.
								Because . . . hold on to your hat . . . you may just find that you have been
								undervaluing yourself and, as a result, underpricing your products and services. You are
								giving generously of your talents and skills and, it's likely, the value you provide is
								worth much, much more than what you've been charging.</p>

<div id="reportview" class="modal fade" tabindex="-1">
	<div class="modal-dialog">
		<div class="modal-content">
			<div class="modal-header">
				<h5 class="modal-title">Your Form Was Successfully Submitted!</h5>
				<!--<button type="button" class="close" data-dismiss="modal">&times;</button>-->
			</div>
			<div class="modal-body">
				<!--<input type="text" id="formid">-->
				<div class="text-center">
					<a href="" target="_blank" id="formid" class="btn btn-info">View</a>
					<a href="" target="_blank" id="download" class="btn btn-warning">Save</a>
				</div>
			</div>
			<div class="modal-footer">
				<button type="button" class="btn btn-secondary" data-dismiss="modal">Cancel</button>
				<!--<button type="button" class="btn btn-primary">Save</button>-->
			</div>
		</div>
	</div>
</div>
<script>
	setTimeout(function () { notification(); }, 3000);

	function notification() {
		var user_id = "<?= $user_id ?>";
		var form_name = "perfect_pricing";
		$.get("<?= base_url('Member/delete_notification') ?>/" + user_id + "/" + form_name, "", function (response) {
			console.log(response);
		});
	}

	$(document).ready(function () {
		$('#btnsubmit').click(function () {
			$('#formsubmit').submit(function (event) {
				event.preventDefault();
				$.ajax({
					url: "<?= base_url("member/ perfect_pricing_form") ?>",
					type: "post",
					// dataType: "JSON",
					data: new FormData(this),
					processData: false,
					contentType: false,
					success: function (responce) {
					// console.log(responce);
					$('#formid').attr("href", "<?= base_url('member/marketingview/perfect_pricing/') ?>/" + responce);
					$("#download").attr("href", "<?= base_url('member/marketingdownload/perfect_pricing/') ?>/" + responce);
					$("#reportview").modal('show');
				},
					error: function (xhr, desc, err) {


				}
            });
		});
	});
    });
</script>
<!-- START SCRIPTS -->

<?php
$this->load->view('member/footer');

A-10 Idea Mapping- Niche tightening page controller

application/controllers/member.php 
public function idea_mapping()
		
		{
		
		//for email notification get admin and coach detail
		
		$coach=$this->db->get_where('users',array('fld_id'=>$this->userid));
		
		if ($coach->num_rows()>0) {
		
		$row=$coach->row_array();
		
		
		
		$coachName = $row["fld_username"] . " " . $row["fld_last_name"];
		
		$coachemail = $row["fld_email"];
		
		$coachsparent_id = $row["fld_parent"];
		
		}
		
		
		
		$admin=$this->db->get_where('users',array('fld_id'=>$coachsparent_id));
		
		if ($admin->num_rows()>0) {
		
		$row=$admin->row_array();
		
		
		
		$adminName = $row["fld_username"] . " " . $row["fld_last_name"];
		
		$adminemail = $row["fld_email"];
		
		}
		
		
		
		$row = array();
		
		$successMsg = "";
		
		$errorMsg = "";
		
		$this->load->model('admin_model');
		
		$tbForm = $this->admin_model->get_coaching_forms($this->userid,'idea_mapping');
		
		if(sizeof($tbForm)>0){
		
		$row = $tbForm[0];
		
		}
		
		
		
		if ($this->input->post()){
		if ($this->input->post('deletes'))
		{
		$this->db->delete('user_idea_mapping',array('fld_user_id'=>$this->userid));
		}
		if (isset($_POST['saved']))
		{
		
		$dna_1 = $_POST['dna_1'];
		
		$dna_2 = $_POST['dna_2'];
		
		$subject_1 = $_POST['subject_1'];
		
		$subject_2 = $_POST['subject_2'];
		
		$point_1 = $_POST['point_1'];
		
		$point_2 = $_POST['point_2'];
		
		$experience_1 = $_POST['experience_1'];
		
		$experience_2 = $_POST['experience_2'];
		
		$deeper_1 = $_POST['deeper_1'];
		
		$deeper_2 = $_POST['deeper_2'];
		
		$special_1 = $_POST['special_1'];
		
		$special_2 = $_POST['special_2'];
		
		$struggle_1 = $_POST['struggle_1'];
		
		$struggle_2 = $_POST['struggle_2'];
		
		$idea_a = $_POST['idea_a_1'];
		
		$idea_a_2 = $_POST['idea_a_2'];
		
		$idea_a_3 = $_POST['idea_a_3'];
		
		$idea_a_4 = $_POST['idea_a_4'];
		
		$idea_a_5 = $_POST['idea_a_5'];
		
		$idea_b = $_POST['idea_b_1'];
		
		$idea_b_2 = $_POST['idea_b_2'];
		
		$idea_b_3 = $_POST['idea_b_3'];
		
		$idea_b_4 = $_POST['idea_b_4'];
		
		$idea_b_5 = $_POST['idea_b_5'];
		
		$lamp = $_POST['lamp'];
		
		$target_a = $_POST['target_a_1'];
		
		$target_a_2 = $_POST['target_a_2'];
		
		$target_a_3 = $_POST['target_a_3'];
		
		$target_b = $_POST['target_b_1'];
		
		$target_b_2 = $_POST['target_b_2'];
		
		$target_b_3 = $_POST['target_b_3'];
		
		$audience = $_POST['audience'];
		
		$motivated = $_POST['motivated'];
		
		$group = $_POST['group'];
		
		$connect = $_POST['connect'];
		
		$best = $_POST['best'];
		
		$make = $_POST['make'];
		
		$save = $_POST['save'];
		
		$time = $_POST['time'];
		
		$effort = $_POST['effort'];
		
		$financial = $_POST['financial'];
		
		$phsyical = $_POST['phsyical'];
		
		$mental = $_POST['mental'];
		
		$emotional = $_POST['emotional'];
		
		$spiritual = $_POST['spiritual'];
		
		$desired = $_POST['desired'];
		
		$accepted = $_POST['accepted'];
		
		$popular = $_POST['popular'];
		
		$healthier = $_POST['healthier'];
		
		$comfort = $_POST['comfort'];
		
		$word = $_POST['word_1'];
		
		$word_2 = $_POST['word_2'];
		
		$word_3 = $_POST['word_3'];
		
		$word_4 = $_POST['word_4'];
		
		$word_5 = $_POST['word_5'];
		
		$word_6 = $_POST['word_6'];
		
		$word_7 = $_POST['word_7'];
		
		$word_8 = $_POST['word_8'];
		
		$word_9 = $_POST['word_9'];
		
		$word_10 = $_POST['word_10'];
		
		$site = $_POST['site_1'];
		
		$site_2 = $_POST['site_2'];
		
		$site_3 = $_POST['site_3'];
		
		$site_4 = $_POST['site_4'];
		
		$site_5 = $_POST['site_5'];
		
		$site_6 = $_POST['site_6'];
		
		$site_7 = $_POST['site_7'];
		
		$site_8 = $_POST['site_8'];
		
		$site_9 = $_POST['site_9'];
		
		$site_10 = $_POST['site_10'];
		
		$search = $_POST['search_1'];
		
		$search_2 = $_POST['search_2'];
		
		$search_3 = $_POST['search_3'];
		
		$search_4 = $_POST['search_4'];
		
		$search_5 = $_POST['search_5'];
		
		$search_6 = $_POST['search_6'];
		
		$search_7 = $_POST['search_7'];

		$massage = "
		
		<head>
			<meta http-equiv='Content-Type' content='text/html; charset=windows-1252'>

								</td>
							</tr>
						</table>
					</td>
				</tr>
			</table><strong></strong><strong></strong><strong> </strong>
			<table width='600' align='center' id='TbFooter' bgcolor='#eea000' border='0' cellspacing='0' cellpadding='4'>
				<tr>
					<td align='center' id='TdFooter' bgcolor='#eea000'>
						<div style='margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);'>
							<div style='margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);'><span
									style='color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-size: inherit; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;'><span
										style='color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;'><br></span></span>
							</div>
							<div style='margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);'><span
									style='color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-size: inherit; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;'><span
										style='color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;'>Regards,</span><br
										style='color: rgb(0, 52, 89);'></span></div>
							<div style='margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);'><span
									style='color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;'>Team
									MyportalX</span></div>
							<div style='margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);'><span
									style='color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;'><br></span>
							</div>
						</div>
					</td>
				</tr>
			</table>
	";
		
		$subject = "Form Submitted";
		
		$header = "From:" . $this->config->item('mail_from') . "\r\n";
		
		$header .= "MIME-Version: 1.0\r\n";
		
		$header .= "Content-type: text/html\r\n";
		
		$retval = mail ($adminemail,$subject,$massage,$header);
		
		
		
		$nots=array(
		
		'sender_id' => $this->userid,
		
		'reciver_id' => $coachsparent_id,
		
		'message' => $coachName.", Filled-Up and submitted <b style='color:#4e73df'>\"Idea Mapping- Niche tightening\"</b> Form
		Today.",
		
		'urls' => "mreport/".$this->userid,
		
		'fld_date' => time()
		
		);
		
		
		
		$this->db->insert('notification',$nots);
		
		
		
		}
		
		
		
		if($this->db->affected_rows()){
		
		$updateData = array(
		
		'completed_date' => time(),
		
		'status' => "1",
		
		'last_modified' => date('Y-m-d H:i:s')
		
		);
		
		$this->db->where(array('fld_form_id' => $row->id, 'fld_user_id' =>$this->userid));
		
		$this->db->update('marketing_form_user',$updateData);
		
		// $successMsg = "Form submitted successfully.";
		
		
		
		//get the updated row
		
		$tbForm = $this->admin_model->get_coaching_forms($this->userid,'idea_mapping');
		
		if(sizeof($tbForm)>0){
		
		$row = $tbForm[0];
		
		}
		
		}
		
		}}
		
		if($this->db->affected_rows()){
		
		$insertFormPossition=array(
		
		'fld_user_id' => $this->userid,
		
		'fld_idea_mapping' => '1'
		
		//'fld_added_date' => time()
		
		);
		
		$userExist=$this->Common_model->user_exist_form_possition($this->userid);
		
		if($userExist){
		
		$this->db->where('fld_user_id',$this->userid);
		
		$this->db->update('form_possition',$insertFormPossition);
		
		}else{
		
		$this->db->insert('form_possition',$insertFormPossition);
		
		}
		
		}else{
		
		echo "Database Error.";
		
		}
		
		$data = array("Form" => $row,
		
		"Error_Message" => $errorMsg,
		
		"Success_Message" => $successMsg
		
		);
		
		
		
		$this->load->view('member/idea_mapping', $data);
		
		}

A-10 Idea Mapping- Niche tightening page View

application/views/member/idea_mapping.php 
<?php
		$this->load->view('member/sidebar');
		$session= $this->session->get_userdata();
		$user_id=$session['user_id'];
		 $completed="";
		error_reporting(0);
		
		$user=$this->db->get_where('users',array('fld_id'=>$user_id));
		        if ($user->num_rows()>0) {
		        $row=$user->row_array();
		
		        $memberName = $row["fld_first_name"] . " " . $row["fld_last_name"];
		        $memberemail = $row["fld_email"];
		        $membersparent_id = $row["fld_parent"];
		        }
		
		        $coach=$this->db->get_where('users',array('fld_id'=>$membersparent_id));
		        if ($coach->num_rows()>0) {
		        $row=$coach->row_array();
		
		        $coachName = $row["fld_first_name"] . " " . $row["fld_last_name"];
		        $coachemail = $row["fld_email"];
		        }
		
		        
		        
		?>

		</ul>

												<td><b>10</b></td>
												<td><textarea name="word_10" class="newarea_width" rows="2"></textarea></td>
											</tr>
										</table>
									</div>

		<div id="reportview" class="modal fade" tabindex="-1">
			<div class="modal-dialog">
				<div class="modal-content">
					<div class="modal-header">
						<h5 class="modal-title">Your Form Was Successfully Submitted!</h5>
						<!--<button type="button" class="close" data-dismiss="modal">&times;</button>-->
					</div>
					<div class="modal-body">
						<!--<input type="text" id="formid">-->
						<div class="text-center">
							<a href="" target="_blank" id="formid" class="btn btn-info">View</a>
							<a href="" target="_blank" id="download" class="btn btn-warning">Save</a>
						</div>
					</div>
					<div class="modal-footer">
						<button type="button" class="btn btn-secondary" data-dismiss="modal">Cancel</button>

		<script>
			setTimeout(function () { notification(); }, 3000);

			function notification() {
				var user_id = "<?= $user_id ?>";
				var form_name = "idea_mapping";
				$.get("<?= base_url('Member/delete_notification') ?>/" + user_id + "/" + form_name, "", function (response) {
					console.log(response);
				});
			}

			$(document).ready(function () {
				$('#btnsubmit').click(function () {
					$('#formsubmit').submit(function (event) {
						event.preventDefault();
						$.ajax({
							url: "<?= base_url("member/ idea_mapping_form") ?>",
							type: "post",
							// dataType: "JSON",
							data: new FormData(this),
							processData: false,
							contentType: false,
							success: function (responce) {
							// console.log(responce);
							$('#formid').attr("href", "<?= base_url('member/marketingview/idea_mapping/') ?>/" + responce);
							$("#download").attr("href", "<?= base_url('member/marketingdownload/idea_mapping/') ?>/" + responce);
							$("#reportview").modal('show');
						},
							error: function (xhr, desc, err) {


						}
		            });
				});
			});
		    });

		</script>
		<!-- START SCRIPTS -->
		<!-- START PLUGINS -->
		<script type="text/javascript" src="<?php echo base_url()." assets/";?>js / plugins / jquery / jquery.min.js"></script>
		<script type="text/javascript" src="<?php echo base_url()." assets/";?>js / plugins / jquery / jquery - ui.min.js"></script>
		<script type="text/javascript" src="<?php echo base_url()." assets/";?>js / plugins / bootstrap / bootstrap.min.js"></script>
		<!-- END PLUGINS -->

B-1 Sales Cycle Process page controller

application/controllers/member.php 
public function sales_cycle()

{

//for email notification get admin and coach detail

$coach=$this->db->get_where('users',array('fld_id'=>$this->userid));

if ($coach->num_rows()>0) {

$row=$coach->row_array();



$coachName = $row["fld_username"] . " " . $row["fld_last_name"];

$coachemail = $row["fld_email"];

$coachsparent_id = $row["fld_parent"];

}



$admin=$this->db->get_where('users',array('fld_id'=>$coachsparent_id));

if ($admin->num_rows()>0) {

$row=$admin->row_array();



$adminName = $row["fld_username"] . " " . $row["fld_last_name"];

$adminemail = $row["fld_email"];

}



$row = array();

$successMsg = "";

$errorMsg = "";

$this->load->model('admin_model');

$tbForm = $this->admin_model->get_coaching_forms($this->userid,'sales_cycle');

if(sizeof($tbForm)>0){

$row = $tbForm[0];

}



if($this->input->post()){

if (isset($_POST['save']))

{

$attract = $_POST['attract'];

$potential = $_POST['potential'];

$ideal = $_POST['ideal'];

$situation = $_POST['situation_1'];

$situation_2 = $_POST['situation_2'];

$situation_3 = $_POST['situation_3'];

$client = $_POST['client'];

$Engage = $_POST['Engage'];

$objective = $_POST['objective'];

$way = $_POST['way_1'];

$way_2 = $_POST['way_2'];

$way_3 = $_POST['way_3'];

$way_4 = $_POST['way_4'];

$way_5 = $_POST['way_5'];

$way_6 = $_POST['way_6'];

$way_7 = $_POST['way_7'];

$way_8 = $_POST['way_8'];

$way_9 = $_POST['way_9'];

$way_10 = $_POST['way_10'];

$stage = $_POST['stage_1'];

$stage_2 = $_POST['stage_2'];

$stage_3 = $_POST['stage_3'];

$achieve = $_POST['achieve_1'];

$achieve_2 = $_POST['achieve_2'];

$achieve_3 = $_POST['achieve_3'];

$achieve_4 = $_POST['achieve_4'];

$achieve_5 = $_POST['achieve_5'];

$achieve_6 = $_POST['achieve_6'];

$achieve_7 = $_POST['achieve_7'];

$achieve_8 = $_POST['achieve_8'];

$achieve_9 = $_POST['achieve_9'];

$achieve_10 = $_POST['achieve_10'];

$cycle = $_POST['cycle'];

$cycle_3 = $_POST['cycle_3'];

$cycle_4 = $_POST['cycle_4'];

$going = $_POST['going'];

$cycle_5 = $_POST['cycle_5'];

$you_going = $_POST['you_going'];





$newData = array(

'attract' => $attract,

'potential' => $potential,

'ideal' => $ideal,

'situation' => $situation,

'situation_2' => $situation_2,

'situation_3' => $situation_3,

'client' => $client,

'Engage' => $Engage,

'objective' => $objective,

'way' => $way,

'way_2' => $way_2,

'way_3' => $way_3,

'way_4' => $way_4,

'way_5' => $way_5,

'way_6' => $way_6,

'way_7' => $way_7,

'way_8' => $way_8,

'way_9' => $way_9,

'way_10' => $way_10,

'stage' => $stage,

'stage_2' => $stage_2,

'stage_3' => $stage_3,

'achieve' => $achieve,

'achieve_2' => $achieve_2,

'achieve_3' => $achieve_3,

'achieve_4' => $achieve_4,

'achieve_5' => $achieve_5,

'achieve_6' => $achieve_6,

'achieve_7' => $achieve_7,

'achieve_8' => $achieve_8,

'achieve_9' => $achieve_9,

'achieve_10' => $achieve_10,

'cycle' => $cycle,

'cycle_3' => $cycle_3,

'cycle_4' => $cycle_4,

'going' => $going,

'cycle_5' => $cycle_5,

'you_going' => $you_going,

'fld_user_id' => $this->userid,

'fld_added_date' =>time()

);



$fill=$this->db->get_where('user_sales_cycle',array('fld_user_id'=>$this->userid));

if ($fill->num_rows()>0)

{

$this->db->where('fld_user_id',$this->userid);

$this->db->update('user_sales_cycle',$newData);

if($query){

echo "<div class=\"alert alert-success\">Form save Successfully!<a href=\"#\" class=\"close\" data-dismiss=\"alert\"
		aria-label=\"close\">&times;</a></div>";

}

}else

{

$query = $this->db->insert('user_sales_cycle', $newData);

$last_id = $this->db->insert_id();

if($query){

echo "<div class=\"alert alert-success\">Form save Successfully!<a href=\"#\" class=\"close\" data-dismiss=\"alert\"
		aria-label=\"close\">&times;</a></div>";

}

}

}



if(isset($_POST['submit'])){

$attract = $_POST['attract'];

$potential = $_POST['potential'];

$ideal = $_POST['ideal'];

$situation = '<br />1. '.$_POST['situation_1'].'<br /><br />2. '.$_POST['situation_2'].'<br /><br />3.
'.$_POST['situation_3'];

$client = $_POST['client'];

$Engage = $_POST['Engage'];

$objective = $_POST['objective'];

$way = '<br />1. '.$_POST['way_1'].'<br /><br />2. '.$_POST['way_2'].'<br /><br />3. '.$_POST['way_3'].'<br /><br />4.
'.$_POST['way_4'].'<br /><br />5. '.$_POST['way_5'].'<br /><br />6. '.$_POST['way_6'].'<br /><br />7.
'.$_POST['way_7'].'<br /><br />8. '.$_POST['way_8'].'<br /><br />9. '.$_POST['way_9'].'<br /><br />10.
'.$_POST['way_10'];

$stage = '<br />1. '.$_POST['stage_1'].'<br /><br />2. '.$_POST['stage_2'].'<br /><br />3. '.$_POST['stage_3'];

$achieve = '<br />1. '.$_POST['achieve_1'].'<br /><br />2. '.$_POST['achieve_2'].'<br /><br />3.
'.$_POST['achieve_3'].'<br /><br />4. '.$_POST['achieve_4'].'<br /><br />5. '.$_POST['achieve_5'].'<br /><br />6.
'.$_POST['achieve_6'].'<br /><br />7. '.$_POST['achieve_7'].'<br /><br />8. '.$_POST['achieve_8'].'<br /><br />9.
'.$_POST['achieve_9'].'<br /><br />10. '.$_POST['achieve_10'];

$cycle = $_POST['cycle'];

$cycle_3 = $_POST['cycle_3'];

$cycle_4 = $_POST['cycle_4'];

$going = $_POST['going'];

$cycle_5 = $_POST['cycle_5'];

$you_going = $_POST['you_going'];





$newData = array(

'attract' => $attract,

'potential' => $potential,

'ideal' => $ideal,

'situation ' => $situation,

'client' => $client,

'Engage' => $Engage,

'objective' => $objective,

'way' => $way,

'stage' => $stage,

'achieve' => $achieve,

'cycle' => $cycle,

'cycle_3' => $cycle_3,

'cycle_4' => $cycle_4,

'going' => $going,

'cycle_5' => $cycle_5,

'you_going' => $you_going,

'fld_user_id' => $this->userid,

'fld_added_date' =>time()

);

$query = $this->db->insert('sales_cycle', $newData);

$last_id = $this->db->insert_id();

if($query){

$massage = "

<head>
	<meta http-equiv='Content-Type' content='text/html; charset=windows-1252'>
	<meta name='GENERATOR' content='MSHTML 11.00.10570.1001'>

<body bgcolor='#ffffff'><strong></strong><strong> </strong><strong></strong>
	<table width='600' align='center' id='TbHeader' bgcolor='#400080' border='0' cellspacing='0' cellpadding='4'>
		<tr>
			<td align='center' id='TdHeader' bgcolor='#400080'>
				<p align='center'>
					<font color='#ffffff' face='Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif' size='6'><strong>Welcome</strong></font>
				</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
	</table>
	<table width='600' align='center' id='TbBodyRow' border='0' cellspacing='0' cellpadding='0'>
		<tr>
			<td id='TdBodyRow' valign='top' bgcolor='#ffffff'>
				<table width='100%' id='TbBody' bgcolor='#ffffff' border='0' cellspacing='0' cellpadding='4'>
					<tr>
						<td align='center' id='TdBody' bgcolor='#ffffff'>
							&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<p align='left'>
								<font color='#000000' face='Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif' size='3'><strong>Hi
										".$adminName."&nbsp;<font color='#000000'
											face='Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif' size='3'>&nbsp;</font></strong>
								</font>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
							</p>
							<p align='justify' style='margin-right: 0px;'>
								<font color='#000000' face='Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif' size='3'>This is an
									auto-generated email to notify you that your client ".$coachName." has filled and
									submitted the form <b>\"B-1 The Sales cycle\"</b> on MyportalX.<br><br>Please check
									out your client reports on MyportalX.</font>
							</p><br></font>
							</font>
							</font>
							</p>
							<p align='left'><br></p>
						</td>
					</tr>
				</table>
			</td>
		</tr>
	</table><strong></strong><strong></strong><strong> </strong>
	<table width='600' align='center' id='TbFooter' bgcolor='#eea000' border='0' cellspacing='0' cellpadding='4'>
		<tr>
			<td align='center' id='TdFooter' bgcolor='#eea000'>
				<div style='margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);'>
					<div style='margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);'><span
							style='color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-size: inherit; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;'><span
								style='color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;'><br></span></span>
					</div>
					<div style='margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);'><span
							style='color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-size: inherit; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;'><span
								style='color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;'>Regards,</span><br
								style='color: rgb(0, 52, 89);'></span></div>
					<div style='margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);'><span
							style='color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;'>Team
							MyportalX</span></div>
					<div style='margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);'><span
							style='color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;'><br></span>
					</div>
				</div>
			</td>
		</tr>
	</table>";

$subject = "Form Submitted";

$header = "From:" . $this->config->item('mail_from') . "\r\n";

$header .= "MIME-Version: 1.0\r\n";

$header .= "Content-type: text/html\r\n";

$retval = mail ($adminemail,$subject,$massage,$header);



$nots=array(

'sender_id' => $this->userid,

'reciver_id' => $coachsparent_id,

'message' => $coachName.", Filled-Up and submitted <b style='color:#4e73df'>\"Sales Cycle Process\"</b> Form Today.",

'urls' => "mreport/".$this->userid,

'fld_date' => time()

);



$this->db->insert('notification',$nots);

echo "<div class=\"alert alert-success\">Form Submitted Successfully!<a href=\"#\" class=\"close\"
		data-dismiss=\"alert\" aria-label=\"close\">&times;</a></div>";

}



if($this->db->affected_rows()){

$updateData = array(

'completed_date' => time(),

'status' => "1",

'last_modified' => date('Y-m-d H:i:s')

);

$this->db->where(array('fld_form_id' => $row->id, 'fld_user_id' =>$this->userid));

$this->db->update('marketing_form_user',$updateData);

$successMsg = "Form Submitted Successfully!";



//get the updated row

$tbForm = $this->admin_model->get_coaching_forms($this->userid,'sales_cycle');

if(sizeof($tbForm)>0){

$row = $tbForm[0];

}

}

}

}

if($this->db->affected_rows()){

$insertFormPossition=array(

'fld_user_id' => $this->userid,

'fld_sales_cycle' => '1'

//'fld_added_date' => time()

);

$userExist=$this->Common_model->user_exist_form_possition($this->userid);

if($userExist){

$this->db->where('fld_user_id',$this->userid);

$this->db->update('form_possition',$insertFormPossition);

}else{

$this->db->insert('form_possition',$insertFormPossition);

}

}else{

echo "Database Error.";

}

$data = array("Form" => $row,

"Error_Message" => $errorMsg,

"Success_Message" => $successMsg

);



$this->load->view('member/sales_cycle', $data);

}

B-1 Sales Cycle Process page View

application/views/member/sales_cycle.php 
<?php
$this->load->view('member/sidebar');
$session= $this->session->get_userdata();
$user_id=$session['user_id'];
 $completed="";
error_reporting(0);

$user=$this->db->get_where('users',array('fld_id'=>$user_id));
        if ($user->num_rows()>0) {
        $row=$user->row_array();

        $memberName = $row["fld_first_name"] . " " . $row["fld_last_name"];
        $memberemail = $row["fld_email"];
        $membersparent_id = $row["fld_parent"];
        }

        $coach=$this->db->get_where('users',array('fld_id'=>$membersparent_id));
        if ($coach->num_rows()>0) {
        $row=$coach->row_array();

        $coachName = $row["fld_first_name"] . " " . $row["fld_last_name"];
        $coachemail = $row["fld_email"];
        }
?>


<!-- START BREADCRUMB -->
<ul class="breadcrumb">
	<li><a href="<?php echo base_url()." member"?>">Home</a></li>
	<li class="active"><a href="">Marketing Client</a></li>
</ul>
<!-- END BREADCRUMB -->
<img src="<?php echo base_url()." assets/images/marketing.jpg"?>" width="100%"/>
<!-- PAGE CONTENT WRAPPER -->
<div class="page-content-wrap">
	<!-- PAGE TITLE -->
	<div class="page-title">
		<h2 style="color:#006600">B-1 Sales Cycle Process</h2>
	</div>
	<!-- END PAGE TITLE -->
	<div class="page-content-wrap">
		<?php if ($Form->completed_date == ""){
                    	$fill=$this->db->get_where('user_sales_cycle',array('fld_user_id'=>$user_id));
            if ($fill->num_rows()>0) 
            { 
                $row=$fill->row_array(); ?>
		<form action="#" role="form" id="formsubmit" class="form-horizontal form-material" method="post">
			<div class="row">
				<div class="col-md-12">
					<div class="panel panel-default">
						<div class="panel-body">
							<h2 style="color:red">Sales Cycle Process Questions</h2>
							<p>Maanas Coaching Sales Cycle Process: Build relationships of trust with your clients by
								understanding six key points and from these points, develop a five-stage sales cycle.
							</p>
							<ul>
								<li><b>Key #1:</b> Who is your target client or customer?</li>
								<li><b>Key #2:</b> What are they looking for?</li>
								<li><b>Key #3:</b> When do they look for you?</li>
								<li><b>Key #4:</b> Where Do They Look For You?</li>
								<li><b>Key #5:</b> Why You?</li>
								<li><b>Key #6::</b> How do you want them to engage with you?</li>
							</ul>
							<h4>Written Exercise</h4>
							<h3>Key Number One: Who Is Your Target Client or Customer?</h3>
							<p style="color:red">Example:
								My friend Pam Marcello is an excellent yoga teacher. She is 45 years of age, divorced
								and has a 14-year-old daughter named Kristine. She lives in Culver City in a gated
								community, 4 miles from Santa Monica beach. She loves to do yoga on the beach and also
								jog with her dog-rondo. She works at a studio in Santa Monica and has several personal
								clients whom she teaches yoga. At present, she also works part-time at a marketing
								agency as a salesperson. Her annual income is around $60K. She is interested in
								enhancing her yoga income and would like to learn how to coach. She loves to eat out and
								wear designer clothes.
							</p>



							<div class="form-group">
								<label for="exampleInputEmail1">
									<h4><b>B.1.1 Written Exercise: Your turn.</b></h4>Describe whom you'd like to
									attract into your sales cycle: Who is your target client or customer? Describe what
									she is like. Get really creative with this one. List as many specific details as you
									can.
								</label><br /><br />
								<textarea name="attract" class="area_width" rows="3"><?= $row['attract'] ?></textarea>
								<span class="form-bar"></span>
							</div>
							<h4><b>B.1.2 Written Exercise:</b></h4>
							<h3>Key Number Two: What Are They Looking For? </h3>
							<p style="color:red">Examples : In my case, she is looking for an online course or a program
								that will teach her how to help her clients create a lasting change in their personal
								life. She would like a group or private coaching or perhaps a system that will teach her
								step by step how to help her client in their transformation journey. </p>
							<div class="form-group">
								<label for="exampleInputEmail1"> What are your potential clients looking for?</label>
								<textarea name="potential" class="area_width"
									rows="3"><?= $row['potential'] ?></textarea>
								<span class="form-bar"></span>
							</div>

							<h4><b>B.1.3 Written Exercise</b></h4>
							<h3>Key Number Three: Where Do They Look for You? :</h3>

							<div class="form-group">
								<label for="exampleInputEmail1">Where do your ideal clients look to you?</label>
								<textarea name="ideal" class="area_width" rows="3"><?= $row['ideal'] ?></textarea>
								<span class="form-bar"></span>
							</div>

							<h4><b>B1.4 Written Exercise</b></h4>
							<h3>Key Number Four: When Do They Look for You?</h3>

							<p style="color:red">Examples: In my case, a life coach is struggling to pay their bills or
								have to let go of their VA because she does not have enough income to support the VA or
								one or two of their clients have decided to take a break from their service.</p>

							<div class="form-group">
								<label for="exampleInputEmail1">When do they look for you? : Describe the top (3) three
									situations that are likely to drive your potential clients to seek your services,
									products, and programs.</label>
								<textarea name="situation_1" class="area_width"
									rows="3"><?= $row['situation'] ?></textarea>
								<textarea name="situation_2" class="area_width"
									rows="3"><?= $row['situation_2'] ?></textarea>
								<textarea name="situation_3" class="area_width"
									rows="3"><?= $row['situation_3'] ?></textarea>

							</div>

							<h4><b>B.1.5 Written Exercise</b></h4>
							<h3>Key Number Five: Why Should They Choose You?</h3>

							<div class="form-group">
								<label for="exampleInputEmail1">Why should your potential clients choose you? (Don't you
									dare skip this one! Be bold! Express yourself fully. Remember, this is not the time
									for modesty.)</label>
								<textarea name="client" class="area_width" rows="3"><?= $row['client'] ?></textarea>
								<span class="form-bar"></span>
							</div>


							<h4><b>B.1.6 Written Exercise</b></h4>
							<h3>Key Number Six: How Do You Want Them to Engage with You?</h3>
							<p style="color:red">(Example: My choice of 1st contact is the Facebook page because it
								shows the human side of me. And it also establishes a line of direct communication. This
								is the first step in earning their trust.)</p>
							<div class="form-group">
								<textarea name="Engage" class="area_width" rows="3"><?= $row['Engage'] ?></textarea>
								<span class="form-bar"></span>
							</div>

							<h3>Maanas Coaching Sales Cycle-Stage One</h3>

							</div>

								<label for="exampleInputEmail1">How are you going to achieve it?</label>
								<textarea name="cycle_3" class="area_width" rows="3"><?= $row['cycle_3'] ?></textarea>
								<span class="form-bar"></span>
							</div>
							<h3>Book Yourself Solid Sales Cycle-Stage Four</h3>
							<p style="color:red">Rajah's Stage Four Example : My Stage Four objective is to enroll ideal
								clients in my online group program or in one on one coaching on the portal so I can lead
								them through this exercises and help them get clarity with their program.</p>

							<h4>B.1.10 Written Exercise </h4>
							<h3>Book Yourself Solid Sales Cycle-Stage Four:</h3>

							<div class="form-group">
								<label for="exampleInputEmail1">What is your objective in Stage Four of the
									cycle?</label>
								<textarea name="cycle_4" class="newarea_width"
									rows="2"><?= $row['cycle_4'] ?></textarea>
							</div>

							<div class="form-group">
								<label for="exampleInputEmail1">How are you going to achieve it?</label>
								<textarea name="going" class="area_width" rows="3"><?= $row['going'] ?></textarea>
								<span class="form-bar"></span>
							</div>



							<h3>Maanas Coaching Sales Cycle-Stage Five</h3>
							<p style="color:red">Rajah's Stage Five Example: My Stage Five objective is to enroll ideal
								VIP clients into my Retreat to India Intensive, a 14 day program that delivers small
								group coaching and mentoring programs in a very personal environment. Even though people
								may skip the flow and come directly for the retreat, but it is best to lay out a road
								map to direct the flow and introduce your offerings.</p>

							<h4>B.1.11 Written Exercise : </h4>
							<h3>Book Coaching Sales Cycle Stage Five:</h3>
							<div class="form-group">
								<label for="exampleInputEmail1">What is your objective in Stage Five of the cycle?
								</label>
								<textarea name="cycle_5" class="area_width" rows="3"><?= $row['cycle_5'] ?></textarea>
								<span class="form-bar"></span>
							</div>

							<div class="form-group">
								<label for="exampleInputEmail1">How are you going to achieve it? How are you going to
									engage them?</label>
								<textarea name="you_going" class="area_width"
									rows="3"><?= $row['you_going'] ?></textarea>
								<span class="form-bar"></span>
							</div>

							<input type="submit" name="delete" class="btn btn-default" value="Clear Form">
							<a href="<?= base_url('coaching_session') ?>" class="btn btn-info">back</a>
							<input type="submit" name="submit" value="Submit" id="btnsubmit"
								class="btn btn-primary pull-right">
							<input type="submit" name="save" value="save" style="margin-right:20px"
								class="btn btn-info pull-right">
						</div>

			</div>
	</div>

			<div class="col-md-12">
				<div class="panel panel-default">
					<div class="panel-body">
						<h2 style="color:red">Sales Cycle Process Questions</h2>
						<p>Maanas Coaching Sales Cycle Process: Build relationships of trust with your clients by
							understanding six key points and from these points, develop a five-stage sales cycle.</p>
						<ul>
							<li><b>Key #1:</b> Who is your target client or customer?</li>
							<li><b>Key #2:</b> What are they looking for?</li>
							<li><b>Key #3:</b> When do they look for you?</li>
							<li><b>Key #4:</b> Where Do They Look For You?</li>
							<li><b>Key #5:</b> Why You?</li>
							<li><b>Key #6::</b> How do you want them to engage with you?</li>
						</ul>
						<h4>Written Exercise</h4>
						<h3>Key Number One: Who Is Your Target Client or Customer?</h3>
						<p style="color:red">Example:
							My friend Pam Marcello is an excellent yoga teacher. She is 45 years of age, divorced and
							has a 14-year-old daughter named Kristine. She lives in Culver City in a gated community, 4
							miles from Santa Monica beach. She loves to do yoga on the beach and also jog with her
							dog-rondo. She works at a studio in Santa Monica and has several personal clients whom she
							teaches yoga. At present, she also works part-time at a marketing agency as a salesperson.
							Her annual income is around $60K. She is interested in enhancing her yoga income and would
							like to learn how to coach. She loves to eat out and wear designer clothes.
						</p>

<!-- Modal HTML -->
<div id="reportview" class="modal fade" tabindex="-1">
	<div class="modal-dialog">
		<div class="modal-content">
			<div class="modal-header">
				<h5 class="modal-title">Your Form Was Successfully Submitted!</h5>
				<!--<button type="button" class="close" data-dismiss="modal">&times;</button>-->
			</div>
			<div class="modal-body">
				<!--<input type="text" id="formid">-->
				<div class="text-center">
					<a href="" target="_blank" id="formid" class="btn btn-info">View</a>
					<a href="" target="_blank" id="download" class="btn btn-warning">Save</a>
				</div>
			</div>
			<div class="modal-footer">
				<button type="button" class="btn btn-secondary" data-dismiss="modal">Cancel</button>
				<!--<button type="button" class="btn btn-primary">Save</button>-->

		</div>
	</div>
</div>
<script>
	setTimeout(function () { notification(); }, 3000);

	function notification() {
		var user_id = "<?= $user_id ?>";
		var form_name = "sales_cycle";
		$.get("<?= base_url('Member/delete_notification') ?>/" + user_id + "/" + form_name, "", function (response) {
			console.log(response);
		});
	}

	$(document).ready(function () {
		$('#btnsubmit').click(function () {
			$('#formsubmit').submit(function (event) {
				event.preventDefault();
				$.ajax({
					url: "<?= base_url("member/ sales_cycle_form") ?>",
					type: "post",
					// dataType: "JSON",
					data: new FormData(this),
					processData: false,
					contentType: false,
					success: function (responce) {
					// console.log(responce);
					$('#formid').attr("href", "<?= base_url('member/marketingview/sales_cycle/') ?>/" + responce);
					$("#download").attr("href", "<?= base_url('member/marketingdownload/sales_cycle/') ?>/" + responce);
					$("#reportview").modal('show');
				},
					error: function (xhr, desc, err) {


				}
            });
		});
	});
    });
</script>
<!-- START SCRIPTS -->

<?php
$this->load->view('member/footer');
?>

B-2 Self-Promotion Strategies page controller

application/controllers/member.php 
public function self_promotion_strategies()



{

//for email notification get admin and coach detail

$coach=$this->db->get_where('users',array('fld_id'=>$this->userid));

if ($coach->num_rows()>0) {

$row=$coach->row_array();



$coachName = $row["fld_username"] . " " . $row["fld_last_name"];

$coachemail = $row["fld_email"];

$coachsparent_id = $row["fld_parent"];

}



$admin=$this->db->get_where('users',array('fld_id'=>$coachsparent_id));

if ($admin->num_rows()>0) {

$row=$admin->row_array();



$adminName = $row["fld_username"] . " " . $row["fld_last_name"];

$adminemail = $row["fld_email"];

}



$row = array();

$successMsg = "";

$errorMsg = "";

$this->load->model('admin_model');

$tbForm = $this->admin_model->get_coaching_forms($this->userid,'self_promotion_strategies');

if(sizeof($tbForm)>0){

$row = $tbForm[0];

}



if($this->input->post()){
if ($this->input->post('delete'))
{
$this->db->delete('user_self_promotion_strategies', array('fld_user_id' => $this->userid));
}
if (isset($_POST['save']))

{

$support = $_POST['support_1'];

$support_2 = $_POST['support_2'];

$support_3 = $_POST['support_3'];

$support_4 = $_POST['support_4'];

$support_5 = $_POST['support_5'];

$contact = $_POST['contact_1'];

$contact_2 = $_POST['contact_2'];

$contact_3 = $_POST['contact_3'];

$contact_4 = $_POST['contact_4'];

$contact_5 = $_POST['contact_5'];

$people_a = $_POST['people_a_1'];

$people_a_2 = $_POST['people_a_2'];

$thing_a = $_POST['thing_a_1'];

$thing_a_2 = $_POST['thing_a_2'];

$people_b = $_POST['people_b_1'];

$people_b_2 = $_POST['people_b_2'];

$thing_b = $_POST['thing_b_1'];

$thing_b_2 = $_POST['thing_b_2'];

$people_c = $_POST['people_c_1'];

$people_c_2 = $_POST['people_c_2'];

$thing_c = $_POST['thing_c_1'];

$thing_c_2 = $_POST['thing_c_2'];

$people_d = $_POST['people_d_1'];

$people_d_2 = $_POST['people_d_2'];

$thing_d = $_POST['thing_d_1'];

$thing_d_2 = $_POST['thing_d_2'];

$network = $_POST['network_1'];

$network_2 = $_POST['network_2'];

$network_3 = $_POST['network_3'];

$network_4 = $_POST['network_4'];

$network_5 = $_POST['network_5'];

$find = $_POST['find_1'];

$find_2 =$_POST['find_2'];

$find_3 =$_POST['find_3'];

$find_4 =$_POST['find_4'];

$find_5 =$_POST['find_5'];

$book = $_POST['book_1'];

$book_2 =$_POST['book_2'];

$book_3 =$_POST['book_3'];

$book_4 =$_POST['book_4'];

$book_5 =$_POST['book_5'];

$experience = $_POST['experience_1'];

$fill=$this->db->get_where('user_self_promotion_strategies',array('fld_user_id'=>$this->userid));

if ($fill->num_rows()>0)

{

$this->db->where('fld_user_id',$this->userid);

$query = $this->db->update('user_self_promotion_strategies',$newData);

if($query){

echo "<div class=\"alert alert-success\">Form save Successfully!<a href=\"#\" class=\"close\" data-dismiss=\"alert\"
		aria-label=\"close\">&times;</a></div>";

}

}else

{

$query = $this->db->insert('user_self_promotion_strategies', $newData);

$last_id = $this->db->insert_id();

if($query){

echo "<div class=\"alert alert-success\">Form save Successfully!<a href=\"#\" class=\"close\" data-dismiss=\"alert\"
		aria-label=\"close\">&times;</a></div>";

}

}

}

'leader' => $leader,

'competitor' => $competitor,

'post_2' => $post_2,

'subject' => $subject,

'video' => $video,

'create' => $create,

'linkedin' => $linkedin,

'fld_user_id' => $this->userid,

'fld_added_date' =>time()

);

$query = $this->db->insert('self_promotion_strategies', $newData);

$last_id = $this->db->insert_id();

if($query){

$massage = "

<head>
	<meta http-equiv='Content-Type' content='text/html; charset=windows-1252'>
	<meta name='GENERATOR' content='MSHTML 11.00.10570.1001'>

<body bgcolor='#ffffff'><strong></strong><strong> </strong><strong></strong>

		<tr>
			<td align='center' id='TdHeader' bgcolor='#400080'>
				<p align='center'>
					<font color='#ffffff' face='Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif' size='6'><strong>Welcome</strong></font>
				</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
	</table>

		<tr>
			<td id='TdBodyRow' valign='top' bgcolor='#ffffff'>

					<tr>

							&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<p align='left'>

										".$adminName."&nbsp;<font color='#000000'
											face='Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif' size='3'>&nbsp;</font></strong>
								</font>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
							</p>
							<p align='justify' style='margin-right: 0px;'>
								<font color='#000000' face='Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif' size='3'>This is an
									auto-generated email to notify you that your client ".$coachName." has filled and
									submitted the form <b>\"B-2 Self- Promotion strategies\"</b> on
									MyportalX.<br><br>Please check out your client reports on MyportalX.</font>
							</p><br></font>
							</font>
							</font>
							</p>
							<p align='left'><br></p>
						</td>
					</tr>
				</table>
			</td>
		</tr>
	</table><strong></strong><strong></strong><strong> </strong>
	<table width='600' align='center' id='TbFooter' bgcolor='#eea000' border='0' cellspacing='0' cellpadding='4'>
		<tr>
			<td align='center' id='TdFooter' bgcolor='#eea000'>
				<div style='margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);'>
					<div style='margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);'><span
							style='color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-size: inherit; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;'><span
								style='color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;'><br></span></span>
					</div>
					<div style='margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);'><span
							style='color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-size: inherit; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;'><span
								style='color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;'>Regards,</span><br
								style='color: rgb(0, 52, 89);'></span></div>
					<div style='margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);'><span
							style='color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;'>Team
							MyportalX</span></div>
					<div style='margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);'><span
							style='color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;'><br></span>
					</div>
				</div>
			</td>
		</tr>
	</table>";

$subject = "Form Submitted";

$header = "From:" . $this->config->item('mail_from') . "\r\n";

$header .= "MIME-Version: 1.0\r\n";

$header .= "Content-type: text/html\r\n";

$retval = mail ($adminemail,$subject,$massage,$header);



$nots=array(

'sender_id' => $this->userid,

'reciver_id' => $coachsparent_id,

'message' => $coachName.", Filled-Up and submitted <b style='color:#4e73df'>\"Self-Promotion Strategies\"</b> Form
Today.",

'urls' => "mreport/".$this->userid,

'fld_date' => time()

);



$this->db->insert('notification',$nots);

echo "<div class=\"alert alert-success\">Form Submitted Successfully!<a href=\"#\" class=\"close\"
		data-dismiss=\"alert\" aria-label=\"close\">&times;</a></div>";

}



if($this->db->affected_rows()){

$updateData = array(

'completed_date' => time(),

'status' => "1",

'last_modified' => date('Y-m-d H:i:s')

);

$this->db->where(array('fld_form_id' => $row->id, 'fld_user_id' =>$this->userid));

$this->db->update('marketing_form_user',$updateData);

$successMsg = "Form submitted successfully.";



//get the updated row

$tbForm = $this->admin_model->get_coaching_forms($this->userid,'self_promotion_strategies');

if(sizeof($tbForm)>0){

$row = $tbForm[0];

}

}

}

}

if($this->db->affected_rows()){

$insertFormPossition=array(

'fld_user_id' => $this->userid,

'fld_self_promotion_strategies' => '1'

//'fld_added_date' => time()

);

$userExist=$this->Common_model->user_exist_form_possition($this->userid);

if($userExist){

$this->db->where('fld_user_id',$this->userid);

$this->db->update('form_possition',$insertFormPossition);

}else{

$this->db->insert('form_possition',$insertFormPossition);

}

}else{

echo "Database Error.";

}

$data = array("Form" => $row,

"Error_Message" => $errorMsg,

"Success_Message" => $successMsg

);



$this->load->view('member/self_promotion_strategies', $data);

}

B-2 Self-Promotion Strategies page View

application/views/member/self_promotion_strategies.php 
<?php
$this->load->view('member/sidebar');
$session= $this->session->get_userdata();
$user_id=$session['user_id'];
 $completed="";
error_reporting(0);

$user=$this->db->get_where('users',array('fld_id'=>$user_id));
        if ($user->num_rows()>0) {
        $row=$user->row_array();

        $memberName = $row["fld_first_name"] . " " . $row["fld_last_name"];
        $memberemail = $row["fld_email"];
        $membersparent_id = $row["fld_parent"];
        }

        $coach=$this->db->get_where('users',array('fld_id'=>$membersparent_id));
        if ($coach->num_rows()>0) {
        $row=$coach->row_array();

        $coachName = $row["fld_first_name"] . " " . $row["fld_last_name"];
        $coachemail = $row["fld_email"];
        }
?>


<!-- START BREADCRUMB -->
<ul class="breadcrumb">
	<li><a href="<?php echo base_url()." member"?>">Home</a></li>
	<li class="active"><a href="">Marketing Client</a></li>
</ul>
<!-- END BREADCRUMB -->
<img src="<?php echo base_url()." assets/images/marketing.jpg"?>" height="300" width="100%"/>

<div class="page-content-wrap">
	<!-- PAGE TITLE -->

	</div>
	<!-- END PAGE TITLE -->
	<div class="page-content-wrap">

								connection with someone? List five connections that would have been made if you had just

								well as enhancing your network.</p>

								<tr>
									<td><b>4.</b></td>
									<td><textarea name="opportunities_4" class="newarea_width"
											rows="2"><?= $row['opportunities_4'] ?></textarea></td>
								</tr>
								<tr>
									<td><b>5.</b></td>
									<td><textarea name="opportunities_5" class="newarea_width"
											rows="2"><?= $row['opportunities_5'] ?></textarea></td>
								</tr>

							</table>


							<h3>Maanas Coaching Direct Outreach Strategy</h3>
							<h4><b>B.2.9 Written Exercise:</b></h4>
							<p>Identify a minimum of three and a maximum of 20 people you'd like to reach out to
								directly and personally. (These may be prospective clients, decision makers at an
								organization or association, or the press.) At this moment, you might not think you can
								fill out your list of 20, but now that you know what you need to do, you'll start to
								take notice of the people you should add to this list. You'll see in a minute how your
								list will grow far beyond just 20 people.</p>

							<table width="100%">
								<tr>
									<td style="width:80px"><b>1.</b></td>
									<td style="padding-right:40px"><textarea name="name_a_1" class="newarea_width"
											rows="2"><?= $row['name_a'] ?></textarea></td>
									<td style="width:80px"><b>1.</b></td>

							<h4><b>B.2.10 Maanas Coaching Action Step:</b></h4>
							<p>Reach out to the first person on your list of 20 and then add her to your follow-up
								system. Then add a new person to your list of 20.</p>

							<h4><b>B.2.11 Written Exercise: </b></h4>
							<p>List five wild, wacky, and unique ways to make a personal connection, especially with
								anyone you've been unsuccessful connecting within the more traditional ways.</p>

							<h3>The Maanas Referral Strategy</h3>
							<h4><b>B.2.12 Written Exercise:</b></h4>
							<h5>Start by remembering the last time a quality referralcame to you:</h5>

							<div class="form-group">
								<label for="exampleInputEmail1">From whom did the referral come?</label>
								<textarea name="referral" class="newarea_width"
									rows="2"><?= $row['referral'] ?></textarea>
							</div>

							<div class="form-group">
								<label for="exampleInputEmail1">What was the referral for, specifically?</label>
								<textarea name="specifically" class="newarea_width"
									rows="2"><?= $row['specifically'] ?></textarea>
							</div>

							<div class="form-group">
								<label for="exampleInputEmail1">Did the referral need your services immediately?</label>
								<textarea name="services" class="newarea_width"
									rows="2"><?= $row['services'] ?></textarea>
							</div>

							<div class="form-group">
								<label for="exampleInputEmail1">How were you contacted-by the person making the referral
									or the potential client?</label>
								<textarea name="potential" class="newarea_width"
									rows="2"><?= $row['potential'] ?></textarea>
							</div>

							<div class="form-group">
								<label for="exampleInputEmail1">Had you educated the referrer about your services before
									he made the referral?</label>
								<textarea name="educated" class="newarea_width"
									rows="2"><?= $row['educated'] ?></textarea>
							</div>

							<div class="form-group">
								<label for="exampleInputEmail1">How did you accept the referral and follow up?</label>
								<textarea name="follow" class="newarea_width" rows="2"><?= $row['follow'] ?></textarea>
							</div>

							<div class="form-group">
								<label for="exampleInputEmail1">Is that new referral a continuing client today?</label>
								<textarea name="client" class="newarea_width" rows="2"><?= $row['client'] ?></textarea>
							</div>

							<p>You may have already noticed some of your strengths in generating referrals, or perhaps
								parts of the process need a little of your attention. Either way, we're creating an easy
								and profitable process.</p>

							<h4><b>B.2.13 Written Exercise:</b></h4>
							<p> Write down the types of people you want your clients, associates, friends, and family to
								refer to you. Your friends and family may have no idea whom to refer to you.</p>
							<p style="color:red">Examples: Family members, best friends, neighbors, acquaintances, work
								as-sociates, small business owners, executives, people going through divorce or
								struggling financially.</p>

							<h4><b>B.2.14 Written Exercise:</b></h4>
							<h5>Write down how you'd like your referrers to refer their contacts for you.</h5>

							<div class="form-group">
								<label for="exampleInputEmail1">What do you want them to say?</label>
								<textarea name="want" class="newarea_width" rows="2"><?= $row['want'] ?></textarea>
							</div>
							<div class="form-group">
								<label for="exampleInputEmail1">How do you want them to talk about what you do?</label>
								<textarea name="talk" class="newarea_width" rows="2"><?= $row['talk'] ?></textarea>
							</div>
							<div class="form-group">
								<label for="exampleInputEmail1">What specific words and phrases do you want them to
									use?</label>
								<textarea name="words" class="newarea_width" rows="2"><?= $row['words'] ?></textarea>
							</div>
							<div class="form-group">
								<label for="exampleInputEmail1">Do you want them to say that you are "the best"?</label>
								<textarea name="best" class="newarea_width" rows="2"><?= $row['best'] ?></textarea>
							</div>
							<div class="form-group">
								<label for="exampleInputEmail1">Do you want them to mention that you recently received
									an award for out-standing community service?</label>
								<textarea name="mention" class="newarea_width"
									rows="2"><?= $row['mention'] ?></textarea>
							</div>
							<div class="form-group">
								<label for="exampleInputEmail1">Get very specific. Think of yourself as a one-person PR
									firm. You decide how you want people to talk about you.</label>
								<textarea name="specific" class="newarea_width"
									rows="2"><?= $row['specific'] ?></textarea>
							</div>

							<h4><b>B.2.15 Maanas Action Step:</b></h4>
							<h5>Make the commitment to ask for referrals every day for five days straight.</h5>
							<h3>Keep-in-Touch Strategy</h3>

							<h3>The Maanas Blogging Strategy</h3>
							<h4><b>B.2.19 Written Exercise:</b></h4>
							<p> List five subjects you would feel comfortable writing
								about on the basis of your passions, your personal interests, your areas of ex-pertise,
								the life lessons you've learned, and what your target market is interested
								in learning. Once you've chosen one subject area to write about, you're ready to
								narrow it down to an ideal topic.</p>

							<h4><b>B.2.21 Written Exercise:</b></h4>
							<p> Create five titles based on your topic choices. Re-member, titles need to summarize in a
								few words what your article is about and
								be intriguing enough to make people who are interested in that topic-and eventhose who
								aren't!-want to read more. If you can fit in your top keyword phrase,so much the better!
							</p>

							<table width="100%">
								<tr>
									<td></td>
									<td><b>Titles</b></td>
								</tr>
								<tr>
									<td style="width:80px"><b>1.</b></td>
									<td><textarea name="title_1" class="newarea_width"
											rows="2"><?= $row['title'] ?></textarea></td>
								</tr>
								<tr>
									<td><b>2.</b></td>
									<td><textarea name="title_2" class="newarea_width"
											rows="2"><?= $row['title_2'] ?></textarea></td>
								</tr>
								<tr>
									<td><b>3.</b></td>
									<td><textarea name="title_3" class="newarea_width"
											rows="2"><?= $row['title_3'] ?></textarea></td>
								</tr>
								<tr>
									<td><b>4.</b></td>
									<td><textarea name="title_4" class="newarea_width"
											rows="2"><?= $row['title_4'] ?></textarea></td>
								</tr>
								<tr>
									<td><b>5.</b></td>
									<td><textarea name="title_5" class="newarea_width"
											rows="2"><?= $row['title_5'] ?></textarea></td>
								</tr>

							</table>

							<h4><b>B.2.22 Written Exercise:</b></h4>
							<p>Write your lead-in paragraph by presenting the most important information first. Remember
								to address the topic presented in your title and explain to your readers what they will
								gain from your article. Here's where you get to appeal personally to the readers by
								telling them how you can help them learn something new, solve a problem, or simply
								entertain them for a short while.</p>


							<textarea name="paragraph" class="area_width" rows="3"><?= $row['paragraph'] ?></textarea>


							<h4><b>B.2.23 Written Exercise:</b></h4>
							<p>It is time to write the body of your article. You need to
								elaborate on and fulfill the promise made in your introduction by backing up your
								statements with facts. Refer back to the points listed earlier if you get stuck. And
								remember that you don't have to get all the words perfect in the first draft. Much
								of writing is about rewriting and editing. At this point, concentrate on the broad
								strokes and allow yourself to enjoy the process.
							</p>


							<textarea name="promise" class="area_width" rows="3"><?= $row['promise'] ?></textarea>

							<h4><b>B.2.24 Written Exercise:</b></h4>
							<p>End your article with a strong closing. Write a conclusion by summarizing your key points
								from the body of the article and tell the read-
								ers how they can best use the information you just gave them.</p>


							<textarea name="strong" class="area_width" rows="3"><?= $row['strong'] ?></textarea>

							<h4><b>B.2.25 Written Exercise:</b></h4>
							<p>Create your author resource box. Remember to include
								your area of expertise, your business or offer, a specific call to action, and
								perti-nent contact information and links.</p>


							<textarea name="author" class="area_width" rows="3"><?= $row['author'] ?></textarea>



							<h4><b>B.2.26 Maanas Action Step:</b></h4>
							<p>Compile all the accumulated elements of your
								research and writing to complete one article of 500 to 750 words on the topic of
								your choice, including the resource box. When it's polished to your satisfaction,
								share it with friends, colleagues, or a writing group to gain valuable insight on
								your writing progress.</p>

							<h4><b>B.2.27 Written Exercise:</b></h4>
							<p>Decide on an ongoing schedule for submitting your
								articles. This can be weekly, every other week, or monthly.</p>

							<h4><b>B.2.28 Maanas Coaching Action Step :</b></h4>
							<p>Schedule the time you'll need to write and
								submit new articles and then do it, or hire a virtual assistant who is experienced
								in online article submission and have him do it for you.</p>

							<h4><b>B.2.29 Maanas Action Step:</b></h4>
							<p>Find the most active online communities
								that serve your target market and are focused on topics you know a lot about. As
								a member of the group, you can make intelligent, thoughtful posts that add value
								to the discussion topic. You might answer other member's questions or you might
								suggest helpful resources or simply provide your opinions on issues that relate to
								your industry. And you never know-you may learn a lot by reading what others
								have to say.</p>

							<h4><b>B.2.30 Written Exercise:</b></h4>

							<div class="form-group">
								<label for="exampleInputEmail1">Come up with several of your own unique ideas for
									cross-promotions and identify who might be a good marketing partner. Make a list of
									5 names</label>
								<table width="100%">
									<tr>
										<td style="width:80px"><b>1.</b></td>
										<td><textarea name="partner_1" class="newarea_width"
												rows="2"><?= $row['partner'] ?></textarea></td>
									</tr>
									<tr>
										<td><b>2.</b></td>
										<td><textarea name="partner_2" class="newarea_width"
												rows="2"><?= $row['partner_2'] ?></textarea></td>
									</tr>
									<tr>
										<td><b>3.</b></td>
										<td><textarea name="partner_3" class="newarea_width"
												rows="2"><?= $row['partner_3'] ?></textarea></td>
									</tr>
									<tr>
										<td><b>4.</b></td>
										<td><textarea name="partner_4" class="newarea_width"
												rows="2"><?= $row['partner_4'] ?></textarea></td>
									</tr>
									<tr>
										<td><b>5.</b></td>
										<td><textarea name="partner_5" class="newarea_width"
												rows="2"><?= $row['partner_5'] ?></textarea></td>
									</tr>

								</table>
								<span class="form-bar"></span>
							</div>


							<h4><b>B.2.31 Maanas Action Step: </b></h4>
							<p>Reach out, connect with, and share your
								ideas with the people you identified in the preceding exercise.</p>

							<h4><b>B.2.32 Maanas Action Step: </b></h4>
							<p>Create, or hire someone to create, a tell-a-
								friend form and begin using it.</p>

							<h4><b>B.2.33 Maanas Action Step: </b></h4>
							<p>Write a press release about the most
								impressive result one of your clients achieved and submit it to PRWeb.com
								You can get tips at the site on how to craft a solid press release. Or, go to
								Get Known Get Clients.com for more information on online PR and social media
								marketing strategies.</p>


							<h4><b>B.2.34 Maanas Action Step: </b></h4>
							<p>Go to google.com/ads and set up an ac-
								count. Then create a test ad campaign for one of your products or services. Make
								sure that you cap your daily spending at a low amount so that you learn how to
								profit from pay-per-click before you rack up significant fees. Google.com has
								great tutorials and help pages that can answer your questions. Track your con-
								version so you know what kind of return on your investment you are getting.</p>

							<h4><b>B.2.35 Maanas Action Step: </b></h4>
							<p>If you don't already have an e-course, the special report, or another enticement to offer
								your visitors, create one. Then ensure that you have an opt-in for your offer displayed
								prominently on your site.</p>

							<h4><b>B.2.36Maanas Action Step: </b></h4>
							<p>If you don't already have an autoresponder
								a system to help potential clients consume your offer set one up.</p><br />

							<h3>PART 3: BUILDING YOUR SOCIAL MEDIA PLATFORM</h3>

							<h4><b>B.2.37 Maanas Action Step:</b></h4>
							<p>If you haven't already done so, create your profile on Facebook and complete the
								information on your profile's "Info" tab. Make sure you include your bio, which should
								present your Who and Do What Statement and your Why I Do It Statement. Also, make sure
								you include your busines's URL.</p>

								website in the "Detailed Information" section of the "Info" tab. Invite those among your
								Facebook "friends"</p>

						<div class="panel-body">
							<h2 style="color:red">Self-Promotion Strategies Questions</h2>
							<p>Now that we have clarity of what we want to do and whom we want to serve and also mapped
								out the process, we are ready to go out in the world and announce our investiture to the
								coaching world. So in this module, we will work on self-promotion strategies that will
								help you accomplish your goal and at the same time enjoy the marketing and selling
								process until it becomes second nature to you.</p>
							<h3>The Maanas Networking Strategy </h3>
							<h4><b>B.2.1 Written Exercise:</b></h4>
							<p>List five people in your network who consistently sup-port you by sending referrals,
								giving you advice, or doing anything else that's
								helpful. Then identify someone in your network for each of these five people whom you
								could connect them with. Whom do you know who will add value to their work or life? Is
								it a potential client, a potential business partner, a potential vendor?</p>

							<div class="form-group">
								<label for="exampleInputEmail1">A Person who supports you, Person, to
									Connect</label><br>
								<table width="100%">
									<tr>

							<h4><b>B.2.5 Written Exercise: </b></h4>
							<p>Books aren't our only source of knowledge. As you know, your life experience,
								observations, and conversations are all sources of knowledge as well. Think about the
								many areas in which you're knowledgeable and list a minimum of five. Have fun with this
								and just let it flow. If you know a lot about fishing include it! You never know what
								subject might help make a connection.</p>

							<h3>Maanas Coaching Direct Outreach Strategy</h3>
							<h4><b>B.2.9 Written Exercise:</b></h4>
							<p>Identify a minimum of three and a maximum of 20 people you'd like to reach out to
								directly and personally. (These may be prospective clients, decision makers at an
								organization or association, or the press.) At this moment, you might not think you can
								fill out your list of 20, but now that you know what you need to do, you'll start to
								take notice of the people you should add to this list. You'll see in a minute how your
								list will grow far beyond just 20 people.</p>

							<table width="100%">
								<tr>

							<h4><b>B.2.10 Maanas Coaching Action Step:</b></h4>
							<p>Reach out to the first person on your list of 20 and then add her to your follow-up
								system. Then add a new person to your list of 20.</p>

							<h4><b>B.2.11 Written Exercise: </b></h4>

								anyone you've been unsuccessful connecting within the more traditional ways.</p>
