							<h3>The Maanas Referral Strategy</h3>
							<h4><b>B.2.12 Written Exercise:</b></h4>
							<h5>Start by remembering the last time a quality referralcame to you:</h5>

							<div class="form-group">
								<label for="exampleInputEmail1">From whom did the referral come?</label>
								<textarea name="referral" class="newarea_width"
									rows="2"><?= $row['referral'] ?></textarea>
							</div>

							<div class="form-group">
								<label for="exampleInputEmail1">What was the referral for, specifically?</label>
								<textarea name="specifically" class="newarea_width"
									rows="2"><?= $row['specifically'] ?></textarea>
							</div>

							<div class="form-group">
								<label for="exampleInputEmail1">Did the referral need your services immediately?</label>
								<textarea name="services" class="newarea_width"
									rows="2"><?= $row['services'] ?></textarea>
							</div>

							<div class="form-group">
								<label for="exampleInputEmail1">How were you contacted-by the person making the referral
									or the potential client?</label>
								<textarea name="potential" class="newarea_width"
									rows="2"><?= $row['potential'] ?></textarea>
							</div>

							<div class="form-group">
								<label for="exampleInputEmail1">Had you educated the referrer about your services before
									he made the referral?</label>
								<textarea name="educated" class="newarea_width"
									rows="2"><?= $row['educated'] ?></textarea>
							</div>

							<div class="form-group">
								<label for="exampleInputEmail1">How did you accept the referral and follow up?</label>
								<textarea name="follow" class="newarea_width" rows="2"><?= $row['follow'] ?></textarea>
							</div>

							<div class="form-group">
								<label for="exampleInputEmail1">Is that new referral a continuing client today?</label>
								<textarea name="client" class="newarea_width" rows="2"><?= $row['client'] ?></textarea>
							</div>

							<p>You may have already noticed some of your strengths in generating referrals, or perhaps
								parts of the process need a little of your attention. Either way, we're creating an easy
								and profitable process.</p>

							<h4><b>B.2.13 Written Exercise:</b></h4>
							<p> Write down the types of people you want your clients, associates, friends, and family to
								refer to you. Your friends and family may have no idea whom to refer to you.</p>
							<p style="color:red">Examples: Family members, best friends, neighbors, acquaintances, work
								as-sociates, small business owners, executives, people going through divorce or
								struggling financially.</p>

							<h4><b>B.2.14 Written Exercise:</b></h4>
							<h5>Write down how you'd like your referrers to refer their contacts for you.</h5>

							<div class="form-group">
								<label for="exampleInputEmail1">What do you want them to say?</label>
								<textarea name="want" class="newarea_width" rows="2"><?= $row['want'] ?></textarea>
							</div>
							<div class="form-group">
								<label for="exampleInputEmail1">How do you want them to talk about what you do?</label>
								<textarea name="talk" class="newarea_width" rows="2"><?= $row['talk'] ?></textarea>
							</div>
							<div class="form-group">
								<label for="exampleInputEmail1">What specific words and phrases do you want them to
									use?</label>
								<textarea name="words" class="newarea_width" rows="2"><?= $row['words'] ?></textarea>
							</div>
							<div class="form-group">
								<label for="exampleInputEmail1">Do you want them to say that you are "the best"?</label>
								<textarea name="best" class="newarea_width" rows="2"><?= $row['best'] ?></textarea>
							</div>
							<div class="form-group">
								<label for="exampleInputEmail1">Do you want them to mention that you recently received
									an award for out-standing community service?</label>
								<textarea name="mention" class="newarea_width"
									rows="2"><?= $row['mention'] ?></textarea>
							</div>
							<div class="form-group">
								<label for="exampleInputEmail1">Get very specific. Think of yourself as a one-person PR
									firm. You decide how you want people to talk about you.</label>
								<textarea name="specific" class="newarea_width"
									rows="2"><?= $row['specific'] ?></textarea>
							</div>

							<h4><b>B.2.15 Maanas Action Step:</b></h4>
							<h5>Make the commitment to ask for referrals every day for five days straight.</h5>
							<h3>Keep-in-Touch Strategy</h3>
							<h4><b>B.2.16 Written Exercise:</b></h4>

							<div class="form-group">
								<label for="exampleInputEmail1">What is the best kind of content to include in your
									keep-in-touch strategy based on your interests and the needs and desires of your
									target market?</label>
								<textarea name="content" class="newarea_width"
									rows="2"><?= $row['content'] ?></textarea>
							</div>

							<h4><b>B.2.17 Written Exercise:</b></h4>

							<div class="form-group">
								<label for="exampleInputEmail1">What format will you use to send out your e-zine. . .
									and why?</label>
								<textarea name="format" class="newarea_width" rows="2"><?= $row['format'] ?></textarea>
							</div>

							<h4><b>B.2.18 Written Exercise:</b></h4>

							<div class="form-group">
								<label for="exampleInputEmail1">How are you going to automate your keep-in-touch
									strategy?</label>
								<textarea name="automate" class="newarea_width"
									rows="2"><?= $row['automate'] ?></textarea>
							</div>

							<h3>The Maanas Blogging Strategy</h3>
							<h4><b>B.2.19 Written Exercise:</b></h4>
							<p> List five subjects you would feel comfortable writing
								about on the basis of your passions, your personal interests, your areas of ex-pertise,
								the life lessons you've learned, and what your target market is interested
								in learning. Once you've chosen one subject area to write about, you're ready to
								narrow it down to an ideal topic.</p>


							<table width="100%">
								<tr>
									<td></td>
									<td><b>Subjects</b></td>
								</tr>
								<tr>
									<td style="width:80px"><b>1.</b></td>

											rows="2"><?= $row['subject'] ?></textarea></td>
								</tr>

							<h4><b>B.2.20 Written Exercise:</b></h4>
							<div class="form-group">

									writing about based on the subjects you chose in </label>

							<h4><b>B.2.21 Written Exercise:</b></h4>
							<p> Create five titles based on your topic choices. Re-member, titles need to summarize in a
								few words what your article is about and
								be intriguing enough to make people who are interested in that topic-and eventhose who
								aren't!-want to read more. If you can fit in your top keyword phrase,so much the better!
							</p>

							<table width="100%">
								<tr>
									<td></td>
									<td><b>Titles</b></td>
								</tr>
								<tr>
									<td style="width:80px"><b>1.</b></td>
									<td><textarea name="title_1" class="newarea_width"
											rows="2"><?= $row['title'] ?></textarea></td>
								</tr>
								<tr>
									<td><b>2.</b></td>
									<td><textarea name="title_2" class="newarea_width"
											rows="2"><?= $row['title_2'] ?></textarea></td>
								</tr>
								<tr>
									<td><b>3.</b></td>
									<td><textarea name="title_3" class="newarea_width"
											rows="2"><?= $row['title_3'] ?></textarea></td>
								</tr>
								<tr>
									<td><b>4.</b></td>
									<td><textarea name="title_4" class="newarea_width"
											rows="2"><?= $row['title_4'] ?></textarea></td>
								</tr>
								<tr>
									<td><b>5.</b></td>
									<td><textarea name="title_5" class="newarea_width"
											rows="2"><?= $row['title_5'] ?></textarea></td>
								</tr>

							</table>

							<h4><b>B.2.22 Written Exercise:</b></h4>
							<p>Write your lead-in paragraph by presenting the most important information first. Remember
								to address the topic presented in your title and explain to your readers what they will
								gain from your article. Here's where you get to appeal personally to the readers by
								telling them how you can help them learn something new, solve a problem, or simply
								entertain them for a short while.</p>


							<textarea name="paragraph" class="area_width" rows="3"><?= $row['paragraph'] ?></textarea>


							<h4><b>B.2.23 Written Exercise:</b></h4>
							<p>It is time to write the body of your article. You need to
								elaborate on and fulfill the promise made in your introduction by backing up your
								statements with facts. Refer back to the points listed earlier if you get stuck. And
								remember that you don't have to get all the words perfect in the first draft. Much
								of writing is about rewriting and editing. At this point, concentrate on the broad
								strokes and allow yourself to enjoy the process.
							</p>


							<textarea name="promise" class="area_width" rows="3"><?= $row['promise'] ?></textarea>

							<h4><b>B.2.24 Written Exercise:</b></h4>
							<p>End your article with a strong closing. Write a conclusion by summarizing your key points
								from the body of the article and tell the read-
								ers how they can best use the information you just gave them.</p>


							<textarea name="strong" class="area_width" rows="3"><?= $row['strong'] ?></textarea>

							<h4><b>B.2.25 Written Exercise:</b></h4>
							<p>Create your author resource box. Remember to include
								your area of expertise, your business or offer, a specific call to action, and
								perti-nent contact information and links.</p>


							<textarea name="author" class="area_width" rows="3"><?= $row['author'] ?></textarea>



							<h4><b>B.2.26 Maanas Action Step:</b></h4>
							<p>Compile all the accumulated elements of your
								research and writing to complete one article of 500 to 750 words on the topic of
								your choice, including the resource box. When it's polished to your satisfaction,
								share it with friends, colleagues, or a writing group to gain valuable insight on
								your writing progress.</p>

							<h4><b>B.2.27 Written Exercise:</b></h4>
							<p>Decide on an ongoing schedule for submitting your
								articles. This can be weekly, every other week, or monthly.</p>

							<h4><b>B.2.28 Maanas Coaching Action Step :</b></h4>
							<p>Schedule the time you'll need to write and
								submit new articles and then do it, or hire a virtual assistant who is experienced
								in online article submission and have him do it for you.</p>

							<h4><b>B.2.29 Maanas Action Step:</b></h4>
							<p>Find the most active online communities
								that serve your target market and are focused on topics you know a lot about. As
								a member of the group, you can make intelligent, thoughtful posts that add value
								to the discussion topic. You might answer other member's questions or you might
								suggest helpful resources or simply provide your opinions on issues that relate to
								your industry. And you never know-you may learn a lot by reading what others
								have to say.</p>

							<h4><b>B.2.30 Written Exercise:</b></h4>

							<div class="form-group">
								<label for="exampleInputEmail1">Come up with several of your own unique ideas for
									cross-promotions and identify who might be a good marketing partner. Make a list of
									5 names</label>

									<tr>
										<td style="width:80px"><b>1.</b></td>

									</tr>

							<h4><b>B.2.31 Maanas Action Step: </b></h4>
							<p>Reach out, connect with, and share your
								ideas with the people you identified in the preceding exercise.</p>

							<h4><b>B.2.32 Maanas Action Step: </b></h4>
							<p>Create, or hire someone to create, a tell-a-
								friend form and begin using it.</p>

							<h4><b>B.2.33 Maanas Action Step: </b></h4>
							<p>Write a press release about the most
								impressive result one of your clients achieved and submit it to PRWeb.com
								You can get tips at the site on how to craft a solid press release. Or, go to
								Get Known Get Clients.com for more information on online PR and social media
								marketing strategies.</p>


							<h4><b>B.2.34 Maanas Action Step: </b></h4>
							<p>Go to google.com/ads and set up an ac-
								count. Then create a test ad campaign for one of your products or services. Make
								sure that you cap your daily spending at a low amount so that you learn how to
								profit from pay-per-click before you rack up significant fees. Google.com has
								great tutorials and help pages that can answer your questions. Track your con-
								version so you know what kind of return on your investment you are getting.</p>

							<h4><b>B.2.35 Maanas Action Step: </b></h4>
							<p>If you don't already have an e-course, the special report, or another enticement to offer
								your visitors, create one. Then ensure that you have an opt-in for your offer displayed
								prominently on your site.</p>

							<h4><b>B.2.36Maanas Action Step: </b></h4>
							<p>If you don't already have an autoresponder
								a system to help potential clients consume your offer set one up.</p><br />

							<h3>PART 3: BUILDING YOUR SOCIAL MEDIA PLATFORM</h3>

							<h4><b>B.2.37 Maanas Action Step:</b></h4>
							<p>If you haven't already done so, create your profile on Facebook and complete the
								information on your profile's "Info" tab. Make sure you include your bio, which should
								present your Who and Do What Statement and your Why I Do It Statement. Also, make sure
								you include your busines's URL.</p>

							<h4><b>B.2.38 Maanas Action Step:</b></h4>
							<p>Create your Facebook business page. Be certain to include your busines's overview and
								website in the "Detailed Information" section of the "Info" tab. Invite those among your
								Facebook "friends"</p>

							<h4><b>B.2.39 Maanas Action Step:</b></h4>
							<p>with whom you would do business to "Like" your page.</p>

							<h4><b>B.2.40 Written Exercise:</b></h4>
							<p>Post engaging comments on your page's wall. An engaging comment is an open-ended question
								or thought-provoking comment that will encourage replies. Write out 10 engaging,
								thought-provoking posts.</p>

							<p>Keep track of whom you have inter-

							<p>Put links to your fan page on your website.</p>

							<h4><b>B.3.48 Maanas Action Step:</b></h4>
							<p>Create your profile on LinkedIn.</p>
							<h4><b>B.3.49 Maanas Action Step: </b></h4>
							<p>Create your company profile on LinkedIn.</p>

								If so, post a recommendation.</p>

								discussions.</p>

								<p />

							<h4><b>B.3.53 Maanas Action Step:</b></h4>

							<div class="form-group">
								<label for="exampleInputEmail1">them on Twitter and follow them.</label>

								<table width="100%">
									<tr>
										<td></td>
										<td><b>Tweeter account</b></td>
									</tr>

<div id="reportview" class="modal fade" tabindex="-1">
	<div class="modal-dialog">

				<!--<input type="text" id="formid">-->
				<div class="text-center">
					<a href="" target="_blank" id="formid" class="btn btn-info">View</a>
					<a href="" target="_blank" id="download" class="btn btn-warning">Save</a>
				</div>
			</div>
			<div class="modal-footer">
				<button type="button" class="btn btn-secondary" data-dismiss="modal">Cancel</button>
				<!--<button type="button" class="btn btn-primary">Save</button>-->
			</div>
		</div>
	</div>
</div>
<script>
	setTimeout(function () { notification(); }, 3000);

	function notification() {
		var user_id = "<?= $user_id ?>";
		var form_name = "self_promotion_strategies";
		$.get("<?= base_url('Member/delete_notification') ?>/" + user_id + "/" + form_name, "", function (response) {
			console.log(response);
		});
	}

	$(document).ready(function () {
		$('#btnsubmit').click(function () {
			$('#formsubmit').submit(function (event) {
				event.preventDefault();
				$.ajax({
					url: "<?= base_url("member/ self_promotion_strategies_form") ?>",
					type: "post",
					// dataType: "JSON",
					data: new FormData(this),
					processData: false,
					contentType: false,
					success: function (responce) {
					// console.log(responce);
					$('#formid').attr("href", "<?= base_url('member/marketingview/self_promotion_strategies/') ?>/" + responce);
					$("#download").attr("href", "<?= base_url('member/marketingdownload/self_promotion_strategies/') ?>/" + responce);
					$("#reportview").modal('show');
				},
					error: function (xhr, desc, err) {


				}
            });
		});
	});
    });
</script>

B-3 Know Like Trust-Launch page controller

application/controllers/member.php 
public function know_like_trust()

{

//for email notification get admin and coach detail

$coach=$this->db->get_where('users',array('fld_id'=>$this->userid));

if ($coach->num_rows()>0) {

$row=$coach->row_array();



$coachName = $row["fld_username"] . " " . $row["fld_last_name"];

$coachemail = $row["fld_email"];

$coachsparent_id = $row["fld_parent"];

}



$admin=$this->db->get_where('users',array('fld_id'=>$coachsparent_id));

if ($admin->num_rows()>0) {

$row=$admin->row_array();



$adminName = $row["fld_username"] . " " . $row["fld_last_name"];

$adminemail = $row["fld_email"];

}



$row = array();

$successMsg = "";

$errorMsg = "";

$this->load->model('admin_model');

$tbForm = $this->admin_model->get_coaching_forms($this->userid,'know_like_trust');

if(sizeof($tbForm)>0){

$row = $tbForm[0];

}



if($this->input->post()){
if ($this->input->post('delete'))
{
$this->db->delete('user_know_like_trust', array('fld_user_id' => $this->userid));
}
if (isset($_POST['save']))

{

$brand_1 = $_POST['brand_1'];

$brand_2 = $_POST['brand_2'];

$brand_3 = $_POST['brand_3'];

$brand_4 = $_POST['brand_4'];

$brand_5 = $_POST['brand_5'];

$message_1 = $_POST['message_1'];

$message_2 = $_POST['message_2'];

$message_3 = $_POST['message_3'];

$message_4 = $_POST['message_4'];

$message_5 = $_POST['message_5'];

$thing_1 = $_POST['thing_1'];

$thing_2 = $_POST['thing_2'];

$thing_3 = $_POST['thing_3'];

$thing_4 = $_POST['thing_4'];

$thing_5 = $_POST['thing_5'];

$way_1 = $_POST['way_1'];

$way_2 = $_POST['way_2'];

$way_3 = $_POST['way_3'];

$way_4 = $_POST['way_4'];

$way_5 = $_POST['way_5'];

$break_1 = $_POST['break_1'];

$break_2 = $_POST['break_2'];

$break_3 = $_POST['break_3'];

$break_4 = $_POST['break_4'];

$break_5 = $_POST['break_5'];

$weak = $_POST['weak'];

$case = $_POST['case'];

$studie_1 = $_POST['studie_1'];

$studie_2 = $_POST['studie_2'];

$studie_3 = $_POST['studie_3'];

$studie_4 = $_POST['studie_4'];

$Sharing_1 = $_POST['Sharing_1'];

$Sharing_2 = $_POST['Sharing_2'];

$Sharing_3 = $_POST['Sharing_3'];

$Sharing_4 = $_POST['Sharing_4'];

$Sharing_5 = $_POST['Sharing_5'];

$Sharing_6 = $_POST['Sharing_6'];



$newData = array(

'brand_1' => $brand_1,

'brand_2' => $brand_2,

'brand_3' => $brand_3,

'brand_4' => $brand_4,

'brand_5' => $brand_5,

'message_1' => $message_1,

'message_2' => $message_2,

'message_3' => $message_3,

'message_4' => $message_4,

'message_5' => $message_5,

'thing_1' => $thing_1,

'thing_2' => $thing_2,

'thing_3' => $thing_3,

'thing_4' => $thing_4,

'thing_5' => $thing_5,

'way_1 ' => $way_1,

'way_2' => $way_2,

'way_3' => $way_3,

'way_4' => $way_4,

'way_5' => $way_5,

'break_1' => $break_1,

'break_2' => $break_2,

'break_3' => $break_3,

'break_4' => $break_4,

'break_5' => $break_5,

'weak' => $weak,

'case' => $case,

'studie_1' => $studie_1,

'studie_2' => $studie_2,

'studie_3' => $studie_3,

'studie_4' => $studie_4,

'Sharing_1' => $Sharing_1,

'Sharing_2' => $Sharing_2,

'Sharing_3' => $Sharing_3,

'Sharing_4' => $Sharing_4,

'Sharing_5' => $Sharing_5,

'Sharing_6' => $Sharing_6,

'fld_user_id' => $this->userid,

'fld_added_date' =>time()

);

$fill=$this->db->get_where('user_know_like_trust',array('fld_user_id'=>$this->userid));

if ($fill->num_rows()>0)

{

$this->db->where('fld_user_id',$this->userid);

$query = $this->db->update('user_know_like_trust',$newData);

if($query){

echo "<div class=\"alert alert-success\">Form save Successfully!<a href=\"#\" class=\"close\" data-dismiss=\"alert\"
		aria-label=\"close\">&times;</a></div>";

}

}else

{

$query = $this->db->insert('user_know_like_trust', $newData);

$last_id = $this->db->insert_id();

if($query){

echo "<div class=\"alert alert-success\">Form save Successfully!<a href=\"#\" class=\"close\" data-dismiss=\"alert\"
		aria-label=\"close\">&times;</a></div>";

}

}

}

if(isset($_POST['submited'])){



$brand = '<br />1. '.$_POST['brand_1'].'<br /><br />2. '.$_POST['brand_2'].'<br /><br />3.
'.$_POST['brand_3'].'<br /><br />4. '.$_POST['brand_4'].'<br /><br />5. '.$_POST['brand_5'];

$message = '<br />1. '.$_POST['message_1'].'<br /><br />2. '.$_POST['message_2'].'<br /><br />3.
'.$_POST['message_3'].'<br /><br />4. '.$_POST['message_4'].'<br /><br />5. '.$_POST['message_5'];

$thing = '<br />1. '.$_POST['thing_1'].'<br /><br />2. '.$_POST['thing_2'].'<br /><br />3.
'.$_POST['thing_3'].'<br /><br />4. '.$_POST['thing_4'].'<br /><br />5. '.$_POST['thing_5'];

$way = '<br />1. '.$_POST['way_1'].'<br /><br />2. '.$_POST['way_2'].'<br /><br />3. '.$_POST['way_3'].'<br /><br />4.
'.$_POST['way_4'].'<br /><br />5. '.$_POST['way_5'];

$break = '<br />1. '.$_POST['break_1'].'<br /><br />2. '.$_POST['break_2'].'<br /><br />3.
'.$_POST['break_3'].'<br /><br />4. '.$_POST['break_4'].'<br /><br />5. '.$_POST['break_5'];

$weak = $_POST['weak'];

$case = $_POST['case'];

$studie = '<br />1. '.$_POST['studie_1'].'<br /><br />2. '.$_POST['studie_2'].'<br /><br />3.
'.$_POST['studie_3'].'<br /><br />4. '.$_POST['studie_4'];

$Sharing = '<br />1. '.$_POST['Sharing_1'].'<br /><br />2. '.$_POST['Sharing_2'].'<br /><br />3.
'.$_POST['Sharing_3'].'<br /><br />4. '.$_POST['Sharing_4'].'<br /><br />5. '.$_POST['Sharing_5'].'<br /><br />6.
'.$_POST['Sharing_6'];



$newData = array(

'brand' => $brand,

'message' => $message,

'thing' => $thing,

'way ' => $way,

'break' => $break,

'weak' => $weak,

'case' => $case,

'studie' => $studie,

'Sharing' => $Sharing,

'fld_user_id' => $this->userid,

'fld_added_date' =>time()

);

$query = $this->db->insert('know_like_trust', $newData);

$last_id = $this->db->insert_id();

if($query){

$massage = "

<head>
	<meta http-equiv='Content-Type' content='text/html; charset=windows-1252'>
	<meta name='GENERATOR' content='MSHTML 11.00.10570.1001'>

<body bgcolor='#ffffff'><strong></strong><strong> </strong><strong></strong>
	<table width='600' align='center' id='TbHeader' bgcolor='#400080' border='0' cellspacing='0' cellpadding='4'>
		<tr>
			<td align='center' id='TdHeader' bgcolor='#400080'>
				<p align='center'>
					<font color='#ffffff' face='Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif' size='6'><strong>Welcome</strong></font>
				</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
	</table>
	<table width='600' align='center' id='TbBodyRow' border='0' cellspacing='0' cellpadding='0'>
		<tr>
			<td id='TdBodyRow' valign='top' bgcolor='#ffffff'>
				<table width='100%' id='TbBody' bgcolor='#ffffff' border='0' cellspacing='0' cellpadding='4'>
					<tr>
						<td align='center' id='TdBody' bgcolor='#ffffff'>
							&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<p align='left'>
								<font color='#000000' face='Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif' size='3'><strong>Hi
										".$adminName."&nbsp;<font color='#000000'
											face='Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif' size='3'>&nbsp;</font></strong>
								</font>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
							</p>
							<p align='justify' style='margin-right: 0px;'>
								<font color='#000000' face='Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif' size='3'>This is an
									auto-generated email to notify you that your client ".$coachName." has filled and
									submitted the form <b>\"B-3 Know like trust- launch\"</b> on
									MyportalX.<br><br>Please check out your client reports on MyportalX.</font>
							</p><br></font>
							</font>
							</font>
							</p>
							<p align='left'><br></p>
						</td>
					</tr>
				</table>
			</td>
		</tr>
	</table><strong></strong><strong></strong><strong> </strong>
	<table width='600' align='center' id='TbFooter' bgcolor='#eea000' border='0' cellspacing='0' cellpadding='4'>
		<tr>
			<td align='center' id='TdFooter' bgcolor='#eea000'>
				<div style='margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);'>
					<div style='margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);'><span
							style='color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-size: inherit; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;'><span
								style='color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;'><br></span></span>
					</div>
					<div style='margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);'><span
							style='color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-size: inherit; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;'><span
								style='color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;'>Regards,</span><br
								style='color: rgb(0, 52, 89);'></span></div>
					<div style='margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);'><span
							style='color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;'>Team
							MyportalX</span></div>
					<div style='margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);'><span
							style='color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;'><br></span>
					</div>
				</div>
			</td>
		</tr>
	</table>";

$subject = "Form Submitted";

$header = "From:" . $this->config->item('mail_from') . "\r\n";

$header .= "MIME-Version: 1.0\r\n";

$header .= "Content-type: text/html\r\n";

$retval = mail ($adminemail,$subject,$massage,$header);



$nots=array(

'sender_id' => $this->userid,

'reciver_id' => $coachsparent_id,

'message' => $coachName.", Filled-Up and submitted <b style='color:#4e73df'>\"Know Like Trust-Launch\"</b> Form Today.",

'urls' => "mreport/".$this->userid,

'fld_date' => time()

);



$this->db->insert('notification',$nots);

echo "<div class=\"alert alert-success\">Form Submitted Successfully!<a href=\"#\" class=\"close\"
		data-dismiss=\"alert\" aria-label=\"close\">&times;</a></div>";

}



if($this->db->affected_rows()){

$updateData = array(

'completed_date' => time(),

'status' => "1",

'last_modified' => date('Y-m-d H:i:s')

);

$this->db->where(array('fld_form_id' => $row->id, 'fld_user_id' =>$this->userid));

$this->db->update('marketing_form_user',$updateData);

$successMsg = "Form submitted successfully.";



//get the updated row

$tbForm = $this->admin_model->get_coaching_forms($this->userid,'know_like_trust');

if(sizeof($tbForm)>0){

$row = $tbForm[0];

}

}

}

}

if($this->db->affected_rows()){

$insertFormPossition=array(

'fld_user_id' => $this->userid,

'fld_know_like_trust' => '1'

//'fld_added_date' => time()

);

$userExist=$this->Common_model->user_exist_form_possition($this->userid);

if($userExist){

$this->db->where('fld_user_id',$this->userid);

$this->db->update('form_possition',$insertFormPossition);

}else{

$this->db->insert('form_possition',$insertFormPossition);

}

}else{

echo "Database Error.";

}

$data = array("Form" => $row,

"Error_Message" => $errorMsg,

"Success_Message" => $successMsg

);



$this->load->view('member/know_like_trust', $data);

}

B-3 Know Like Trust-Launch page View

application/views/member/know_like_trust.php 
<?php
$this->load->view('member/sidebar');
$session= $this->session->get_userdata();
$user_id=$session['user_id'];
 $completed="";
error_reporting(0);

$user=$this->db->get_where('users',array('fld_id'=>$user_id));
        if ($user->num_rows()>0) {
        $row=$user->row_array();

        $memberName = $row["fld_first_name"] . " " . $row["fld_last_name"];
        $memberemail = $row["fld_email"];
        $membersparent_id = $row["fld_parent"];
        }

        $coach=$this->db->get_where('users',array('fld_id'=>$membersparent_id));
        if ($coach->num_rows()>0) {
        $row=$coach->row_array();

        $coachName = $row["fld_first_name"] . " " . $row["fld_last_name"];
        $coachemail = $row["fld_email"];
        }
?>


<!-- START BREADCRUMB -->
<ul class="breadcrumb">
	<li><a href="<?php echo base_url()." member"?>">Home</a></li>
	<li class="active"><a href="">Coaching Client</a></li>
</ul>
<!-- END BREADCRUMB -->
<img src="<?php echo base_url()." assets/images/marketing.jpg"?>" height="300" width="100%"/>
<!-- PAGE CONTENT WRAPPER -->
<div class="page-content-wrap">
	<!-- PAGE TITLE -->
	<div class="page-title">
		<h2 style="color: darkgreen">B-3 Know Like Trust-Launch</h2>
	</div>
	<!-- END PAGE TITLE -->
	<div class="page-content-wrap">
		<?php if ($Form->completed_date == ""){
                        $fill=$this->db->get_where('user_know_like_trust',array('fld_user_id'=>$user_id));
            if ($fill->num_rows()>0) 
            { 
                $row=$fill->row_array();

						<div class="panel-body">
							<h2>Know Like Trust-Launch Questions</h2>

							<h3>Know like & trust works when you are noticed, so the first goal for marketing is BEING
								NOTICED.</h3>
							<p>To get noticed: Focus creates. This is science. The attention is the number one real
								estate in the virtual world. Everyone lives for themselves. They live in their minds.
								People will continue to watch the funny puppy videos on youtube unless you give them
								something else to watch that is funny, entertaining & disruptive. We all have seen an
								elephant but you never see a purple elephant. So creating a purple elephant walking in

	</div>
</div>
<script>
	setTimeout(function () { notification(); }, 3000);

	function notification() {
		var user_id = "<?= $user_id ?>";
		var form_name = "know_like_trust";
		$.get("<?= base_url('Member/delete_notification') ?>/" + user_id + "/" + form_name, "", function (response) {
			console.log(response);
		});
	}

	$(document).ready(function () {
		$('#btnsubmit').click(function () {
			$('#formsubmit').submit(function (event) {
				event.preventDefault();
				$.ajax({
					url: "<?= base_url("member/ know_like_trust_form") ?>",
					type: "post",
					// dataType: "JSON",
					data: new FormData(this),
					processData: false,
					contentType: false,
					success: function (responce) {
					// console.log(responce);
					$('#formid').attr("href", "<?= base_url('member/marketingview/know_like_trust/') ?>/" + responce);
					$("#download").attr("href", "<?= base_url('member/marketingdownload/know_like_trust/') ?>/" + responce);
					$("#reportview").modal('show');
				},
					error: function (xhr, desc, err) {


				}
            });
		});
	});
    });
</script>
<!-- START SCRIPTS -->

B-4 Content Generation & Ad creation Ideas page controller

application/controllers/member.php 
public function content_generation()

{

//for email notification get admin and coach detail

$coach=$this->db->get_where('users',array('fld_id'=>$this->userid));

if ($coach->num_rows()>0) {

$row=$coach->row_array();



$coachName = $row["fld_username"] . " " . $row["fld_last_name"];

$coachemail = $row["fld_email"];

$coachsparent_id = $row["fld_parent"];

}



$admin=$this->db->get_where('users',array('fld_id'=>$coachsparent_id));

if ($admin->num_rows()>0) {

$row=$admin->row_array();



$adminName = $row["fld_username"] . " " . $row["fld_last_name"];

$adminemail = $row["fld_email"];

}



$row = array();

$successMsg = "";

$errorMsg = "";

$this->load->model('admin_model');

$tbForm = $this->admin_model->get_coaching_forms($this->userid,'content_generation');

if(sizeof($tbForm)>0){

$row = $tbForm[0];

}



if($this->input->post()){
if ($this->input->post('delete'))
{
$this->db->delete('user_content_generation', array('fld_user_id' => $this->userid));
}
if (isset($_POST['save']))

{

$Example_1 = $_POST['Example_1'];

$Example_2 = $_POST['Example_2'];

$Example_3 = $_POST['Example_3'];

$best_1 = $_POST['best_1'];

$best_2 = $_POST['best_2'];

$best_3 = $_POST['best_3'];

$world_1 = $_POST['world_1'];

$world_2 = $_POST['world_2'];

$world_3 = $_POST['world_3'];

$easiest_1 = $_POST['easiest_1'];

$easiest_2 = $_POST['easiest_2'];

$easiest_3 = $_POST['easiest_3'];

$usp_a_1 = $_POST['usp_a_1'];

$usp_a_2 = $_POST['usp_a_2'];

$usp_a_3 = $_POST['usp_a_3'];

$usp_a_4 = $_POST['usp_a_4'];

$usp_a_5 = $_POST['usp_a_5'];

$usp_b_1 = $_POST['usp_b_1'];

$usp_b_2 = $_POST['usp_b_2'];

$usp_b_3 = $_POST['usp_b_3'];

$usp_b_4 = $_POST['usp_b_4'];

$usp_b_5 = $_POST['usp_b_5'];

$usp_c_1 = $_POST['usp_c_1'];

$usp_c_2 = $_POST['usp_c_2'];

$usp_c_3 = $_POST['usp_c_3'];

$usp_c_4 = $_POST['usp_c_4'];

$usp_c_5 = $_POST['usp_c_5'];

$usp_d_1 = $_POST['usp_d_1'];

$usp_d_2 = $_POST['usp_d_2'];

$usp_d_3 = $_POST['usp_d_3'];

$usp_d_4 = $_POST['usp_d_4'];

$usp_d_5 = $_POST['usp_d_5'];

$product = $_POST['product'];

$result_1 = $_POST['result_1'];

$result_2 = $_POST['result_2'];

$result_3 = $_POST['result_3'];

$believe = $_POST['believe'];

$bonuses = $_POST['bonuses'];

$urgency = $_POST['urgency'];

$Blocker = $_POST['Blocker'];

$Response = $_POST['Response'];

$listen = $_POST['listen'];

$service = $_POST['service'];

$video_1 = $_POST['video_1'];

$video_2 = $_POST['video_2'];

$video_3 = $_POST['video_3'];

$audio_1 = $_POST['audio_1'];

$audio_2 = $_POST['audio_2'];

$audio_3 = $_POST['audio_3'];

$blog_1 = $_POST['blog_1'];

$blog_2 = $_POST['blog_2'];

$blog_3 = $_POST['blog_3'];

$lead_1 = $_POST['lead_1'];

$lead_2 = $_POST['lead_2'];

$lead_3 = $_POST['lead_3'];

$webinar_1 = $_POST['webinar_1'];

$webinar_2 = $_POST['webinar_2'];

$webinar_3 = $_POST['webinar_3'];

$introduce_1 = $_POST['introduce_1'];

$introduce_2 = $_POST['introduce_2'];

$introduce_3 = $_POST['introduce_3'];

$authority_1 = $_POST['authority_1'];

$authority_2 = $_POST['authority_2'];

$authority_3 = $_POST['authority_3'];

$opt_1 = $_POST['opt_1'];

$opt_2 = $_POST['opt_2'];

$opt_3 = $_POST['opt_3'];

$content_1 = $_POST['content_1'];

$content_2 = $_POST['content_2'];

$content_3 = $_POST['content_3'];

$ad_1 = $_POST['ad_1'];

$ad_2 = $_POST['ad_2'];

$ad_3 = $_POST['ad_3'];





$newData = array(

'Example_1' => $Example_1,

'Example_2' => $Example_2,

'Example_3' => $Example_3,

'best_2' => $best_2,

'usp_d_4' => $usp_d_4,

'usp_d_5' => $usp_d_5,

'product' => $product,

'result_1' => $result_1,

'result_2' => $result_2,

'result_3' => $result_3,

'urgency' => $urgency,

'Blocker' => $Blocker,

'Response' => $Response,

'listen' => $listen,

'service' => $service,

'different' => $different,

'video_2' => $video_2,

'video_3' => $video_3,

'audio_1' => $audio_1,

'audio_2' => $audio_2,

'audio_3' => $audio_3,

'blog_2' => $blog_2,

'webinar_2' => $webinar_2,

'webinar_3' => $webinar_3,

'introduce_1' => $introduce_1,

'introduce_2' => $introduce_2,

'introduce_3' => $introduce_3,

'authority_1' => $authority_1,

'authority_2' => $authority_2,

'authority_3' => $authority_3,

'opt_1' => $opt_1,

'opt_2' => $opt_2,

'opt_3' => $opt_3,

'content_1' => $content_1,

'content_2' => $content_2,

'content_3' => $content_3,

'ad_1' => $ad_1,

'ad_2' => $ad_2,

'ad_3' => $ad_3,

'fld_user_id' => $this->userid,

'fld_added_date' =>time()

);

$fill=$this->db->get_where('user_content_generation',array('fld_user_id'=>$this->userid));

if ($fill->num_rows()>0)

{

$this->db->where('fld_user_id',$this->userid);

$query = $this->db->update('user_content_generation',$newData);

if($query){

echo "<div class=\"alert alert-success\">Form save Successfully!<a href=\"#\" class=\"close\" data-dismiss=\"alert\"
		aria-label=\"close\">&times;</a></div>";

}

}else

{

$query = $this->db->insert('user_content_generation', $newData);

$last_id = $this->db->insert_id();

if($query){

echo "<div class=\"alert alert-success\">Form save Successfully!<a href=\"#\" class=\"close\" data-dismiss=\"alert\"
		aria-label=\"close\">&times;</a></div>";

}

}

}

if(isset($_POST['submit'])){

$example = '<br />1. '.$_POST['Example_1'].'<br /><br />2. '.$_POST['Example_2'].'<br /><br />3. '.$_POST['Example_3'];

$best = '<br />1. '.$_POST['best_1'].'<br /><br />2. '.$_POST['best_2'].'<br /><br />3. '.$_POST['best_3'];

$world = '<br />1. '.$_POST['world_1'].'<br /><br />2. '.$_POST['world_2'].'<br /><br />3. '.$_POST['world_3'];

$easiest = '<br />1. '.$_POST['easiest_1'].'<br /><br />2. '.$_POST['easiest_2'].'<br /><br />3. '.$_POST['easiest_3'];

$usp_a = '<br />1. '.$_POST['usp_a_1'].'<br /><br />2. '.$_POST['usp_a_2'].'<br /><br />3.
'.$_POST['usp_a_3'].'<br /><br />4'.$_POST['usp_a_4'].'<br /><br />5'.$_POST['usp_a_5'];

$usp_b = '<br />1. '.$_POST['usp_b_1'].'<br /><br />2. '.$_POST['usp_b_2'].'<br /><br />3.
'.$_POST['usp_b_3'].'<br /><br />4'.$_POST['usp_b_4'].'<br /><br />5'.$_POST['usp_b_5'];

$usp_c = '<br />1. '.$_POST['usp_c_1'].'<br /><br />2. '.$_POST['usp_c_2'].'<br /><br />3.
'.$_POST['usp_c_3'].'<br /><br />4'.$_POST['usp_c_4'].'<br /><br />5'.$_POST['usp_c_5'];

$usp_d = '<br />1. '.$_POST['usp_d_1'].'<br /><br />2. '.$_POST['usp_d_2'].'<br /><br />3.
'.$_POST['usp_d_3'].'<br /><br />4'.$_POST['usp_d_4'].'<br /><br />5'.$_POST['usp_d_5'];



$product = $_POST['product'];

$result = '<br />1. '.$_POST['result_1'].'<br /><br />2. '.$_POST['result_2'].'<br /><br />3. '.$_POST['result_3'];

$bonuses = $_POST['bonuses'];

$urgency = $_POST['urgency'];

$Blocker = $_POST['Blocker'];

$Response = $_POST['Response'];

$listen = $_POST['listen'];

$service = $_POST['service'];

$different = $_POST['different'];

$perfect = $_POST['perfect'];

$person = $_POST['person'];

$video = '<br />1. '.$_POST['video_1'].'<br /><br />2. '.$_POST['video_2'].'<br /><br />3. '.$_POST['video_3'];

$audio = '<br />1. '.$_POST['audio_1'].'<br /><br />2. '.$_POST['audio_2'].'<br /><br />3. '.$_POST['audio_3'];

$blog = '<br />1. '.$_POST['blog_1'].'<br /><br />2. '.$_POST['blog_2'].'<br /><br />3. '.$_POST['blog_3'];

$lead = '<br />1. '.$_POST['lead_1'].'<br /><br />2. '.$_POST['lead_2'].'<br /><br />3. '.$_POST['lead_3'];

$webinar = '<br />1. '.$_POST['webinar_1'].'<br /><br />2. '.$_POST['webinar_2'].'<br /><br />3. '.$_POST['webinar_3'];

'.$_POST['introduce_3'];

'.$_POST['authority_3'];

'example' => $example,

'best' => $best,

'fld_added_date' =>time()

);

$last_id = $this->db->insert_id();

if($query){

$massage = "

<head>
	<meta http-equiv='Content-Type' content='text/html; charset=windows-1252'>
	<meta name='GENERATOR' content='MSHTML 11.00.10570.1001'>

<body bgcolor='#ffffff'><strong></strong><strong> </strong><strong></strong>
	<table width='600' align='center' id='TbHeader' bgcolor='#400080' border='0' cellspacing='0' cellpadding='4'>
		<tr>
			<td align='center' id='TdHeader' bgcolor='#400080'>
				<p align='center'>
					<font color='#ffffff' face='Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif' size='6'><strong>Welcome</strong></font>
				</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
	</table>
	<table width='600' align='center' id='TbBodyRow' border='0' cellspacing='0' cellpadding='0'>
		<tr>
			<td id='TdBodyRow' valign='top' bgcolor='#ffffff'>
				<table width='100%' id='TbBody' bgcolor='#ffffff' border='0' cellspacing='0' cellpadding='4'>
					<tr>
						<td align='center' id='TdBody' bgcolor='#ffffff'>
							&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<p align='left'>
								<font color='#000000' face='Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif' size='3'><strong>Hi
										".$adminName."&nbsp;<font color='#000000'
											face='Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif' size='3'>&nbsp;</font></strong>
								</font>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
							</p>
							<p align='justify' style='margin-right: 0px;'>
								<font color='#000000' face='Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif' size='3'>This is an
									auto-generated email to notify you that your client ".$coachName." has filled and
									submitted the form <b>\"B-4 Content Generation & Ad creation Ideas\"</b> on
									MyportalX.<br><br>Please check out your client reports on MyportalX.</font>
							</p><br></font>
							</font>
							</font>
							</p>
							<p align='left'><br></p>
						</td>
					</tr>
				</table>
			</td>
		</tr>
	</table><strong></strong><strong></strong><strong> </strong>
	<table width='600' align='center' id='TbFooter' bgcolor='#eea000' border='0' cellspacing='0' cellpadding='4'>
		<tr>
			<td align='center' id='TdFooter' bgcolor='#eea000'>
				<div style='margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);'>
					<div style='margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);'><span
							style='color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-size: inherit; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;'><span
								style='color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;'><br></span></span>
					</div>
					<div style='margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);'><span
							style='color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-size: inherit; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;'><span
								style='color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;'>Regards,</span><br
								style='color: rgb(0, 52, 89);'></span></div>
					<div style='margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);'><span
							style='color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;'>Team
							MyportalX</span></div>
					<div style='margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);'><span
							style='color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;'><br></span>
					</div>
				</div>
			</td>
		</tr>
	</table>";

$subject = "Form Submitted";

$header = "From:" . $this->config->item('mail_from') . "\r\n";

$header .= "MIME-Version: 1.0\r\n";

$header .= "Content-type: text/html\r\n";

$retval = mail ($adminemail,$subject,$massage,$header);



$nots=array(

'sender_id' => $this->userid,

'reciver_id' => $coachsparent_id,

'message' => $coachName.", Filled-Up and submitted <b style='color:#4e73df'>\"Content Generation & Ad creation
	Ideas\"</b> Form Today.",

'urls' => "mreport/".$this->userid,

'fld_date' => time()

);



$this->db->insert('notification',$nots);

echo "<div class=\"alert alert-success\">Form Submitted Successfully!<a href=\"#\" class=\"close\"
		data-dismiss=\"alert\" aria-label=\"close\">&times;</a></div>";

}



if($this->db->affected_rows()){

$updateData = array(

'completed_date' => time(),

'status' => "1",

'last_modified' => date('Y-m-d H:i:s')

);

$this->db->where(array('fld_form_id' => $row->id, 'fld_user_id' =>$this->userid));

$this->db->update('marketing_form_user',$updateData);

$successMsg = "Form submitted successfully.";



//get the updated row

$tbForm = $this->admin_model->get_coaching_forms($this->userid,'content_generation');

if(sizeof($tbForm)>0){

$row = $tbForm[0];

}

}

}

}

if($this->db->affected_rows()){

$insertFormPossition=array(

'fld_user_id' => $this->userid,

'fld_content_generation' => '1'

//'fld_added_date' => time()

);

$userExist=$this->Common_model->user_exist_form_possition($this->userid);

if($userExist){

$this->db->where('fld_user_id',$this->userid);

$this->db->update('form_possition',$insertFormPossition);

}else{

$this->db->insert('form_possition',$insertFormPossition);

}

}else{

echo "Database Error.";

}

$data = array("Form" => $row,

"Error_Message" => $errorMsg,

"Success_Message" => $successMsg

);



$this->load->view('member/content_generation', $data);

}

B-4 Content Generation & Ad creation Ideas page View

application/views/member/content_generation.php 
<?php
$this->load->view('member/sidebar');
$session= $this->session->get_userdata();
$user_id=$session['user_id'];
 $completed="";
error_reporting(0);

$user=$this->db->get_where('users',array('fld_id'=>$user_id));
        if ($user->num_rows()>0) {
        $row=$user->row_array();

        $memberName = $row["fld_first_name"] . " " . $row["fld_last_name"];
        $memberemail = $row["fld_email"];
        $membersparent_id = $row["fld_parent"];
        }

        $coach=$this->db->get_where('users',array('fld_id'=>$membersparent_id));
        if ($coach->num_rows()>0) {
        $row=$coach->row_array();

        $coachName = $row["fld_first_name"] . " " . $row["fld_last_name"];
        $coachemail = $row["fld_email"];
        }

<!-- Modal HTML -->
<div id="reportview" class="modal fade" tabindex="-1">
	<div class="modal-dialog">
		<div class="modal-content">
			<div class="modal-header">
				<h5 class="modal-title">Your Form Was Successfully Submitted!</h5>
				<!--<button type="button" class="close" data-dismiss="modal">&times;</button>-->
			</div>
			<div class="modal-body">
				<!--<input type="text" id="formid">-->
				<div class="text-center">
					<a href="" target="_blank" id="formid" class="btn btn-info">View</a>
					<a href="" target="_blank" id="download" class="btn btn-warning">Save</a>
				</div>
			</div>
			<div class="modal-footer">
				<button type="button" class="btn btn-secondary" data-dismiss="modal">Cancel</button>
				<!--<button type="button" class="btn btn-primary">Save</button>-->
			</div>
		</div>
	</div>
</div>
<script>
	setTimeout(function () { notification(); }, 3000);

	function notification() {
		var user_id = "<?= $user_id ?>";
		var form_name = "content_generation";
		$.get("<?= base_url('Member/delete_notification') ?>/" + user_id + "/" + form_name, "", function (response) {
			console.log(response);
		});
	}

	$(document).ready(function () {
		$('#btnsubmit').click(function () {
			$('#formsubmit').submit(function (event) {
				event.preventDefault();
				$.ajax({
					url: "<?= base_url("member/ content_generation_form") ?>",
					type: "post",
					// dataType: "JSON",
					data: new FormData(this),
					processData: false,
					contentType: false,
					success: function (responce) {
					// console.log(responce);
					$('#formid').attr("href", "<?= base_url('member/marketingview/content_generation/') ?>/" + responce);
					$("#download").attr("href", "<?= base_url('member/marketingdownload/content_generation/') ?>/" + responce);
					$("#reportview").modal('show');
				},
					error: function (xhr, desc, err) {


				}
            });
		});
	});
    });
</script>
<!-- START SCRIPTS -->

<?php
$this->load->view('member/footer');
?>

B-5 77 Questions + Bio page controller

application/controllers/member.php 
public function Questions_Bio()

{

$coach=$this->db->get_where('users',array('fld_id'=>$this->userid));

if ($coach->num_rows()>0) {

$row=$coach->row_array();



$coachName = $row["fld_username"] . " " . $row["fld_last_name"];

$coachemail = $row["fld_email"];

$coachsparent_id = $row["fld_parent"];

}



$admin=$this->db->get_where('users',array('fld_id'=>$coachsparent_id));

if ($admin->num_rows()>0) {

$row=$admin->row_array();



$adminName = $row["fld_username"] . " " . $row["fld_last_name"];

$adminemail = $row["fld_email"];

}



$row = array();

$successMsg = "";

$errorMsg = "";

$this->load->model('admin_model');

$tbForm = $this->admin_model->get_coaching_forms($this->userid,'Questions_Bio');

if(sizeof($tbForm)>0){

$row = $tbForm[0];

}

if($this->input->post()){
if ($this->input->post('delete'))
{
$this->db->delete('user_questions_bio', array('fld_user_id' => $this->userid));
}
if(isset($_POST['save']))
{

$bio1 = $_POST['bio1'];

$bio2 = $_POST['bio2'];

$bio3 = $_POST['bio3'];

$bio4 = $_POST['bio4'];

$bio5 = $_POST['bio5'];

$bio6 = $_POST['bio6'];

$bio7 = $_POST['bio7'];

$bio8 = $_POST['bio8'];

$bio9 = $_POST['bio9'];

$bio10 = $_POST['bio10'];

$bio11 = $_POST['bio11'];

$bio12 = $_POST['bio12'];

$bio13 = $_POST['bio13'];

$bio14 = $_POST['bio14'];

$massage = "

	<meta http-equiv='Content-Type' content='text/html; charset=windows-1252'>
	<meta name='GENERATOR' content='MSHTML 11.00.10570.1001'>

			</td>

	</table><strong></strong><strong></strong><strong> </strong>

		<tr>
			<td align='center' id='TdFooter' bgcolor='#eea000'>
				<div style='margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);'>
					<div style='margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);'><span
							style='color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-size: inherit; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;'><span
								style='color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;'><br></span></span>
					</div>
					<div style='margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);'><span
							style='color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-size: inherit; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;'><span

								style='color: rgb(0, 52, 89);'></span></div>
					<div style='margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);'><span
							style='color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;'>Team
							MyportalX</span></div>
					<div style='margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);'><span
							style='color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;'><br></span>
					</div>
				</div>
			</td>
		</tr>
	</table>";

$subject = "Form Submitted";

$header = "From:" . $this->config->item('mail_from') . "\r\n";

$header .= "MIME-Version: 1.0\r\n";

$header .= "Content-type: text/html\r\n";

$retval = mail ($adminemail,$subject,$massage,$header);



$nots=array(

'sender_id' => $this->userid,

'reciver_id' => $coachsparent_id,

'message' => $coachName.", Filled-Up and submitted <b style='color:#4e73df'>\"Questions + Bio\"</b> Form Today.",

'urls' => "mreport/".$this->userid,

'fld_date' => time()

);



$this->db->insert('notification',$nots);

echo "<div class=\"alert alert-success\">Form Submitted Successfully!<a href=\"#\" class=\"close\"
		data-dismiss=\"alert\" aria-label=\"close\">&times;</a></div>";

}



if($this->db->affected_rows()){

$updateData = array(

'completed_date' => time(),

'status' => "1",

'last_modified' => date('Y-m-d H:i:s')

);

$this->db->where(array('fld_form_id' => $row->id, 'fld_user_id' =>$this->userid));

$this->db->update('marketing_form_user',$updateData);

$successMsg = "Form submitted successfully.";



//get the updated row

$tbForm = $this->admin_model->get_coaching_forms($this->userid,'questions_bio');

if(sizeof($tbForm)>0){

$row = $tbForm[0];

}

}

}

}

if($this->db->affected_rows()){

$insertFormPossition=array(

'fld_user_id' => $this->userid,

'fld_content_structure' => '1'

//'fld_added_date' => time()

);

$userExist=$this->Common_model->user_exist_form_possition($this->userid);

if($userExist){

$this->db->where('fld_user_id',$this->userid);

$this->db->update('form_possition',$insertFormPossition);

}else{

$this->db->insert('form_possition',$insertFormPossition);

}

}else{

echo "Database Error.";

}

$data = array("Form" => $row,

"Error_Message" => $errorMsg,

"Success_Message" => $successMsg

);



$this->load->view('member/Questions_Bio', $data);

}

B-5 77 Questions + Bio page View

application/views/member/Questions_Bio.php 
<?php $this->load->view('member/sidebar'); 
$session= $this->session->get_userdata();
$user_id=$session['user_id'];
 $completed="";
error_reporting(0);

$user=$this->db->get_where('users',array('fld_id'=>$user_id));
        if ($user->num_rows()>0) {
        $row=$user->row_array();

        $memberName = $row["fld_first_name"] . " " . $row["fld_last_name"];
        $memberemail = $row["fld_email"];
        $membersparent_id = $row["fld_parent"];
        }

        $coach=$this->db->get_where('users',array('fld_id'=>$membersparent_id));
        if ($coach->num_rows()>0) {
        $row=$coach->row_array();

        $coachName = $row["fld_first_name"] . " " . $row["fld_last_name"];
        $coachemail = $row["fld_email"];
        }
?>
<!-- START BREADCRUMB -->
<ul class="breadcrumb">
	<li><a href="<?php echo base_url()." member"?>">Home</a></li>
	<li class="active"><a href="">Buisness Client</a></li>
</ul>
<!-- END BREADCRUMB -->
<img src="<?php echo base_url()." assets/images/marketing.jpg"?>" height="300" width="100%"/>
<!-- PAGE CONTENT WRAPPER -->
<div class="page-content-wrap">

	<!-- PAGE TITLE -->
	<div class="page-title">
		<h2 style="color:#006600">B-5 77 Questions + Bio</h2>
	</div>
	<!-- END PAGE TITLE -->
	<div class="page-content-wrap">
		<?php if ($Form->completed_date == "")
	    {
	        $fill=$this->db->get_where('user_questions_bio',array('fld_user_id'=>$user_id));
            if ($fill->num_rows()>0) 
            { 
                $row=$fill->row_array();
            ?>
		<form action="#" role="form" id="formsubmit" class="form-horizontal form-material" method="post">

				<div class="col-md-12">
					<div class="panel panel-default">

							</div>

							</div>

							</div>

								<label for="exampleInputEmail1">8. What do they want, more than anything?</label>

							</div>

							<div class="form-group">
								<label for="exampleInputEmail1">9. What do they desperately want?</label>
								<textarea name="bio9" class="newarea_width" rows="2"><?= $row['bio9'] ?></textarea>
							</div>

							</div>

							</div>

							</div>

								<label for="exampleInputEmail1">17. What tangible outcome they expect to
									receive?</label>
								<textarea name="bio17" class="newarea_width" rows="2"><?= $row['bio17'] ?></textarea>
							</div>

							<div class="form-group">
								<label for="exampleInputEmail1">18. What is the outcome they are desperately looking
									for?</label>
								<textarea name="bio18" class="newarea_width" rows="2"><?= $row['bio18'] ?></textarea>
							</div>
							<div class="form-group">
								<label for="exampleInputEmail1">19. One big quantifiable benefit they really
									want?</label>
								<textarea name="bio19" class="newarea_width" rows="2"><?= $row['bio19'] ?></textarea>

								<textarea name="bio38" class="newarea_width" rows="2"><?= $row['bio38'] ?></textarea>
							</div>

							<div class="form-group">
								<label for="exampleInputEmail1">39. What problem do I solve?</label>
								<textarea name="bio39" class="newarea_width" rows="2"><?= $row['bio39'] ?></textarea>
							</div>

							<div class="form-group">
								<label for="exampleInputEmail1">40. What is the result of that?</label>
								<textarea name="bio40" class="newarea_width" rows="2"><?= $row['bio40'] ?></textarea>
							</div>

							<div class="form-group">
								<label for="exampleInputEmail1">41. What will the client do after this?</label>
								<textarea name="bio41" class="newarea_width" rows="2"><?= $row['bio41'] ?></textarea>
							</div>

							<div class="form-group">
								<label for="exampleInputEmail1">42. What will the client have after this?</label>
								<textarea name="bio42" class="newarea_width" rows="2"><?= $row['bio42'] ?></textarea>
							</div>

							<div class="form-group">
								<label for="exampleInputEmail1">43. What will the client be after this?</label>
								<textarea name="bio43" class="newarea_width" rows="2"><?= $row['bio43'] ?></textarea>
							</div>

							<div class="form-group">
								<label for="exampleInputEmail1">44. What is my ideal outcome?</label>

							</div>

							</div>

							</div>

							</div>

									client to take action)</label>

									Client Journey)</label>

							</div>

							<div>
								<input type="submit" name="delete" class="btn btn-default" value="Clear Form">
								<a href="<?= base_url('coaching_session') ?>" class="btn btn-info">back</a>

									class="btn btn-info pull-right">
							</div>
						</div>
					</div>
				</div>
			</div>
		</form>
		<?php   }   
        } else { ?><a href="<?= base_url('coaching_session') ?>" class="btn btn-info">back</a>
		<?php } ?>

<!-- Modal HTML -->
<div id="reportview" class="modal fade" tabindex="-1">
	<div class="modal-dialog">
		<div class="modal-content">
			<div class="modal-header">
				<h5 class="modal-title">Your Form Was Successfully Submitted!</h5>
				<!--<button type="button" class="close" data-dismiss="modal">&times;</button>-->
			</div>
			<div class="modal-body">
				<!--<input type="text" id="formid">-->
				<div class="text-center">
					<a href="" target="_blank" id="formid" class="btn btn-info">View</a>
					<a href="" target="_blank" id="download" class="btn btn-warning">Save</a>
				</div>
			</div>
			<div class="modal-footer">
				<button type="button" class="btn btn-secondary" data-dismiss="modal">Cancel</button>
				<!--<button type="button" class="btn btn-primary">Save</button>-->
			</div>
		</div>
	</div>
</div>
<script>
	setTimeout(function () { notification(); }, 3000);

	function notification() {
		var user_id = "<?= $user_id ?>";
		var form_name = "Questions_Bio";
		$.get("<?= base_url('Member/delete_notification') ?>/" + user_id + "/" + form_name, "", function (response) {
			console.log(response);
		});
	}


	$(document).ready(function () {
		$('#btnsubmit').click(function () {
			$('#formsubmit').submit(function (event) {
				event.preventDefault();
				$.ajax({
					url: "<?= base_url("member/ Questions_Bio_form") ?>",
					type: "post",
					// dataType: "JSON",
					data: new FormData(this),
					processData: false,
					contentType: false,
					success: function (responce) {
					// console.log(responce);
					$('#formid').attr("href", "<?= base_url('member/marketingview/questions_bio/') ?>/" + responce);
					$("#download").attr("href", "<?= base_url('member/marketingdownload/questions_bio/') ?>/" + responce);
					$("#reportview").modal('show');
				},
					error: function (xhr, desc, err) {


				}
            });
		});
	});
    });
</script>
<!-- START PLUGINS -->

other coaching session form same in member file and view in member folde. so continue new anathor page



Daily Accountability Score (DAS)



DAS page controller

application/controllers/member.php 
public function das()

	{
	
	$this->load->view('member/das');
	
	}

DAS page View

application/views/member/das.php 
<?php
	         error_reporting(0);
	        $this->load->view('member/sidebar');
	        $session=$this->session->get_userdata();
	        
	        $user_id=$session['user_id'];
	        $array_week_days=array('Monday','Tuesday','Wednesday','Thursday','Friday','Saturday','Sunday');
	        $C_date=date("Y-m-d");
	        /*$isMorningTime = date("A", get_userTime(time()))=="AM" ?: 0;
	        $isEveningTime = date("A", get_userTime(time()))=="PM" ?: 0;
	        */
	        
	        		$member=$this->db->get_where('users',array('fld_id'=>$user_id));
	                if ($member->num_rows()>0) {
	            		$row=$member->row_array();
	        	        $memberName = $row["fld_first_name"] . " " . $row["fld_last_name"];
	        	        $memberemail = $row["fld_email"];
	        	        $membersparent_id = $row["fld_parent"];
	        	        $timezone = $row['fld_timezone'];
	                }
	                $coach=$this->db->get_where('users',array('fld_id'=>$membersparent_id));
	                if ($coach->num_rows()>0) {
	                	$row=$coach->row_array();
	        	        $coachName = $row["fld_first_name"] . " " . $row["fld_last_name"];
	        	        $coachemail = $row["fld_email"];
	                }
	        // echo $timezone;
	        date_default_timezone_set($timezone);
	        
	        // echo date('d-m-Y h:m:s');
	        		$isMorningTime = get_userTime("now","A")=="AM" ?: 0;
	        		$isEveningTime = get_userTime("now","A")=="PM" ?: 0;
	        
	        		$week = getWeekForDate($C_date);
	        		$weekStartDate = $week["start"];
	        		$weekEndDate = $week["end"];
	        
	        		$d = strtotime("-1 day");
	        		$C_date1=date("Y-m-d",$d);
	        		$WeekDay1 = date_diff(date_create($C_date1),date_create($weekStartDate)); 
	        		$WeekDay = date_diff(date_create($C_date),date_create($weekStartDate));
	         /*
	          	* DateInterval Object (
	          * 	[y] => 0
	          * 	[m] => 0
	          * 	[d] => 0
	          * 	[h] => 0
	          * 	[i] => 0
	          * 	[s] => 0
	          * 	[weekday] => 0
	          * 	[weekday_behavior] => 0
	          * 	[first_last_day_of] => 0
	          * 	[invert] => 0 [days] => 0
	          * 	[special_type] => 0
	          * 	[special_amount] => 0
	          * 	[have_weekday_relative] => 0
	          * 	[have_special_relative] => 0
	          * )
	         */
	         		$WeekDay = $WeekDay->d;
	         		$WeekDay1 = $WeekDay1->d;
	                ############morning
	                $accomplish = $_POST['accomplish'];
	        		$feel = $_POST['feel'];
	        		$intend = $_POST['intend'];
	        		$universe = $_POST['universe'];
	        		 ##########evening
	        		$special = $_POST['special'];
	        		$thing = $_POST['thing'];
	        		$imporve = $_POST['imporve'];
	        		$message = $_POST['message'];
	        		$about = $_POST['about'];
	        		 ###########################MORNING
	        		// $this->db->select('fld_morning_time');
	        		 $this->db->order_by('fld_id','desc');
	                 $userMorningData=$this->db->get_where('daily_score_morning',array('fld_user_id'=>$user_id),1,0);
	        		 $today_s_MorningData='0';
	        		 if ($userMorningData->num_rows()>0) {
	        			 $m_ROW=$userMorningData->row_array();
	        			 $m_date=date('d-m-Y',$m_ROW['fld_morning_time']);
	        
	        			 if(date('d-m-Y')==$m_date){
	        
	        				 $accomplish = $m_ROW['fld_accomplish'];
	        				 $feel = $m_ROW['fld_feel'];
	        				 $intend = $m_ROW['fld_intend'];
	        				 $universe = $m_ROW['fld_universe'];
	        				 $today_s_MorningData='1';
	        
	        			 }
	        		 }
	        
	        
	        
	        		 if(isset($_POST['morning']) && ($today_s_MorningData=='0')){
	        			 if($user_id !='0'){
	        
	        				  $morningData = array(
	        						   'fld_user_id'=> $user_id,
	        		                   'fld_accomplish' => $accomplish,
	        			               'fld_feel'   => $feel,
	        			               'fld_intend' => $intend,
	        			               'fld_universe' => $universe,
	        						   'fld_morning_time' =>time(),
	        						   'fld_date' =>date('Y-m-d')
	        				   );
	        				  $fill=$this->db->get_where('mys_daily_score_morning',array('fld_user_id'=>$user_id,'fld_date'=>date('Y-m-d')));
	                    if ($fill->num_rows()>0) 
	                    {
	                    	echo "<div   class=\"alert alert-danger\"><strong>already fill</strong>.<a href=\"#\" class=\"close\" data-dismiss=\"alert\" aria-label=\"close\">&times;</a></div>";
	                    }else
	                    {
	        				   $this->db->insert('mys_daily_score_morning', $morningData);
	        				   if($this->db->affected_rows()){
	        			        echo "<div   class=\"alert alert-success\"><strong>DAS Submitted Successfully!</strong>.<a href=\"#\" class=\"close\" data-dismiss=\"alert\" aria-label=\"close\">&times;</a></div>";
	        					}else{
	        						echo "Database Error.";
	        					}
	        			 }
	        			}
	        		 }
	        		 
	        		
	        		 ############################MORNING END
	        		 //$this->db->select('fld_evening_time');
	        		 $this->db->order_by('fld_id','desc');
	                 $userEveningData=$this->db->get_where('daily_score_evening',array('fld_user_id'=>$user_id),1,0);
	        		 $today_s_EveningData='0';
	        		 if ($userEveningData->num_rows()>0) {
	        
	        			 $m_ROW=$userEveningData->row_array();
	        			 $m_date=date('d-m-Y',$m_ROW['fld_evening_time']);
	        
	        			 if(date('d-m-Y')==$m_date){
	        				 $today_s_EveningData='1';
	        				 $special = $m_ROW['fld_special'];
	        				 $thing = $m_ROW['fld_thing'];
	        				 $imporve = $m_ROW['fld_imporve'];
	        				 $message = $m_ROW['fld_message'];
	        				 $about = $m_ROW['fld_about'];
	        			 }
	        		 }
	        
	        
	        		 if(isset($_POST['evening']) && ($today_s_EveningData=='0')){
	        			 if($user_id !='0'){
	        					$eveningData = array(
	        						   'fld_user_id'=> $user_id,
	        		                   'fld_special' => $special,
	        			               'fld_thing' => $thing,
	        			               'fld_imporve' => $imporve,
	        			               'fld_message' => $message,
	        			               'fld_about' => $about,
	        						   'fld_evening_time' =>gmmktime(),
	        						   'fld_date' =>date('Y-m-d')
	        		   );
	        		    $this->db->insert('mys_daily_score_evening', $eveningData);
	        		    if($this->db->affected_rows()){
	        			  echo "<div   class=\"alert alert-success\"><strong>DAS Submitted Successfully!</strong><a href=\"#\" class=\"close\" data-dismiss=\"alert\" aria-label=\"close\">&times;</a></div>";
	        
	        			}else{
	        				echo "Error..";
	        			}
	        		 }
	        	 }
	        		#################EVENING END
	                $wakeup = $_POST['wakeup'];
	        		 $goal_affirmations = $_POST['goal_affirmations'];
	        		 $exercise = $_POST['exercise'];
	        		 $work = $_POST['work'];
	        		 $diet = $_POST['diet'];
	        		 $centering = $_POST['centering'];
	        		 $family = $_POST['family'];
	        		 $growth = $_POST['growth'];
	        		 $entertainment = $_POST['entertainment'];
	        		 $sleep = $_POST['sleep'];
	         		 $totalscore = $wakeup + $goal_affirmations + $exercise +  $work + $diet +  $centering + $family + $growth + $entertainment + $sleep;
	        
	          	///$this->db->select('fld_added_date');
	        		 $this->db->order_by('fld_added_date','desc');
	                 $userDayData=$this->db->get_where('daily_score_day',array('fld_user_id'=>$user_id),1,0);
	        		 $today_s_DayData='0';
	        		 if ($userDayData->num_rows()>0) {
	        			 $m_ROW=$userDayData->row_array();
	        			 $m_date=date('d-m-Y',$m_ROW['fld_added_date']);
	        			 if(date('d-m-Y')==$m_date){
	        				 $today_s_DayData='1';
	        
	        				 $wakeup = $m_ROW['fld_wakeup'];
	        				 $goal_affirmations = $m_ROW['fld_goal_affirmations'];
	        				 $exercise = $m_ROW['fld_exercise'];
	        				 $work = $m_ROW['fld_work'];
	        				 $diet = $m_ROW['fld_diet'];
	        				 $centering = $m_ROW['fld_centering'];
	        				 $family = $m_ROW['fld_family'];
	        				 $growth = $m_ROW['fld_growth'];
	        				 $entertainment = $m_ROW['fld_entertainment'];
	        				 $sleep = $m_ROW['fld_sleep'];
	        				 $totalscore =  $m_ROW['fld_total'];
	        
	        			 }
	        		 }
	        		 /*if(check_time("12:00 AM", "11:59 PM")==false){
	        				  $today_s_DayData='2';
	        		 }*/
	        		
	        		if(isset($_POST['submit_score']) && ($today_s_DayData=='0')){
	        			 if($user_id != '0'){
	        				$totalscore = $wakeup + $goal_affirmations + $exercise +  $work + $diet +  $centering + $family + $growth + $entertainment + $sleep;
	                   			$newData = array(
	        		                   'fld_user_id'=> $user_id,
	        			               'fld_wakeup' => $wakeup,
	        			               'fld_goal_affirmations' => $goal_affirmations,
	        			               'fld_exercise' => $exercise,
	        			               'fld_work' => $work,
	        			               'fld_diet' => $diet,
	        			               'fld_centering' => $centering,
	        			               'fld_family' => $family,
	        			               'fld_growth' => $growth,
	        			               'fld_entertainment' => $entertainment,
	        			               'fld_sleep' => $sleep,
	        			   				'fld_total'=> $totalscore,
	        			               'fld_added_date' =>gmmktime(),
	        			               'fld_date' =>date('Y-m-d')
	        			        );
	        			
	                   			/*echo "<pre>";
	                   			print_r ($newData);
	                   			echo "</pre>";
	exit;*/
	$fill=$this->db->get_where('mys_daily_score_day',array('fld_user_id'=>$user_id,'fld_date'=>date('Y-m-d')));
	if ($fill->num_rows()>0)
	{
	echo "<div class=\"alert alert-danger\"><strong>already fill</strong>.<a href=\"#\" class=\"close\"
			data-dismiss=\"alert\" aria-label=\"close\">&times;</a></div>";
	}else
	{
	$this->db->insert('mys_daily_score_day', $newData);
	
	if ($totalscore < 70){
		$massage="<head><meta http-equiv='Content-Type' content='text/html; charset=windows-1252'><meta name='GENERATOR' content='MSHTML 11.00.10570.1001'><body bgcolor='#ffffff'><strong></strong><strong> </strong><strong></strong><table width='600' align='center' id='TbHeader' bgcolor='#400080' border='0' cellspacing='0' cellpadding='4'><tr><td align='center' id='TdHeader' bgcolor='#400080'><p align='center'><font color='#ffffff' face='Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif' size='6'><strong>Welcome</strong></font></p></td></tr></table><table width='600' align='center' id='TbBodyRow' border='0' cellspacing='0' cellpadding='0'><tr><td id='TdBodyRow' valign='top' bgcolor='#ffffff'><table width='100%' id='TbBody' bgcolor='#ffffff' border='0' cellspacing='0' cellpadding='4'><tr><td align='center' id='TdBody' bgcolor='#ffffff'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<p align='left'><font color='#000000' face='Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif' size='3'><strong>Hi "

	        										$qryWeekTotal1=$this->db->select('fld_date')->from('daily_score_day')->where('fld_user_id',$user_id)->limit(1)->order_by('fld_date','DESC')->get()->row();
	        										
	        										//$this->db->order_by("fld_id", "desc");
	        										$this->db->select('SUM(fld_total) AS Total');

	        											if ($qryWeekTotal->num_rows()>0) {
	        											$WeekTotal = $qryWeekTotal->row()->Total;
	        										}
	        										if($WeekTotal > 0){
	        											$WeekAverage  = $WeekTotal;
	        											// print_r($WeekDay);x
	        												if($WeekDay > 0)
	        													$WeekAverage  = round($WeekTotal /($WeekDay+1));
	        										}
	        										}else{
	        											if ($qryWeekTotal->num_rows()>0) {
	        											$WeekTotal = $qryWeekTotal->row()->Total;
	        										}

	        													$WeekAverage  = round($WeekTotal /($WeekDay1+1));
	        										}
	        										}

													for="crust1" class="padd-left">2</label>
											</li>
											<li class="li_inline"> <input type="radio" name="growth" value="3" <?php
													if($growth=='3' ) echo "checked='checked'" ?>
												<?php if($today_s_DayData=='1') echo "disabled='disabled'";?>/> <label
													for="crust1" class="padd-left">3</label>
											</li>
											<li class="li_inline"> <input type="radio" name="growth" value="4" <?php
													if($growth=='4' ) echo "checked='checked'" ?>
												<?php if($today_s_DayData=='1') echo "disabled='disabled'";?>/><label
													for="crust1" class="padd-left">4</label>
											</li>
											<li class="li_inline"> <input type="radio" name="growth" value="5" <?php
													if($growth=='5' ) echo "checked='checked'" ?>
												<?php if($today_s_DayData=='1') echo "disabled='disabled'";?>/><label
													for="crust1" class="padd-left">5</label>
											</li>
											<li class="li_inline"> <input type="radio" name="growth" value="6" <?php
													if($growth=='6' ) echo "checked='checked'" ?>
												<?php if($today_s_DayData=='1') echo "disabled='disabled'";?>/><label
													for="crust1" class="padd-left">6</label>

	        											   }else{ echo "Sleep"; }?>&nbsp;&nbsp;

												sleep routine is the most important part of the day because your body, mind
												and should will be nourished during the sleep. You mind has to be empty,
												ideally you can write in the journal and get it out of the mind, the next
												thing would be to take out any negative charged emotions and experiences
												into the Daha-Tantra application and get it out. The positive charged
												emotions are noted into the diary and the neative charged emotions are put
												into the daha tantra. The mind is should be totally empty. If possible
												create a routine like the smell of a perfume or perhaps a certain music or
												affirmation, or use a eye pillow to relax. Once a habit and a routine is
												formed the sleep will be the natural result and you will feel really charged
												at wake up time. Your body, mind, & spirit will be refreshed." ?>"></span>

									</div>
									<div class="panel-footer">
	
										<?php if($today_s_DayData=='0'){ ?>
										<button class="btn btn-default">Clear Form</button>
										<input type="submit" name="submit_score" value="Submit"
											class="btn btn-primary pull-right" id="submit_once_day" />
										<?php }else if($today_s_DayData=='1'){ ?>
										<span class="text-center text-danger ">You have already filled it.</span>
										<?php } ?>
	
									</div>
	
									<div class="form-group scroll_div">
										<table class="table table-striped table-bordered">
											<tr class="total">
												<td width="100px"><strong>Day</strong></td>
												<td class="text-center"><strong>Day Score<br>(Out of 100)</strong></td>
												<td class="text-center"><strong>Week Average</strong></td>
											</tr>
											<?php
	        															$this->db->order_by("fld_added_date", "asc");
	        															$queryRESULT=$this->db->get_where('daily_score_day',array('fld_user_id'=>$user_id,'fld_added_date>=' => strtotime($weekStartDate), 'fld_added_date <='=> strtotime($weekEndDate." 22:59:59")));
	        															$result = $queryRESULT->result_array();
	        
	        															$day=0;
	        															$rowno =0;
	        															$subtotal =0;
	        															foreach($array_week_days as $day_key=>$day_val)
	        															{
	        																$_date = date_create($weekStartDate);
	        																$add_days = $day ." days";
	        																$date = date_format(date_add($_date, date_interval_create_from_date_string($add_days)),"d-m-Y");
	        
	        
	        																$dayScore = 0;
	        																$avgScore  =0;
	        																if(sizeof($result) >= $rowno) {
	        																	$row = $queryRESULT->row($rowno);
	        																	if (date("d-m-Y",$row->fld_added_date) == $date) {
	        																		$dayScore = $row->fld_total;
	        																		$rowno++;
	        																	}
	        																}
	        																$subtotal += $dayScore;
	        																if ($C_date == $qryWeekTotal1->fld_date)
	        																{
	        																if($subtotal > 0 && $day <= $WeekDay)
	        																	$avgScore = $subtotal / ($day+1);
	        																echo "<tr>";
	        																echo "<td>".$day_val."</td>";
	        																if($day <= $WeekDay) {
	        																	echo "<td>" . $dayScore . "</td>";
	        																	echo "<td>" . round($avgScore) . "</td>";
	        																}
	        																else{
	        																	echo "<td>-</td>";
	        																	echo "<td>-</td>";
	        																}
	        																echo "</tr>";
	        																$day++;
	        															}else{
	        																if($subtotal > 0 && $day <= $WeekDay1)
	        																	$avgScore = $subtotal / ($day+1);
	        																echo "<tr>";
	        																echo "<td>".$day_val."</td>";
	        																if($day <= $WeekDay1) {
	        																	echo "<td>" . $dayScore . "</td>";
	        																	echo "<td>" . round($avgScore) . "</td>";
	        																}
	        																else{
	        																	echo "<td>-</td>";
	        																	echo "<td>-</td>";
	        																}
	        																echo "</tr>";
	        																$day++;
	        															}
	        														}
	        														?>
	
	
										</table>
									</div>
	
	
									<style>
										.totalAvg {
											width: 100%;
											height: auto;
											float: left;
										}
	
										.scroll_div {
											width: 100%;
											height: auto;
											max-height: 200px;
											overflow-y: scroll;
										}
									</style>
									<div class="totalAvg">
										<table class="table table-striped">
											<tr>
												<td width="50px"><strong>Total</strong></td>
												<td width="200px" class="text-center"><strong>
														<?php echo round($subtotal); ?>
													</strong></td>
												<td width="200px" class="text-center"><strong>
														<?php
	        														if ($C_date == $qryWeekTotal1->fld_date)
	        														{ 
	        															echo round($subtotal / ($WeekDay+1));
	        														}else{
	        															echo round($subtotal / ($WeekDay1+1));
	        														}
	        														?>
													</strong></td>
											</tr>
	
									</div>
								</form>
							</div>
	
						</div>
						<!-- END BASIC ELEMENTS -->
					</div>
				</div>
			</div>

	        There are 6 segments –scoring is from 1-10 (10 being high)  The last one is based on becoming present 5 times per day ( set alarms in the phone- and when the alarm goes off- at that moment or in a short time- take a moment to do 1 minute meditation—become focused and centered) This has to be done five times in the waking hours
	        At the end of the day you give yourself a score—a value from 1-10 <br><br>
	        The total score is out of 70 – The total-final score is taken into account.<br><br>
	        On a daily basis—date based- it will be added ( we can set different matrix—or graphs to see the result—based on the 7 matrix—wakeup / work etc  the total can be viewed from a particular date to another date. A monthly score or a graph will be nice.  ( can be added in phase II)
